The treatment of large and complex hand injuries is particularly challenching concerning the functional and cosmetic outcome.

In this kind of injuries the primary defect cover is of paramount importance and so the initial situation for secondary reconstructive options may be evidently improved.
Bei dieser Art der Verletzung ist die primäre Weichteildeckung von besonderer Bedeutung, da sich dadurch die Ausgangssituationen für eine Wiederherstellung der Funktion deutlich verbessern lassen.

The finding of an extremely mobile thrombus in a patent foramen ovale (i.e., transit thrombus) without arterial embolism is rare.
Die Diagnose eines flottierenden Thrombus im offenen Foramen ovale (sog. Transit-Thrombus) ohne arterielle Embolie ist selten.

Persistent cellular microchimerism might play a role in the pathogenesis of systemic sclerosis (SSc).
Ein persistierender zellulärer Mikrochimerismus könnte in der Pathogenese der systemischen Sklerodermie (SSc) eine Rolle spielen.

Microchimerism results from the traffic of fetal cells through the placenta during pregnancy into the maternal circulation and their survival due to HLA class II compatibility.
Der Mikrochimerismus entsteht durch den Transport fetaler Zellen durch die Plazenta während der Schwangerschaft in die maternale Zirkulation und deren Überleben aufgrund einer weitgehenden HLA-Klasse-II-Kompatibilität.
[{"en": "Microchimerism", "de": "Mikrochimerismus"}, {"en": "fetal cells", "de": "fetaler Zellen"}, {"en": "placenta", "de": "Plazenta"}, {"en": "pregnancy", "de": "Schwangerschaft"}, {"en": "maternal circulation", "de": "maternale Zirkulation"}, {"en": "HLA class II compatibility", "de": "HLA-Klasse-II-Kompatibilität"}]
[{"en": "Microchimerism", "de": "Mikrochimerismus"}, {"en": "results from", "de": "entsteht durch"}, {"en": "traffic of fetal cells", "de": "Transport fetaler Zellen"}, {"en": "through the placenta", "de": "durch die Plazenta"}, {"en": "during pregnancy", "de": "während der Schwangerschaft"}, {"en": "maternal circulation", "de": "maternale Zirkulation"}, {"en": "survival", "de": "Überleben"}, {"en": "HLA class II compatibility", "de": "HLA-Klasse-II-Kompatibilität"}]

In female SSc patients the presence of fetal CD3-positive T-cells in the maternal circulation and of fetal cells in the affected skin tissue has been identified through y chromosome specific DNA sequences.
Bei weiblichen SSc-Patienten wurde die Anwesenheit von fetalen CD3-positiven T-Zellen in der maternalen Zirkulation und von fetalen Zellen im befallenen Hautgewebe in Form von Y-Chromosomen-spezifischen DNA-Sequenzen nachgewiesen.

The persistent microchimerism might cause SSc in certain patients by initiating a fetal anti-maternal Graft-versus-host-like response.

The diagnostic criteria include typical rash, arthralgias, bouts of fever, and leukocytosis, as well as lymphadenopathy or splenomegaly, liver dysfunctions, non-infectious angina, and absence of rheumatoid factor and antinuclear antibodies.

An early and precise diagnosis leads to prompt institution of effective therapy and avoidance of unnecessary and potentially harmful therapy.

Infections with a vast variety of microorganisms have to be considered beyond the common bacteria, Pneumocystis carinii, cytomegaly virus, fungi, mycobacteria and respiratory viruses beeing most important.
Ursächlich kommen Infektionen mit einer Vielzahl von Erregern in Frage, im Vordergrund stehen neben den üblichen bakteriellen Erregern Pneumocystis carinii (Pc), Zytomegalieviren (CMV), Pilze, Tuberkelbakterien und respiratorische Viren.
[{"en": "Infections", "de": "Infektionen"}, {"en": "microorganisms", "de": "Erregern"}, {"en": "common bacteria", "de": "üblichen bakteriellen Erregern"}, {"en": "Pneumocystis carinii", "de": "Pneumocystis carinii"}, {"en": "cytomegaly virus", "de": "Zytomegalieviren"}, {"en": "fungi", "de": "Pilze"}, {"en": "mycobacteria", "de": "Tuberkelbakterien"}, {"en": "respiratory viruses", "de": "respiratorische Viren"}]

The flexible bronchoscopy with bronchoalveolar lavage is diagnostic in 60-80 %, the remaining cases have to undergo lung biopsy procedures, depending on the severity of illness.

To calculate canal compromise and decrease of midsagittal diameter caused by retropulsion of fragments into the spinal canal we analyzed the pre- and postoperative computed tomographies of 32 patients with unstable thoracolumbar burst fractures treated by USS (universal spine system).

A pilot study was conducted to provide an indication of the power density (PD) dependent analgesic effect of ultrasound (US) under serial application in patients with low back pain.

A survey of the literature shows that complicated fractures with severe dislocation of the fragments have the lowest rate of complications after functionally stable fixation, whereas non-complicated fractures without significant dislocation in the distal part of the mandible can be treated successfully via monocortical non-compressive osteosynthesis as well.
Eine Übersicht über die bestehende Litera-tur zeigt, dass komplizierte und schwer reponierbare Unterkieferfrakturen nach einer Kompressionsosteosynthese eine deutlich geringere Komplikationsrate aufweisen, während einfache und nur gering dislozierte Frakturen im distalen Anteil der Mandibula auch mittels monokortikaler Miniplattenosteosynthese erfolgreich versorgt werden können.

[{"en": "A survey", "de": "Eine Übersicht"}, {"en": "the literature", "de": "die bestehende Litera-tur"}, {"en": "complicated fractures", "de": "komplizierte Fraktur"}, {"en": "severe dislocation", "de": "schwer reponierbare"}, {"en": "the lowest rate", "de": "eine deutlich geringere"}, {"en": "complications", "de": "Komplikationsrate"}, {"en": "without significant dislocation", "de": "nur gering dislozierte"}, {"en": "distal part", "de": "distalen Anteil"}, {"en": "mandible", "de": "Mandibula"}, {"en": "successfully", "de": "erfolgreich"}]

It seems that pre- and intraoperative parameters can be helpful in describing the character of a mandibular fracture in order to give a differential indication between the two therapeutical concepts.

The consideration of only seven parameters, as the mandibular fracture score does, provides many combinations of describing a fracture, so that former studies with their small number of patients make only a rather inaccurate differential indication possible.
Doch bei nur 7 Einzelparametern - wie im mandibular fracture score - ergeben sich bereits so zahlreiche Kombinationen zur Beschreibung eines Unterkiefertraumas, dass sämtliche bisher angelegten Studien mit ihren geringen Fallzahlen allenfalls eine grobe Differenzialindikation ermöglichen können.

As long as there is no prospective multi-center study giving a guideline to classify mandibular fractures, the rigid internal fixation via functionally stable osteosynthesis should be preferred in all cases which are not "clear, easy to handle" fractures.
Solange keine prospektive Multizenterstudie vorliegt, die eine Entscheidungshilfe in der Wahl des Osteosyntheseverfahrens geben könnte, sollte im fließenden Bereich zwischen "einfacher" und "schwieriger" Fraktur der funktionsstabilen Kompressionsosteosynthese mit ihrer deutlich geringeren Inzidenz postoperativer Komplikationen der Vorzug gegeben werden.

Comparative genomic hybridization (CGH) is a molecular cytogenetic method for the detection of chromosomal imbalances between a tumor and a normal genome.
Die komparative genomische Hybridisierung ("comparative genomic hybridization", CGH) ist ein molekularzytogenetisches Verfahren, welches die umfassende Analyse eines Tumorgenoms auf Über- und Unterrepräsentationen von DNA-Abschnitten ermöglicht.
[{"en": "Comparative genomic hybridization", "de": "komparative genomische Hybridisierung"}, {"en": "molecular cytogenetic method", "de": "molekularzytogenetisches Verfahren"}, {"en": "chromosomal imbalances", "de": "Über- und Unterrepräsentationen von DNA-Abschnitten"}, {"en": "tumor", "de": "Tumor"}, {"en": "normal genome", "de": "Tumorgenom"}]
[{"en": "Comparative genomic hybridization", "de": "komparative genomische Hybridisierung"}, {"en": "CGH", "de": "CGH"}, {"en": "molecular cytogenetic method", "de": "molekularzytogenetisches Verfahren"}, {"en": "detection", "de": "Analyse"}, {"en": "tumor", "de": "Tumor"}]

In order to produce quantitative and reproducible results, we developed an image analysis program that allows the detection and mapping of the genetic alterations.
Um quantitative und reproduzierbare Aussagen über die genetischen Aberrationen machen zu können, wurde eine Software entwickelt, welche die objektive Erfassung von Ort und Art der Veränderungen ermöglicht.
[{"en": "quantitative and reproducible results", "de": "quantitative und reproduzierbare Aussagen"}, {"en": "image analysis program", "de": "Software"}, {"en": "genetic alterations", "de": "genetischen Aberrationen"}]

The result is represented as a CGH sum karyogram in which the genetic changes are documented as color coded-chromosomes.
Das Ergebnis wird in Form eines CGH-Summenkaryogramms dargestellt, welches die genetischen Veränderungen als farbkodierte Chromosomen dokumentiert.
[{"en": "result", "de": "Ergebnis"}, {"en": "CGH sum karyogram", "de": "CGH-Summenkaryogramms"}, {"en": "genetic changes", "de": "genetischen Veränderungen"}, {"en": "color coded-chromosomes", "de": "farbkodierte Chromosomen"}]
[{"en": "The result", "de": "Das Ergebnis"}, {"en": "as", "de": "in Form eines"}, {"en": "genetic changes", "de": "genetischen Veränderungen"}, {"en": "color coded-chromosomes", "de": "farbkodierte Chromosomen"}]

The aim of our investigation is to correlate the genotype with the phenotype on the basis of CGH sum karyograms and thus to achieve a genetic characterization that will supplement the morphological tumor description.

Operational interventions can be planned and simulated accurately with the help of a three-dimensional reconstruction of the anatomical bone structures, created from the tomographic data of a patient.

After successful centralization of laboratory analyses since more than 30 years, advances in biosensors, microprocessors, measurement of undiluted whole blood and miniaturization of laboratory analyzers are leading nowadays more and more to a re-decentralization in the laboratory medicine.
Nach erfolgreicher Zentralisierung der Laboranalytik seit mehr als 30 Jahren, führen Fortschritte bei Biosensoren, Mikroprozessoren, Messung in unverdünntem Vollblut und die Verkleinerung von Laboranalysen heute wieder immer mehr zu einer neuerlichen Re-Dezentralisierung in der Labormedizin.
[{"en": "centralization", "de": "Zentralisierung"}, {"en": "laboratory analyses", "de": "Laboranalytik"}, {"en": "biosensors", "de": "Biosensoren"}, {"en": "microprocessors", "de": "Mikroprozessoren"}, {"en": "measurement of undiluted whole blood", "de": "Messung in unverdünntem Vollblut"}, {"en": "miniaturization", "de": "Verkleinerung"}, {"en": "laboratory analyzers", "de": "Laboranalysen"}, {"en": "laboratory medicine", "de": "Labormedizin"}]
[{"en": "After", "de": "Nach"}, {"en": "successful", "de": "erfolgreicher"}, {"en": "centralization", "de": "Zentralisierung"}, {"en": "laboratory analyses", "de": "Laboranalytik"}, {"en": "more than 30 years", "de": "mehr als 30 Jahren"}, {"en": "advances", "de": "Fortschritte"}, {"en": "biosensors", "de": "Biosensoren"}, {"en": "microprocessors", "de": "Mikroprozessoren"}, {"en": "measurement", "de": "Messung"}, {"en": "undiluted whole blood", "de": "unverdünntem Vollblut"}, {"en": "miniaturization", "de": "Verkleinerung"}, {"en": "laboratory analyzers", "de": "Laboranalysen"}, {"en": "nowadays", "de": "heute"}, {"en": "more and more", "de": "immer mehr"}, {"en": "re-decentralization", "de": "Re-Dezentralisierung"}, {"en": "laboratory medicine", "de": "Labormedizin"}]

Point-of-care-testing (POCT), which is defined as any laboratory test performed outside central or decentralized laboratories, is becoming more and more popular.
Das Point-Of-Care-Testing (POCT) wird nahe dem Patienten außerhalb von zentralen oder dezentralen Laboratorien durchgeführt.
[{"en": "Point-of-care-testing (POCT)", "de": "Point-Of-Care-Testing (POCT)"}, {"en": "laboratory test", "de": "Laboratorien"}]
[{"en": "Point-of-care-testing", "de": "Point-Of-Care-Testing"}, {"en": "POCT", "de": "POCT"}, {"en": "laboratory test", "de": "Laboratorien"}, {"en": "outside", "de": "außerhalb"}, {"en": "central", "de": "zentralen"}, {"en": "decentralized laboratories", "de": "dezentralen Laboratorien"}, {"en": "becoming more and more popular", "de": "wird nahe dem Patienten"}]

The theoretical advantages of POCT are faster turn-around-times (TAT), more rapid medical decisions, avoidance of sample identification and sample transport problems and the need of only small specimen volumes.
Die theoretischen Vorteile des POCT sind schnellere Turn-Around-Times (TAT), schnellere medizinische Entscheidungen, Vermeidung von Probenidentifizierungs- und Probentransportproblemen sowie die Notwendigkeit von nur kleinen Probenmengen.
[{"en": "POCT", "de": "POCT"}, {"en": "turn-around-times (TAT)", "de": "Turn-Around-Times (TAT)"}, {"en": "decisions", "de": "Entscheidungen"}, {"en": "sample identification", "de": "Probenidentifizierungs"}, {"en": "sample transport problems", "de": "Probentransportproblemen"}, {"en": "small specimen volumes", "de": "kleinen Probenmengen"}]
[{"en": "The theoretical advantages", "de": "Die theoretischen Vorteile"}, {"en": "POCT", "de": "des POCT"}, {"en": "faster", "de": "schnellere"}, {"en": "turn-around-times", "de": "Turn-Around-Times"}, {"en": "TAT", "de": "TAT"}, {"en": "more rapid", "de": "schnellere"}, {"en": "medical decisions", "de": "medizinische Entscheidungen"}, {"en": "avoidance", "de": "Vermeidung"}, {"en": "sample identification", "de": "Probenidentifizierungs"}, {"en": "sample transport problems", "de": "Probentransportproblemen"}, {"en": "the need", "de": "die Notwendigkeit"}, {"en": "only small", "de": "nur kleinen"}, {"en": "specimen volumes", "de": "Probenmengen"}]

These advantages are frequently mentioned, but are not associated with a clear clinical benefit.
Diese Vorteile werden zwar oft hervorgehoben, gehen jedoch nicht mit einem klar erkennbaren klinischen Nutzen einher.
[{"en": "advantages", "de": "Vorteile"}, {"en": "benefit", "de": "Nutzen"}]
[{"en": "These advantages", "de": "Diese Vorteile"}, {"en": "frequently mentioned", "de": "oft hervorgehoben"}, {"en": "not associated", "de": "nicht"}, {"en": "clear clinical benefit", "de": "klar erkennbaren klinischen Nutzen"}]

The disadvantages of POCT such as incorrect handling and/or maintenance of the analyzers by non-trained clinical staff, inadequate or even absent calibrations and/or quality controls, lack of cost-effectiveness because of an increased number of analyzers and more expensive reagents, insufficient documentation and difficult comparability of the obtained POCT-results with routine laboratory results, are strongly evident.
Die Nachteile des POCT wie unsachgemäße Handhabung und/ oder Wartung der Analysengeräte durch das ungeschulte Stationspersonal, mangelnde oder fehlende Kalibration und/oder Qualitätskontrolle, Kosten durch Vorhaltung mehrerer Geräte und teurerer Reagenzien, insuffiziente Dokumentation und schwierige Vergleichbarkeit zwischen den POCT-Ergebnissen und den Routinelaborergebnissen, sind ebenfalls augenscheinlich.
[{"en": "disadvantages", "de": "Nachteile"}, {"en": "POCT", "de": "POCT"}, {"en": "incorrect handling", "de": "unsachgemäße Handhabung"}, {"en": "maintenance", "de": "Wartung"}, {"en": "analyzers", "de": "Analysengeräte"}, {"en": "non-trained clinical staff", "de": "ungeschulte Stationspersonal"}, {"en": "calibrations", "de": "Kalibration"}, {"en": "quality controls", "de": "Qualitätskontrolle"}, {"en": "cost-effectiveness", "de": "Kosten"}, {"en": "reagents", "de": "Reagenzien"}, {"en": "documentation", "de": "Dokumentation"}, {"en": "comparability", "de": "Vergleichbarkeit"}, {"en": "routine laboratory results", "de": "Routinelaborergebnissen"}]
[{"en": "The disadvantages", "de": "Die Nachteile"}, {"en": "POCT", "de": "POCT"}, {"en": "incorrect handling", "de": "unsachgemäße Handhabung"}, {"en": "maintenance", "de": "Wartung"}, {"en": "analyzers", "de": "Analysengeräte"}, {"en": "clinical staff", "de": "Stationspersonal"}, {"en": "calibrations", "de": "Kalibration"}, {"en": "quality controls", "de": "Qualitätskontrolle"}, {"en": "cost-effectiveness", "de": "Kosten"}, {"en": "increased number", "de": "Vorhaltung mehrerer"}, {"en": "reagents", "de": "Reagenzien"}, {"en": "insufficient documentation", "de": "insuffiziente Dokumentation"}, {"en": "comparability", "de": "Vergleichbarkeit"}, {"en": "obtained POCT-results", "de": "POCT-Ergebnissen"}, {"en": "routine laboratory results", "de": "Routinelaborergebnissen"}]

According to the authors' opinion the decision for the establishing of POCT has only to be made in a close co-operation between physicians and laboratorians in order to vouch for necessity and high quality of the analyses.
Nach Meinung der Autoren sollte die Entscheidung zur Etablierung eines POCT nur in engster Kooperation zwischen Klinikern und Labormedizinern erfolgen, um Sinnhaftigkeit und hohe Qualität der Analysen zu gewährleisten.
[{"en": "decision", "de": "Entscheidung"}, {"en": "establishing of POCT", "de": "Etablierung eines POCT"}, {"en": "co-operation", "de": "Kooperation"}, {"en": "physicians", "de": "Klinikern"}, {"en": "laboratorians", "de": "Labormedizinern"}, {"en": "necessity", "de": "Sinnhaftigkeit"}, {"en": "high quality", "de": "hohe Qualität"}, {"en": "analyses", "de": "Analysen"}]
[{"en": "According", "de": "Nach"}, {"en": "the authors'", "de": "der Autoren"}, {"en": "opinion", "de": "Meinung"}, {"en": "the decision", "de": "die Entscheidung"}, {"en": "establishing", "de": "Etablierung"}, {"en": "POCT", "de": "eines POCT"}, {"en": "close co-operation", "de": "engster Kooperation"}, {"en": "physicians", "de": "Klinikern"}, {"en": "laboratorians", "de": "Labormedizinern"}, {"en": "necessity", "de": "Sinnhaftigkeit"}, {"en": "high quality", "de": "hohe Qualität"}, {"en": "analyses", "de": "Analysen"}]

Taking the local situation into consideration (24-h-central laboratory, etc.) the spectrum of parameters measured by means of POCT should be rigorously restricted to the vital functions.
Unter Berücksichtigung der lokalen Situation (24 h-Zentrallabor, etc.) sollte sich das Parameterspektrum des POCT streng auf vitale Funktionen beschränken.
[{"en": "24-h-central laboratory", "de": "24 h-Zentrallabor"}, {"en": "spectrum of parameters", "de": "Parameterspektrum"}, {"en": "POCT", "de": "POCT"}, {"en": "vital functions", "de": "vitale Funktionen"}]
[{"en": "local situation", "de": "lokalen Situation"}, {"en": "into consideration", "de": "Berücksichtigung"}, {"en": "spectrum", "de": "Parameterspektrum"}, {"en": "parameters", "de": "Parameter"}, {"en": "POCT", "de": "POCT"}, {"en": "restricted", "de": "beschränken"}, {"en": "vital functions", "de": "vitale Funktionen"}]

Such analytes should be:
Die dafür notwendigen Analyte sollten sein:
[{"en": "analytes", "de": "Analyse"}]
[{"en": "Such", "de": "Die dafür notwendigen"}, {"en": "analytes", "de": "Analyse"}, {"en": "should be", "de": "sollten sein"}]

hemoglobin or hematocrit, activated whole blood clotting time, blood gases, sodium, potassium, ionized calcium, glucose, creatinine, ammonia and lactate.
Hämoglobin oder Hämatokrit, Aktivierte Vollblut-Gerinnungszeit, Blutgase, Natrium, Kalium, ionisiertes Kalzium, Glukose, Ammoniak und Laktat.
[{"en": "hemoglobin", "de": "Hämoglobin"}, {"en": "hematocrit", "de": "Hämatokrit"}, {"en": "activated whole blood clotting time", "de": "Aktivierte Vollblut-Gerinnungszeit"}, {"en": "blood gases", "de": "Blutgase"}, {"en": "sodium", "de": "Natrium"}, {"en": "potassium", "de": "Kalium"}, {"en": "ionized calcium", "de": "ionisiertes Kalzium"}, {"en": "glucose", "de": "Glukose"}, {"en": "ammonia", "de": "Ammoniak"}, {"en": "lactate", "de": "Laktat"}]

The concept of MR guidance of invasive diagnostic and minimally invasive therapeutic procedures is based on the excellent morphologic and functional properties of MR imaging.
Das Konzept der Steuerung invasiv-diagnostischer und minimal-invasiver therapeutischer Verfahren durch die MR-Tomographie basiert auf der Kombination von exzellenter morphologischer und funktioneller Bildgebung.
[{"en": "MR guidance", "de": "Steuerung"}, {"en": "invasive diagnostic", "de": "invasiv-diagnostisch"}, {"en": "minimally invasive therapeutic procedures", "de": "minimal-invasiver therapeutischer Verfahren"}, {"en": "MR imaging", "de": "MR-Tomographie"}, {"en": "morphologic and functional properties", "de": "morphologischer und funktioneller Bildgebung"}]
[{"en": "The concept", "de": "Das Konzept"}, {"en": "MR guidance", "de": "Steuerung"}, {"en": "invasive diagnostic", "de": "invasiv-diagnostischer"}, {"en": "minimally invasive therapeutic procedures", "de": "minimal-invasiver therapeutischer Verfahren"}, {"en": "based on", "de": "basiert auf"}, {"en": "excellent", "de": "exzellenter"}, {"en": "morphologic and functional properties", "de": "morphologischer und funktioneller Bildgebung"}, {"en": "MR imaging", "de": "MR-Tomographie"}]

Prerequisites are adequate patient monitoring and adherence to safety guidelines.
Voraussetzung ist eine adäquate Patientenüberwachung und die Einhaltung von Sicherheitsaspekten.
[{"en": "Prerequisites", "de": "Voraussetzung"}, {"en": "adequate patient monitoring", "de": "adäquate Patientenüberwachung"}, {"en": "adherence to safety guidelines", "de": "Einhaltung von Sicherheitsaspekten"}]
[{"en": "Prerequisites", "de": "Voraussetzung"}, {"en": "adequate", "de": "adäquate"}, {"en": "patient monitoring", "de": "Patientenüberwachung"}, {"en": "adherence", "de": "Einhaltung"}, {"en": "safety guidelines", "de": "Sicherheitsaspekten"}]

Fast and ultrafast sequences, temperature quantification, visualization of intravascular devices, thermal stability of contrast media and thermosensitive contrast media are discussed.
Schnelle und ultraschnelle Bildgebung, Temperaturquantifizierung, Visualisierung von intravaskulären Instrumenten, Thermostabilität von Kontrastmitteln und thermosensitive Kontrastmittel werden diskutiert.
[{"en": "sequences", "de": "Bildgebung"}, {"en": "temperature quantification", "de": "Temperaturquantifizierung"}, {"en": "visualization of intravascular devices", "de": "Visualisierung von intravaskulären Instrumenten"}, {"en": "thermal stability of contrast media", "de": "Thermostabilität von Kontrastmitteln"}, {"en": "thermosensitive contrast media", "de": "thermosensitive Kontrastmittel"}]

The spectrum of clinical applications includes biopsies, thermal ablation modalities, vascular applications, MR endoscopy and intraoperative MR imaging.
Das Spektrum der klinischen Anwendungen reicht von Biopsien, thermischen Ablationsverfahren, vaskulären Applikationen bis hin zum intraoperativen Einsatz der MR-Tomographie.
[{"en": "spectrum", "de": "Spektrum"}, {"en": "clinical applications", "de": "klinischen Anwendungen"}, {"en": "biopsies", "de": "Biopsien"}, {"en": "thermal ablation modalities", "de": "thermischen Ablationsverfahren"}, {"en": "vascular applications", "de": "vaskulären Applikationen"}, {"en": "MR endoscopy", "de": "MR-Tomographie"}, {"en": "intraoperative MR imaging", "de": "intraoperativen Einsatz der MR-Tomographie"}]
[{"en": "The spectrum", "de": "Das Spektrum"}, {"en": "clinical applications", "de": "klinischen Anwendungen"}, {"en": "includes", "de": "reicht von"}, {"en": "biopsies", "de": "Biopsien"}, {"en": "thermal ablation", "de": "thermischen Ablationsverfahren"}, {"en": "vascular applications", "de": "vaskulären Applikationen"}, {"en": "intraoperative MR imaging", "de": "intraoperativen Einsatz der MR-Tomographie"}]

The development of interventional MR imaging is still in its infancy.
Die interventionelle MR-Tomographie steht noch ganz am Anfang der Entwicklung.
[{"en": "interventional MR imaging", "de": "interventionelle MR-Tomographie"}]
[{"en": "interventional MR imaging", "de": "interventionelle MR-Tomographie"}, {"en": "still", "de": "noch"}, {"en": "in its infancy", "de": "ganz am Anfang"}]

In the future, MR imaging may play an important role in interventional radiology and minimally invasive therapy.
Möglicherweise kann die MR-Tomographie einen erheblichen Stellenwert im Bereich der interventionellen Radiologie und der minimal-invasiven Therapie erlangen.
[{"en": "MR imaging", "de": "MR-Tomographie"}, {"en": "interventional radiology", "de": "interventionellen Radiologie"}, {"en": "minimally invasive therapy", "de": "minimal-invasiven Therapie"}]
[{"en": "In the future", "de": "Möglicherweise"}, {"en": "MR imaging", "de": "MR-Tomographie"}, {"en": "important role", "de": "erheblichen Stellenwert"}, {"en": "interventional radiology", "de": "interventionellen Radiologie"}, {"en": "minimally invasive therapy", "de": "minimal-invasiven Therapie"}]

Characteristic skeletal changes occur in patients with chronic renal insufficiency.
Bei Patienten mit chronischer Niereninsuffizienz kommt es zu charakteristischen Skelettveränderungen.
[{"en": "skeletal changes", "de": "charakteristischen Skelettveränderungen"}, {"en": "chronic renal insufficiency", "de": "chronischer Niereninsuffizienz"}]
[{"en": "Characteristic", "de": "charakteristischen"}, {"en": "skeletal changes", "de": "Skelettveränderungen"}, {"en": "occur", "de": "kommt es"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "chronic renal insufficiency", "de": "chronischer Niereninsuffizienz"}]

The aim of this study was comprehensively to record bone volume changes in the spine, from C2 to L5, after a long history of hemodialysis.
Das Ziel der vorliegenden Untersuchungen war es, die Knochenmasseveränderungen der Wirbelsäule bei langjähriger Hämodialyse von C2 - L5 komplett zu erfassen.
[{"en": "study", "de": "Untersuchungen"}, {"en": "bone volume changes", "de": "Knochenmasseveränderungen"}, {"en": "spine", "de": "Wirbelsäule"}, {"en": "hemodialysis", "de": "Hämodialyse"}]
[{"en": "The aim", "de": "Das Ziel"}, {"en": "this study", "de": "der vorliegenden Untersuchungen"}, {"en": "comprehensively", "de": "komplett"}, {"en": "record", "de": "erfassen"}, {"en": "bone volume changes", "de": "Knochenmasseveränderungen"}, {"en": "the spine", "de": "der Wirbelsäule"}, {"en": "after", "de": "bei"}, {"en": "long history", "de": "langjähriger"}, {"en": "hemodialysis", "de": "Hämodialyse"}]

The spinal columns of nine autopsy cases who had undergone 4 to 15 years of dialysis were thoroughly examined.
Von 9 Autopsiefällen mit einer Dialysedauer von 4 bis 15 Jahren wurden Wirbelsäulen komplett untersucht.
[{"en": "spinal columns", "de": "Wirbelsäulen"}, {"en": "autopsy cases", "de": "Autopsiefällen"}, {"en": "dialysis", "de": "Dialysedauer"}]
[{"en": "The spinal columns", "de": "Wirbelsäulen"}, {"en": "nine", "de": "9"}, {"en": "autopsy cases", "de": "Autopsiefällen"}, {"en": "4 to 15 years", "de": "4 bis 15 Jahren"}, {"en": "dialysis", "de": "Dialysedauer"}, {"en": "thoroughly examined", "de": "komplett untersucht"}]

A newly developed preparation technique enables a combined two- and three-dimensional analysis to be made, so that in addition to the histologic image, the directly underlying three-dimensional structure can be analyzed.
Mit einer neu entwickelten Präparationstechnik ist die kombinierte zwei- und dreidimensionale Analyse möglich, so daß neben dem histologischen Bild unmittelbar die zugrunde liegende dreidimensionale Struktur analysiert werden kann.
[{"en": "preparation technique", "de": "Präparationstechnik"}, {"en": "two- and three-dimensional analysis", "de": "zwei- und dreidimensionale Analyse"}, {"en": "three-dimensional structure", "de": "dreidimensionale Struktur"}]
[{"en": "newly developed", "de": "neu entwickelten"}, {"en": "preparation technique", "de": "Präparationstechnik"}, {"en": "combined", "de": "kombinierte"}, {"en": "two- and three-dimensional", "de": "zwei- und dreidimensionale"}, {"en": "analysis", "de": "Analyse"}, {"en": "to be made", "de": "möglich"}, {"en": "so that", "de": "so daß"}, {"en": "in addition to", "de": "neben"}, {"en": "histologic image", "de": "histologischen Bild"}, {"en": "directly underlying", "de": "unmittelbar die zugrunde liegende"}, {"en": "three-dimensional structure", "de": "dreidimensionale Struktur"}, {"en": "can be analyzed", "de": "analysiert werden kann"}]

The spine deformity index (SDI), the bone volume (BV/TV), and the trabecular interconnection (TBPf) was quantitatively evaluated.
Quantitativ ausgewertet wurden die Wirbelkörperhöhen (SDI), das Knochenvolumen (BV/TV) und die intertrabekuläre Verknüpfung (TBPf).
[{"en": "spine deformity index", "de": "Wirbelkörperhöhen"}, {"en": "SDI", "de": "SDI"}, {"en": "bone volume", "de": "Knochenvolumen"}, {"en": "BV/TV", "de": "BV/TV"}, {"en": "trabecular interconnection", "de": "intertrabekuläre Verknüpfung"}, {"en": "TBPf", "de": "TBPf"}]
[{"en": "The spine deformity index", "de": "die Wirbelkörperhöhen"}, {"en": "SDI", "de": "SDI"}, {"en": "the bone volume", "de": "das Knochenvolumen"}, {"en": "BV/TV", "de": "BV/TV"}, {"en": "the trabecular interconnection", "de": "die intertrabekuläre Verknüpfung"}, {"en": "TBPf", "de": "TBPf"}, {"en": "quantitatively evaluated", "de": "Quantitativ ausgewertet"}]

The SDI shows vertebral fractures in renal osteodystrophy (ROD) types I and II in spite of a trabecular bone volume within normal limits.
Der "spine deformity index" (SDI) zeigt Wirbelkörperfrakturen bei den Typen I und II der renalen Osteopathie (ROP), trotz eines trabekulären Knochenvolumens (BV/TV) im Normalbereich.
[{"en": "SDI", "de": "spine deformity index (SDI)"}, {"en": "vertebral fractures", "de": "Wirbelkörperfrakturen"}, {"en": "renal osteodystrophy", "de": "renalen Osteopathie"}, {"en": "trabecular bone volume", "de": "trabekulären Knochenvolumens"}]
[{"en": "The SDI", "de": "Der \"spine deformity index\" (SDI)"}, {"en": "vertebral fractures", "de": "Wirbelkörperfrakturen"}, {"en": "renal osteodystrophy", "de": "renalen Osteopathie"}, {"en": "types I and II", "de": "Typen I und II"}, {"en": "trabecular bone volume", "de": "trabekulären Knochenvolumens"}, {"en": "within normal limits", "de": "im Normalbereich"}]

The trabecular bone volume shows a distribution throughout the spinal column familiar from the skeletally intact control group.
BV/TV zeigt eine aus dem skelettgesunden Kontrollkollektiv bekannte Verteilung über die Wirbelsäule.
[{"en": "trabecular bone volume", "de": "BV/TV"}, {"en": "spinal column", "de": "Wirbelsäule"}, {"en": "skeletally intact control group", "de": "skelettgesunden Kontrollkollektiv"}]
[{"en": "distribution", "de": "Verteilung"}, {"en": "throughout", "de": "über"}, {"en": "spinal column", "de": "Wirbelsäule"}, {"en": "familiar", "de": "bekannte"}, {"en": "control group", "de": "Kontrollkollektiv"}]

The plateaulike curve line, decreasing from the cervical spine to the lumbar spine is, however, 5% lower in ROD.
Der von der HWS zur LWS abnehmende plateauartige Kurvenverlauf liegt jedoch bei den ROP um 5% niedriger.
[{"en": "plateaulike curve line", "de": "plateauartige Kurvenverlauf"}, {"en": "cervical spine", "de": "HWS"}, {"en": "lumbar spine", "de": "LWS"}, {"en": "ROD", "de": "ROP"}]
[{"en": "The", "de": "Der"}, {"en": "curve line", "de": "Kurvenverlauf"}, {"en": "decreasing", "de": "abnehmende"}, {"en": "cervical spine", "de": "HWS"}, {"en": "lumbar spine", "de": "LWS"}, {"en": "however", "de": "jedoch"}, {"en": "5% lower", "de": "5% niedriger"}]

BV/TV values of 51.2% and 74.1% in the 2nd lumbar vertebra are clearly lower than in the corresponding iliac crest biopsy.
Das BV/TV des 2. LWK beträgt zwischen 51,2% und 74,1% des in der korrespondierenden Beckenkammbiopsie gemessenen Wertes.
[{"en": "BV/TV values", "de": "Das BV/TV"}, {"en": "2nd lumbar vertebra", "de": "2. LWK"}, {"en": "iliac crest biopsy", "de": "Beckenkammbiopsie"}]
[{"en": "BV/TV", "de": "BV/TV"}, {"en": "values", "de": "Wertes"}, {"en": "51.2%", "de": "51,2%"}, {"en": "74.1%", "de": "74,1%"}, {"en": "2nd lumbar vertebra", "de": "2. LWK"}, {"en": "corresponding", "de": "korrespondierenden"}, {"en": "iliac crest biopsy", "de": "Beckenkammbiopsie"}]

Cases with a longer history of hemodialysis show higher BV/TV values irrespective of age and sex.
Die Fälle mit längerer Hämodialyse weisen unabhängig von Lebensalter und Geschlecht höhere BV/TV-Werte auf.
[{"en": "hemodialysis", "de": "Hämodialyse"}, {"en": "age", "de": "Lebensalter"}, {"en": "sex", "de": "Geschlecht"}, {"en": "BV/TV values", "de": "BV/TV-Werte"}]
[{"en": "Cases", "de": "Die Fälle"}, {"en": "longer history", "de": "längerer"}, {"en": "hemodialysis", "de": "Hämodialyse"}, {"en": "higher", "de": "höhere"}, {"en": "values", "de": "Werte"}, {"en": "irrespective", "de": "unabhängig"}, {"en": "age", "de": "Lebensalter"}, {"en": "sex", "de": "Geschlecht"}]

Normal BV/TV does not mean physiological linking.
Normales BV/TV ist nicht gleichbedeutend mit physiologischer Vernetzung der Spongiasa und funktioneller Statik.
[{"en": "Normal BV/TV", "de": "Normales BV/TV"}, {"en": "physiological linking", "de": "physiologischer Vernetzung"}]
[{"en": "Normal", "de": "Normales"}, {"en": "BV/TV", "de": "BV/TV"}, {"en": "does not mean", "de": "ist nicht gleichbedeutend"}, {"en": "physiological", "de": "physiologischer"}]

Three-dimensional analysis in ROD shows, in comparison to the controls, a much stronger restructuring of the architecture than can be assumed from the two-dimensional histological sections.
Die dreidimensionale Analyse bei ROP ergibt im Vergleich zu den Kontrollen eine sehr viel stärkere Umstrukturierung der Architektur als dies auf den 2-D-Schnittebenen und den trabekulären Knochenvolumina abgeleitet werden kann.
[{"en": "Three-dimensional analysis", "de": "dreidimensionale Analyse"}, {"en": "ROD", "de": "ROP"}, {"en": "controls", "de": "Kontrollen"}, {"en": "two-dimensional histological sections", "de": "2-D-Schnittebenen"}, {"en": "architecture", "de": "Architektur"}]
[{"en": "Three-dimensional analysis", "de": "Die dreidimensionale Analyse"}, {"en": "comparison", "de": "Vergleich"}, {"en": "controls", "de": "Kontrollen"}, {"en": "stronger", "de": "stärkere"}, {"en": "restructuring", "de": "Umstrukturierung"}, {"en": "architecture", "de": "Architektur"}, {"en": "two-dimensional", "de": "2-D"}, {"en": "histological sections", "de": "Schnittebenen"}]

These findings thus indicate the relevance of an effective prophylaxis to preserve an ordered and functional spongiosa architecture.
Die Befunde unterstreichen die Bedeutung einer wirkungsvollen Prophylaxe zum Erhalt einer geordneten und somit funktionsfähigen Spongiosaarchitektur bei Patienten unter chronischer Hämodialyse.
[{"en": "effective prophylaxis", "de": "wirkungsvollen Prophylaxe"}, {"en": "ordered and functional spongiosa architecture", "de": "geordneten und somit funktionsfähigen Spongiosaarchitektur"}]
[{"en": "These findings", "de": "Die Befunde"}, {"en": "indicate", "de": "unterstreichen"}, {"en": "the relevance", "de": "die Bedeutung"}, {"en": "effective prophylaxis", "de": "wirkungsvollen Prophylaxe"}, {"en": "preserve", "de": "zum Erhalt"}, {"en": "ordered", "de": "geordneten"}, {"en": "functional", "de": "funktionsfähigen"}, {"en": "spongiosa architecture", "de": "Spongiosaarchitektur"}]

This hernia varied from the known forms of hernias in its clinical course and in the postmortem examination results performed by Littrè himself.
Im Jahre 1700 beschrieb erstmals der französische Chirurg Alexandre de Littré eine Form der Leistenhernie, die durch ihren Krankheitsverlauf sowie dem von Littré selbst erhobenen Sektionsbefund nicht dem bisher Bekannten entsprach.
[{"en": "hernia", "de": "Leistenhernie"}, {"en": "clinical course", "de": "Krankheitsverlauf"}, {"en": "postmortem examination", "de": "Sektionsbefund"}]
[{"en": "This hernia", "de": "eine Form der Leistenhernie"}, {"en": "clinical course", "de": "Krankheitsverlauf"}, {"en": "postmortem examination", "de": "Sektionsbefund"}, {"en": "Littrè", "de": "Littré"}, {"en": "results", "de": "erhobenen"}, {"en": "performed", "de": "beschrieb"}]

The underlying pathomechanism was explained 100 years later by Meckel.
100 Jahre später lieferte Meckel die pathogenetische Erklärung für diese Aussackung der Darmwand.
[{"en": "pathomechanism", "de": "pathogenetisch"}, {"en": "Meckel", "de": "Meckel"}]
[{"en": "100 years later", "de": "100 Jahre später"}, {"en": "Meckel", "de": "Meckel"}, {"en": "pathomechanism", "de": "pathogenetische"}, {"en": "explained", "de": "Erklärung"}]

In a scientific paper about hernias some years earlier, Richter described the intestinal wall hernia, and this initiated the confusing use of the clinical entity known as the Richter-Littré hernia in Germany.
Kurz zuvor beschrieb Richter in einer wissenschaftlichen Schrift über "Brüche" den Darmwandbruch und lieferte damit wahrscheinlich den Ausgangspunkt für den irreführenden Gebrauch der klinischen Entität der "Richter-Littré-Hernie" im deutschsprachigen Raum.
[{"en": "hernias", "de": "Brüche"}, {"en": "intestinal wall hernia", "de": "Darmwandbruch"}, {"en": "Richter-Littré hernia", "de": "Richter-Littré-Hernie"}]
[{"en": "In a scientific paper", "de": "in einer wissenschaftlichen Schrift"}, {"en": "about hernias", "de": "über \"Brüche\""}, {"en": "Richter", "de": "Richter"}, {"en": "intestinal wall hernia", "de": "Darmwandbruch"}, {"en": "initiated", "de": "lieferte"}, {"en": "confusing use", "de": "irreführenden Gebrauch"}, {"en": "clinical entity", "de": "klinischen Entität"}, {"en": "Richter-Littré hernia", "de": "Richter-Littré-Hernie"}, {"en": "Germany", "de": "deutschsprachigen Raum"}]

In this case report we describe the historic development of this entity.
Anhand eines Fallberichtes erfolgt die geschichtliche Aufarbeitung dieser Hernienform.

Asperger syndrome is an autistic disorder and was first described by Hans Asperger in 1944 without further acceptance in the literature over almost four decades.
Das Asperger-Syndrom ist eine autistische Störung, deren Erstbeschreibung 1944 durch Hans Asperger erfolgte, aber in den folgenden Jahrzehnten wenig Beachtung fand.
[{"en": "Asperger syndrome", "de": "Asperger-Syndrom"}, {"en": "autistic disorder", "de": "autistische Störung"}, {"en": "Hans Asperger", "de": "Hans Asperger"}, {"en": "1944", "de": "1944"}]
[{"en": "Asperger syndrome", "de": "Asperger-Syndrom"}, {"en": "autistic disorder", "de": "autistische Störung"}, {"en": "first described", "de": "Erstbeschreibung"}, {"en": "Hans Asperger", "de": "Hans Asperger"}, {"en": "1944", "de": "1944"}, {"en": "without further acceptance", "de": "wenig Beachtung fand"}, {"en": "literature", "de": "folgenden Jahrzehnten"}]

Following several publications in the 1980s, for the disorder became more widely known and was first introduced into ICD-10 and DSM-IV as a new diagnosis in 1988 and 1994, respectively.
Erst in den 80er Jahren erhielt das Krankheitsbild zunehmende Beachtung und wurde erst 1988 als Diagnose in die ICD-10 und 1994 in das DSM-IV aufgenommen.
[{"en": "disorder", "de": "Beachtung"}, {"en": "ICD-10", "de": "ICD-10"}, {"en": "DSM-IV", "de": "DSM-IV"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Diagnose"}]

The etiology is unknown.
Die Ursache der Störung ist ungeklärt.

We present a female patient with typical features of Asperger syndrome, suffering also from epilepsy and internal medical disorders.

The use of pulse oximetry during pre-hospital cardiopulmonary resuscitation was prospectively investigated in 23 cases.
Die Anwendung der Pulsoximetrie im Rahmen der kardiopulmonalen Reanimation wurde unter 23 präklinischen Reanimationen prospektiv untersucht.
[{"en": "pulse oximetry", "de": "Pulsoximetrie"}, {"en": "pre-hospital cardiopulmonary resuscitation", "de": "präklinischen Reanimation"}]
[{"en": "The use", "de": "Die Anwendung"}, {"en": "pulse oximetry", "de": "Pulsoximetrie"}, {"en": "during", "de": "im Rahmen der"}, {"en": "cardiopulmonary resuscitation", "de": "kardiopulmonalen Reanimation"}, {"en": "prospectively investigated", "de": "prospektiv untersucht"}, {"en": "23 cases", "de": "23 präklinischen Reanimationen"}]

The question was whether the measurement of oxygen saturation during pre-clinical resuscitation is useful and what conclusions are possible.
Es wurde den Fragen nachgegangen, welche Rückschlüsse die unter der Reanimation gewonnenen O2-Sättigungswerte zulassen und welche Konsequenzen sich aus diesen Erkenntnissen ergeben.
[{"en": "oxygen saturation", "de": "O2-Sättigungswerte"}, {"en": "resuscitation", "de": "Reanimation"}]
[{"en": "The question", "de": "Es wurde den Fragen"}, {"en": "oxygen saturation", "de": "O2-Sättigungswerte"}, {"en": "pre-clinical resuscitation", "de": "unter der Reanimation"},{"en": "conclusions", "de": "Rückschlüsse"}]

We were able to obtain confidential data for oxygen saturation in 82.6% (n = 19) of cases.
Die Untersuchung zeigt, daß die Pulsoximetrie zur Qualitätskontrolle der durchgeführten Wiederbelebungsmaßnahmen in einem hohen Prozentsatz geeignet erscheint.
[{"en": "oxygen saturation", "de": "Pulsoximetrie"}, {"en": "cases", "de": "Prozentsatz"}]
[{"en": "We were able to obtain", "de": "Die Untersuchung zeigt"}, {"en": "confidential data", "de": "Qualitätskontrolle"}, {"en": "oxygen saturation", "de": "Pulsoximetrie"}, {"en": "cases", "de": "Prozentsatz"}]

It is a useful part of pre-hospital monitoring and should be used during resuscitation as early as possible.

Intensive epidemiologic and pathophysiologic research during the past 30 years successfully contributed to a better understanding of the etiology and pathogenesis of cot death (Sudden Infant Death, SID).
Intensive epidemiologische und pathophysiologische Forschungen der letzten 30 Jahre konnten erfolgreich zum besseren Verständnis der Ätiologie und Pathogenese des plötzlichen Säuglingstods (sudden infant death, SID) beitragen.

We attempted to further characterize the non-responder population in a retrospective study.

[{"en": "retrospective study", "de": "retrospektiven Studie"}]

Two closely matched groups of responders (n=20) and non-responders (n=20) were compared.
Keine signifikanten Unterschiede wurden zwischen beiden Gruppen hinsichtlich folgender Parameter beobachtet:
[{"en": "responders", "de": "beiden Gruppen"}, {"en": "non-responders", "de": "beiden Gruppen"}]
[{"en": "Two", "de": "beiden"}, {"en": "groups", "de": "Gruppen"}, {"en": "responders", "de": "Parameter"}, {"en": "non-responders", "de": "Parameter"}, {"en": "compared", "de": "beobachtet"}]

No significant differences were observed between both groups with respect to the following parameters:
Hauttyp, minimale Erythemdosis, Einzeldosen und kumulative Dosen von UVA1, Eosinophile im peripheren Blut.
[{"en": "No significant differences", "de": "Hauttyp"}, {"en": "both groups", "de": "minimale Erythemdosis"}, {"en": "following parameters", "de": "Einzeldosen und kumulative Dosen von UVA1, Eosinophile im peripheren Blut"}]
[{"en": "No significant differences", "de": "Hauttyp"}, {"en": "were observed", "de": "Erythemdosis"}, {"en": "between both groups", "de": "Einzeldosen"}, {"en": "with respect to", "de": "kumulative Dosen"}, {"en": "the following parameters", "de": "Eosinophile im peripheren Blut"}]

skin type, minimal erythema dose, single and cumulative doses of UVA1, and peripheral blood eosinophils.
Hingegen zeigte sich, daß die Non-Responder gegenüber den Respondern einen signifikant erhöhten Atopie-Score, erhöhte Titer von Gesamt-IgE und von spezifischem IgE aufweisen.
[{"en": "skin type", "de": "Atopie-Score"}, {"en": "minimal erythema dose", "de": "erhöhte Titer"}, {"en": "single and cumulative doses of UVA1", "de": "Gesamt-IgE"}, {"en": "peripheral blood eosinophils", "de": "spezifischem IgE"}]
[{"en": "No significant differences", "de": "Hauttyp"}, {"en": "were observed", "de": "Erythemdosis"}, {"en": "between both groups", "de": "Einzeldosen"}, {"en": "with respect to", "de": "kumulative Dosen"}, {"en": "the following parameters", "de": "Eosinophile im peripheren Blut"}]

However, non-responders were characterized by a highly elevated atopic score, and by high levels of total IgE and of specific IgE.
Außerdem wurde bei den Non-Respondern vergleichsweise häufiger eine starke Keimbesiedelung der Haut mit Staphylococcus aureus und des Darmes mit Candida albicans festgestellt.
[{"en": "non-responders", "de": "Non-Respondern"}, {"en": "atopic score", "de": "Keimbesiedelung der Haut"}, {"en": "total IgE", "de": "Staphylococcus aureus"}, {"en": "specific IgE", "de": "Candida albicans"}]
[{"en": "However", "de": "Außerdem"}, {"en": "non-responders", "de": "Non-Respondern"}, {"en": "high levels", "de": "starke"}]

Furthermore, colonization of the skin with Staphylococcus aureus occured at higher densities, and intestinal growth of Candida albicans was more frequently observed.
Diese Befunde zeigen, daß die high-dose UVA-1-Therapie nicht bei allen Patienten mit atopischer Dermatitis wirksam ist.
[{"en": "colonization", "de": "high-dose UVA-1-Therapie"}, {"en": "skin", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "Staphylococcus aureus", "de": "atopischer Dermatitis"}, {"en": "intestinal growth", "de": "wirksam"}, {"en": "Candida albicans", "de": "Diese Befunde"}]
[{"en": "Furthermore", "de": "Diese"}, {"en": "colonization", "de": "Befunde"}, {"en": "skin", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "Staphylococcus aureus", "de": "atopischer Dermatitis"}, {"en": "higher densities", "de": "wirksam"}, {"en": "intestinal growth", "de": "Therapie"}, {"en": "Candida albicans", "de": "UVA-1"}, {"en": "more frequently observed", "de": "nicht bei allen"}]

These data indicate that high-dose UVA1 irradiation is not effective in all patients suffering from atopic dermatitis.
Non-Responder sind einerseits durch ein besonders schweres Atopiesyndrom und andererseits durch komplizierende Superinfektionen charakterisiert.
[{"en": "high-dose UVA1 irradiation", "de": "Non-Responder"}, {"en": "atopic dermatitis", "de": "Atopiesyndrom"}]
[{"en": "data", "de": "Non-Responder"}, {"en": "indicate", "de": "sind"}, {"en": "high-dose", "de": "besonders"}, {"en": "UVA1 irradiation", "de": "Atopiesyndrom"}, {"en": "not effective", "de": "komplizierende"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Superinfektionen"}, {"en": "suffering from", "de": "charakterisiert"}, {"en": "atopic dermatitis", "de": "Atopiesyndrom"}]

We conclude that non-responders with complicating infections might benefit from the combination of high-dose UVA1 therapy and antibiotic or antimycotic treatment.
Der letztgenannte Befund weist darauf hin, daß für diese Patienten eine Kombination der hochdosierten UVA-1-Therapie mit einer antibiotischen oder antimykotischen Behandlung von Nutzen sein könnte.
[{"en": "high-dose UVA1 therapy", "de": "hochdosierten UVA-1-Therapie"}, {"en": "antibiotic", "de": "antibiotischen"}, {"en": "antimycotic treatment", "de": "antimykotischen Behandlung"}]
[{"en": "We conclude", "de": "Der letztgenannte Befund weist darauf hin"}, {"en": "non-responders", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "combination", "de": "Kombination"}, {"en": "high-dose UVA1 therapy", "de": "hochdosierten UVA-1-Therapie"}, {"en": "antibiotic", "de": "antibiotischen"}, {"en": "antimycotic treatment", "de": "antimykotischen Behandlung"}, {"en": "benefit", "de": "Nutzen"}]

Lupus panniculitis is a rare variant of cutaneous lupus erythematosus.
Der Lupus erythematodes profundus stellt eine seltene Variante des Lupus erythematodes dar.
[{"en": "Lupus panniculitis", "de": "Lupus erythematodes profundus"}, {"en": "cutaneous lupus erythematosus", "de": "Lupus erythematodes"}]
[{"en": "Lupus", "de": "Lupus"}, {"en": "rare", "de": "seltene"}, {"en": "variant", "de": "Variante"}, {"en": "cutaneous lupus erythematosus", "de": "Lupus erythematodes"}]

Two typical cases demonstrate the association of lupus panniculitis with signs of discoid lupus erythematosus and systemic lupus erythematosus.
Anhand von zwei typischen Fallbeispielen wird die Assoziation des Lupus erythematodes profundus mit Merkmalen des diskoiden Lupus erythematodes sowie des systemischen Lupus erythematodes aufgezeigt.
[{"en": "lupus panniculitis", "de": "Lupus erythematodes profundus"}, {"en": "discoid lupus erythematosus", "de": "diskoiden Lupus erythematodes"}, {"en": "systemic lupus erythematosus", "de": "systemischen Lupus erythematodes"}]
[{"en": "Two", "de": "zwei"}, {"en": "typical cases", "de": "typischen Fallbeispielen"}, {"en": "demonstrate", "de": "aufgezeigt"}, {"en": "association", "de": "Assoziation"}, {"en": "lupus panniculitis", "de": "Lupus erythematodes profundus"}, {"en": "signs", "de": "Merkmalen"}, {"en": "discoid lupus erythematosus", "de": "diskoiden Lupus erythematodes"}, {"en": "systemic lupus erythematosus", "de": "systemischen Lupus erythematodes"}]

Clinically it is characterised by subcutaneous nodules or plaques, which may ulcerate leaving depressed atrophic scars.
Klinisch liegen subkutane knotige und plattenartige Infiltrate vor, welche zu Ulzerationen und narbigen Einziehungen führen können.
[{"en": "subcutaneous nodules", "de": "subkutane knotige"}, {"en": "plaques", "de": "plattenartige Infiltrate"}, {"en": "ulcerate", "de": "Ulzerationen"}, {"en": "depressed atrophic scars", "de": "narbigen Einziehungen"}]
[{"en": "Clinically", "de": "Klinisch"},{"en": "subcutaneous", "de": "subkutane"}, {"en": "nodules", "de": "knotige"}, {"en": "plaques", "de": "plattenartige"}, {"en": "ulcerate", "de": "Ulzerationen"}, {"en": "scars", "de": "narbigen"}]

Histologically the lesions show lobular panniculitis.
Histologisch findet sich eine lobuläre Pannikulitis.
[{"en": "Histologically", "de": "Histologisch"}, {"en": "lobular panniculitis", "de": "lobuläre Pannikulitis"}]
[{"en": "Histologically", "de": "Histologisch"}, {"en": "lobular panniculitis", "de": "lobuläre Pannikulitis"}]

A positive immunofluorescent band test with deposition of IgG, IgM and C3 at the dermal-epidermal junction and blood vessel walls helps to confirm the diagnosis.
Als weiterer diagnostischer Hinweis gilt auch eine positive direkte Immunfluoreszenzuntersuchung (Lupusbandtest) mit Ablagerungen von IgG, IgM und Komplementbestandteilen an der dermo-epidermalen Grenze und den Gefäßen.
[{"en": "positive immunofluorescent band test", "de": "positive direkte Immunfluoreszenzuntersuchung (Lupusbandtest)"}, {"en": "deposition of IgG, IgM and C3", "de": "Ablagerungen von IgG, IgM und Komplementbestandteilen"}, {"en": "dermal-epidermal junction", "de": "dermo-epidermalen Grenze"}, {"en": "blood vessel walls", "de": "den Gefäßen"}]
[{"en": "A positive", "de": "eine positive"}, {"en": "immunofluorescent band test", "de": "direkte Immunfluoreszenzuntersuchung (Lupusbandtest)"}, {"en": "deposition", "de": "Ablagerungen"}, {"en": "IgG, IgM", "de": "IgG, IgM"}, {"en": "C3", "de": "Komplementbestandteilen"}, {"en": "dermal-epidermal junction", "de": "dermo-epidermalen Grenze"}, {"en": "blood vessel walls", "de": "den Gefäßen"}]

The knowledge of the clinical features and histopathology of the disease is important because lupus panniculitis may precede systemic lupus erythematosus by some years.
Die Kenntnis des klinischen Bildes und der Histopathologie sind von besonderer Bedeutung, da der Lupus erythematodes profundus dem systemischen Lupus erythematodes um Jahre vorausgehen kann.
[{"en": "clinical features", "de": "klinischen Bildes"}, {"en": "histopathology", "de": "Histopathologie"}, {"en": "lupus panniculitis", "de": "Lupus erythematodes profundus"}, {"en": "systemic lupus erythematosus", "de": "systemischen Lupus erythematodes"}]
[{"en": "The knowledge", "de": "Die Kenntnis"}, {"en": "clinical features", "de": "klinischen Bildes"}, {"en": "histopathology", "de": "Histopathologie"}, {"en": "important", "de": "von besonderer Bedeutung"}, {"en": "lupus panniculitis", "de": "Lupus erythematodes profundus"}, {"en": "precede", "de": "vorausgehen"}, {"en": "systemic lupus erythematosus", "de": "systemischen Lupus erythematodes"}, {"en": "years", "de": "Jahre"}]

Clinical and morphological findings recorded in an 81-year-old woman patient with a 45-year history of rheumatoid arthritis treated with long-term chloroquine therapy are reported.
Berichtet wird über klinische und morphologische Befunde bei einer 81 jährigen Patientin mit langjähriger Chloroquin-Behandlung wegen einer über 45 Jahre bestehenden rheumatoiden Arthritis.
[{"en": "Clinical and morphological findings", "de": "klinische und morphologische Befunde"}, {"en": "rheumatoid arthritis", "de": "rheumatoiden Arthritis"}, {"en": "long-term chloroquine therapy", "de": "langjähriger Chloroquin-Behandlung"}]
[{"en": "Clinical", "de": "klinische"}, {"en": "morphological", "de": "morphologische"}, {"en": "findings", "de": "Befunde"}, {"en": "81-year-old", "de": "81 jährigen"}, {"en": "woman patient", "de": "Patientin"}, {"en": "rheumatoid arthritis", "de": "rheumatoiden Arthritis"}, {"en": "long-term", "de": "langjähriger"}, {"en": "chloroquine therapy", "de": "Chloroquin-Behandlung"}, {"en": "45-year history", "de": "über 45 Jahre bestehenden"}]

The cause of death was low cardiac output syndrome, which upon autopsy and postmortem toxicological analyses was classified as vacuolar chloroquine-induced cardiomyopathy.
Die Patientin verstarb unter den klinischen Zeichen eines kardialen Low-output-Syndroms infolge einer autoptisch und durch toxikologische Analysen gesicherten vakuolären Chloroquin-induzierten Kardiomyopathie.
[{"en": "low cardiac output syndrome", "de": "kardialen Low-output-Syndroms"}, {"en": "autopsy", "de": "autoptisch"}, {"en": "postmortem toxicological analyses", "de": "toxikologische Analysen"}, {"en": "vacuolar chloroquine-induced cardiomyopathy", "de": "vakuolären Chloroquin-induzierten Kardiomyopathie"}]
[{"en": "The cause of death", "de": "verstarb unter den klinischen Zeichen "}, {"en": "low cardiac output syndrome", "de": "kardialen Low-output-Syndroms"}, {"en": "autopsy", "de": "autoptisch"}, {"en": "postmortem toxicological analyses", "de": "durch toxikologische Analysen"}, {"en": "vacuolar chloroquine-induced cardiomyopathy", "de": "vakuolären Chloroquin-induzierten Kardiomyopathie"}]

The pathogenesis and the morphological and clinical characteristics of cardiotoxic effects of chloroquine are reviewed.
Die Pathogenese sowie die morphologischen und klinischen Charakteristika kardiotoxischer Chloroquin-Effekte werden vorgestellt.
[{"en": "pathogenesis", "de": "Pathogenese"}, {"en": "morphological", "de": "morphologischen"}, {"en": "clinical characteristics", "de": "klinischen Charakteristika"}, {"en": "cardiotoxic effects", "de": "kardiotoxischer"}, {"en": "chloroquine", "de": "Chloroquin"}]

Over the past 5-7 years, there has been a renewed research interest into the mechanism as well as the development of newer "emerging" treatment modalities for atrial fibrillation.
In den letzten 5-7 Jahren gab es ein intensives Forschungsinteresse bezüglich der Mechanismen der Entstehung von Vorhofflimmern und der Entwicklung neuer Behandlungsmöglichkeiten dieser Arrhythmie.
[{"en": "research interest", "de": "Forschungsinteresse"}, {"en": "mechanism", "de": "Mechanismen"}, {"en": "treatment modalities", "de": "Behandlungsmöglichkeiten"}, {"en": "atrial fibrillation", "de": "Vorhofflimmern"}]

One of these novel therapies is the implantable atrial defibrillator.
Eines dieser neuen Therapieverfahren stellt der implantierbare Vorhofdefibrillator dar.
[{"en": "implantable atrial defibrillator", "de": "implantierbare Vorhofdefibrillator"}]
[{"en": "One", "de": "Eines"}, {"en": "these", "de": "dieser"}, {"en": "novel therapies", "de": "neuen Therapieverfahren"}, {"en": "implantable", "de": "implantierbare"}, {"en": "atrial defibrillator", "de": "Vorhofdefibrillator"}]

In this article we will review the basic and clinical research which has been used in the development of electrode systems and shock waveforms utilized by commercially-available implantable atrial cardioversion devices.
In dieser Übersichtsarbeit werden die Ergebnisse von experimentellen und klinischen Studien bezüglich der Entwicklung von optimalen Elektrodenkonfigurationen und Schockimpulsformen zur internen niederenergetischen Vorhofkardioversion zusammengefaßt.
[{"en": "basic and clinical research", "de": "experimentellen und klinischen Studien"}, {"en": "electrode systems", "de": "Elektrodenkonfigurationen"}, {"en": "shock waveforms", "de": "Schockimpulsformen"}, {"en": "implantable atrial cardioversion devices", "de": "internen niederenergetischen Vorhofkardioversion"}]
[{"en": "In this article", "de": "In dieser Übersichtsarbeit"}, {"en": "we will review", "de": "werden die Ergebnisse zusammengefasst"}, {"en": "basic and clinical research", "de": "experimentellen und klinischen Studien"}, {"en": "development", "de": "Entwicklung"}, {"en": "electrode systems", "de": "Elektrodenkonfigurationen"}, {"en": "shock waveforms", "de": "Schockimpulsformen"}]

As a consequence of scientific advances, an increasing number of patients with advanced age, reduced myocardial performance, previous cardiac surgery, comorbidities, and emergency indications are referred for cardiac surgery.
Als Folge des wissenschaftlichen Fortschritts in der Medizin werden immer mehr Patienten mit Vorerkrankungen, in hohem Lebensalter, mit eingeschr‰nkter kardialer Pumpfunktion, nach vorangegangenen Herzoperationen sowie unter Notfallbedingungen operiert.
[{"en": "scientific advances", "de": "wissenschaftlichen Fortschritts"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "advanced age", "de": "hohem Lebensalter"}, {"en": "reduced myocardial performance", "de": "eingeschr‰nkter kardialer Pumpfunktion"}, {"en": "previous cardiac surgery", "de": "vorangegangenen Herzoperationen"}, {"en": "comorbidities", "de": "Vorerkrankungen"}, {"en": "emergency indications", "de": "Notfallbedingungen"}, {"en": "cardiac surgery", "de": "Herzoperationen"}]
[{"en": "As a consequence", "de": "Als Folge"}, {"en": "scientific advances", "de": "wissenschaftlichen Fortschritts"}, {"en": "an increasing number", "de": "immer mehr"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "advanced age", "de": "hohem Lebensalter"}, {"en": "reduced myocardial performance", "de": "eingeschr‰nkter kardialer Pumpfunktion"}, {"en": "previous cardiac surgery", "de": "vorangegangenen Herzoperationen"}, {"en": "comorbidities", "de": "Vorerkrankungen"}, {"en": "emergency indications", "de": "Notfallbedingungen"}, {"en": "referred for", "de": "operiert"}]

This requires risk stratification to predict "low", "moderate", and "high" operative risk.
Dieses erfordert eine Risikostratifizierung, mit denen sich das Operationsrisiko in "niedrig", "mittel" und "hoch" einteilen l‰ﬂt.
[{"en": "risk stratification", "de": "Risikostratifizierung"}, {"en": "moderate", "de": "mittel"}, {"en": "high", "de": "hoch"}, {"en": "operative risk", "de": "Operationsrisiko"}]
[{"en": "This", "de": "Dieses"}, {"en": "requires", "de": "erfordert"}, {"en": "risk stratification", "de": "Risikostratifizierung"}, {"en": "predict", "de": "einteilen"}, {"en": "low", "de": "niedrig"}, {"en": "moderate", "de": "mittel"}, {"en": "high", "de": "hoch"}, {"en": "operative risk", "de": "Operationsrisiko"}]

Risk factors can be divided into pre-, intra-, and postoperative patient-, structure-, and procedure-related.
Es lassen sich pr‰-, intra- und postoperative patienten-, struktur- und behandlungsbezogene Faktoren unterscheiden.
[{"en": "Risk factors", "de": "Faktoren"}, {"en": "pre-, intra-, and postoperative", "de": "prä-, intra- und postoperative"}, {"en": "patient-, structure-, and procedure-related", "de": "patienten-, struktur- und behandlungsbezogene"}]
[{"en": "Risk factors", "de": "Faktoren"}, {"en": "can be divided", "de": "lassen sich"}, {"en": "pre-, intra-, and postoperative", "de": "prä-, intra- und postoperative"}, {"en": "patient-, structure-, and procedure-related", "de": "patienten-, struktur- und behandlungsbezogene"}]

On the basis of this risk prediction, the perioperative course can be optimized by an individually tailored multiprofessional and interdisciplinary management.
Auf der Grundlage dieser Vorhersage l‰ﬂt sich durch individuell maﬂgeschneidertes, pr‰-, intra- und postoperatives, multiprofessionell und interdisziplin‰r organisiertes Management der perioperative Verlauf optimieren.
[{"en": "perioperative course", "de": "perioperative Verlauf"}, {"en": "multiprofessional", "de": "multiprofessionell"}, {"en": "interdisciplinary management", "de": "interdisziplin‰r organisiertes Management"}]
[{"en": "On the basis of", "de": "Auf der Grundlage"}, {"en": "risk prediction", "de": "Vorhersage"}, {"en": "perioperative course", "de": "perioperative Verlauf"}, {"en": "optimized", "de": "optimieren"}, {"en": "individually tailored", "de": "individuell maﬂgeschneidertes"}, {"en": "multiprofessional", "de": "multiprofessionell"}, {"en": "interdisciplinary management", "de": "interdisziplin‰r organisiertes Management"}]

Patients affected show a high frequency of mucocutaneous malignant tumours, especially squamous cell carcinomas and basal cell carcinomas.

We report on a 65-year-old patient who successively developed a total of 15 malignant melanomas, 1 squamous cell carcinoma and 1 lymph node metastasis of a malignant melanoma.

The clinical diagnosis of xeroderma pigmentosum was confirmed by the complementation analysis, which defined our patient as xeroderma pigmentosum of the complementation group D.

Despite a variety of pedicled or free myocutaneous flaps, there are defects in which these reconstructional options may not be indicated.

After wound conditioning with silver-impregnated activated charcoal xerodressing (Actisorb) in combination with a hydroactive polymer dressing (Allevyn), secondary skin grafting was performed.

In this patient fibrosis and calcification of the omentum led to stable abdominal wall coverage even without the application of a synthetic mesh.
Nach sekundärer Meshgraftdeckung führten Fibrosierung und Calcifizierung des Omentums auch ohne Verwendung von Kunststoffnetzen zu einer stabilen Rumpfwand.

The health reform 2000 in Germany has little impact on the structural deficits of the German health service.

Sepsis and its potential degradation into multiple organ failure, reflects a complex immunological process occurring system wide, fueled by local and systemic proinflammatory stimuli, the activity of which is only minimally reflected in the levels of pro- and anti-inflammatory mediators found in the blood.
Die Sepsis und ihre potentielle Degradierung zum Versagen mehrerer Organe stellt einen komplexen immunologischen Prozeß dar, welcher durch lokale und systemische proentzündliche Stimuli beeinflußt, systemweit vorkommt und dessen Aktivität sich nur minimal in den Mengen der im Blut gefundenen pro- und antientzündlichen Vermittler wiederspiegelt.
[{"en": "Sepsis", "de": "Sepsis"}, {"en": "multiple organ failure", "de": "Versagen mehrerer Organe"}, {"en": "complex immunological process", "de": "komplexen immunologischen Prozeß"}, {"en": "proinflammatory stimuli", "de": "proentzündliche Stimuli"}, {"en": "pro- and anti-inflammatory mediators", "de": "pro- und antientzündlichen Vermittler"}]
[{"en": "Sepsis", "de": "Die Sepsis"}, {"en": "potential degradation", "de": "potentielle Degradierung"}, {"en": "multiple organ failure", "de": "Versagen mehrerer Organe"}, {"en": "complex immunological process", "de": "komplexen immunologischen Prozeß"}, {"en": "local and systemic proinflammatory stimuli", "de": "lokale und systemische proentzündliche Stimuli"}, {"en": "activity", "de": "Aktivität"}, {"en": "minimally", "de": "minimal"}, {"en": "levels", "de": "Mengen"}, {"en": "pro- and anti-inflammatory mediators", "de": "pro- und antientzündlichen Vermittler"}, {"en": "found in the blood", "de": "im Blut gefundenen"}]

On a cellular level, sepsis encompasses the up-regulation of both pro- and anti-inflammatory pathways.
Auf der zellulären Ebene schließt die Sepsis die Upregulation von pro- und antientzündlichen Aktivatoren ein.
[{"en": "cellular level", "de": "zellulären Ebene"}, {"en": "sepsis", "de": "Sepsis"}, {"en": "up-regulation", "de": "Upregulation"}, {"en": "pro- and anti-inflammatory pathways", "de": "pro- und antientzündlichen Aktivatoren"}]
[{"en": "On a cellular level", "de": "Auf der zellulären Ebene"}, {"en": "sepsis", "de": "Sepsis"}, {"en": "encompasses", "de": "schließt"}, {"en": "up-regulation", "de": "Upregulation"}, {"en": "both", "de": "von"}, {"en": "pro-", "de": "pro-"}, {"en": "and", "de": "und"}, {"en": "anti-inflammatory", "de": "antientzündlichen"}, {"en": "pathways", "de": "Aktivatoren"}]

Inflammation is augmented through activation of the intracellular promoter protein nuclear factor B (NF-B), which induces synthesis of mRNA coding for many of the pro-inflammatory mediators, including TNF-, IL-8, and inducible nitric oxide synthase.
Die Entzündung wird durch eine Aktivierung des intrazellulären promoter protein nuclear factor B (NF-B) verstärkt, welche die Synthese der mRNA-Kodierung für viele der proentzündlichen Vermittler induziert, einschließlich TNF-, IL-8 und der induzierbaren NO-Synthetase.
[{"en": "Inflammation", "de": "Entzündung"}, {"en": "intracellular promoter protein nuclear factor B", "de": "intrazellulären promoter protein nuclear factor B"}, {"en": "mRNA coding", "de": "mRNA-Kodierung"}, {"en": "pro-inflammatory mediators", "de": "proentzündlichen Vermittler"}, {"en": "TNF-", "de": "TNF-"}, {"en": "IL-8", "de": "IL-8"}, {"en": "inducible nitric oxide synthase", "de": "induzierbaren NO-Synthetase"}]
[{"en": "Inflammation", "de": "Entzündung"}, {"en": "augmented", "de": "verstärkt"}, {"en": "activation", "de": "Aktivierung"}, {"en": "intracellular", "de": "intrazellulären"}, {"en": "promoter protein", "de": "promoter protein"}, {"en": "nuclear factor B", "de": "nuclear factor B"}, {"en": "synthesis", "de": "Synthese"}, {"en": "mRNA coding", "de": "mRNA-Kodierung"}, {"en": "pro-inflammatory mediators", "de": "proentzündlichen Vermittler"}, {"en": "including", "de": "einschließlich"}, {"en": "inducible nitric oxide synthase", "de": "induzierbaren NO-Synthetase"}]

Similarly, the same stimuli also produce parallel activation of the heat shock protein (hsp) pathways that inhibit NF-B activation and minimize the inflammatory response.
Ähnlich bewirken die gleichen Stimuli eine parallele Aktivierung der heat shock protein (hsp) Kaskade, welche die Aktivierung von NF-B inhibieren und die entzündliche Reaktion minimieren.
[{"en": "heat shock protein (hsp) pathways", "de": "heat shock protein (hsp) Kaskade"}, {"en": "NF-B activation", "de": "Aktivierung von NF-B"}, {"en": "inflammatory response", "de": "entzündliche Reaktion"}]
[{"en": "Similarly", "de": "Ähnlich"}, {"en": "the same", "de": "die gleichen"}, {"en": "stimuli", "de": "Stimuli"}, {"en": "produce", "de": "bewirken"}, {"en": "parallel activation", "de": "parallele Aktivierung"}, {"en": "heat shock protein", "de": "heat shock protein"}, {"en": "pathways", "de": "Kaskade"}, {"en": "inhibit", "de": "inhibieren"}, {"en": "activation", "de": "Aktivierung"}, {"en": "minimize", "de": "minimieren"}, {"en": "inflammatory response", "de": "entzündliche Reaktion"}]

It is the balance between these two pathways that appears to determine the immune responsiveness of the cells both locally and system wide.
Das Gleichgewicht zwischen diesen beiden Prozessen scheint die Immunreaktivität der Zellen, sowohl lokal als auch systemweit zu steuern.
[{"en": "balance", "de": "Gleichgewicht"}, {"en": "pathways", "de": "Prozessen"}, {"en": "immune responsiveness", "de": "Immunreaktivität"}, {"en": "cells", "de": "Zellen"}, {"en": "locally", "de": "lokal"}, {"en": "system wide", "de": "systemweit"}]

It is characterised by a uniformity of psychic experience in the face of circumstances which would otherwise give cause for depressiveness, despair, great anxiety, self-accusations or aggression directed against others.

Whereas the literature increasingly points to obsessive-compulsive symptoms being a side-effect of clozapine medication, usually in the clinical indication area of chronic schizophrenic psychoses, as far as the author knows, this describes a rare case of improvement of obsessive-compulsive symptoms using clozapine after first suffering from a schizophrenic disorder.

Human skin is exposed to a great deal of environmental stimulation, which in predisposed individuals may cause specific inflammatory dermatosis.

[{"en": "Human skin", "de": "Die Haut"}, {"en": "environmental stimulation", "de": "exogenen Reizen"}, {"en": "inflammatory dermatosis", "de": "entzündliche Dermatosen"}]
[{"en": "Human skin", "de": "Die Haut"}, {"en": "exposed", "de": "ausgesetzt"}, {"en": "environmental stimulation", "de": "exogenen Reizen"}, {"en": "predisposed individuals", "de": "prädisponierten Individuen"}, {"en": "specific inflammatory dermatosis", "de": "spezifische entzündliche Dermatosen"}]

Typically, endothelial activation can be observed as the induced expression of cell adhesion molecules.
Hierbei kommt es typischerweise zu einer Aktivierung von Endothelzellen in den dermalen Gefäßen, die sich durch eine gesteigerte Expression von Adhäsionsmolekülen auszeichnet.
[{"en": "endothelial activation", "de": "Aktivierung von Endothelzellen"}, {"en": "cell adhesion molecules", "de": "Adhäsionsmolekülen"}]
[{"en": "Typically", "de": "typischerweise"}, {"en": "endothelial activation", "de": "Aktivierung von Endothelzellen"}, {"en": "can be observed", "de": "kommt es"}, {"en": "induced expression", "de": "gesteigerte Expression"}, {"en": "cell adhesion molecules", "de": "Adhäsionsmolekülen"}]

This allows circulating immune cells to adhere to the endothelium and results in inflammatory, perivascular cell infiltrates in the affected tissue area.
Dies ermöglicht die Adhäsion zirkulierender Immunzellen am Endothel und damit die Ausbildung von entzündlichen, perivaskulären Zellinfiltraten im betroffenen Gewebsareal.
[{"en": "circulating immune cells", "de": "zirkulierender Immunzellen"}, {"en": "endothelium", "de": "Endothel"}, {"en": "inflammatory, perivascular cell infiltrates", "de": "entzündlichen, perivaskulären Zellinfiltraten"}, {"en": "affected tissue area", "de": "betroffenen Gewebsareal"}]
[{"en": "This", "de": "Dies"}, {"en": "allows", "de": "ermöglicht"}, {"en": "circulating", "de": "zirkulierender"}, {"en": "immune cells", "de": "Immunzellen"}, {"en": "to adhere", "de": "die Adhäsion"}, {"en": "endothelium", "de": "Endothel"}, {"en": "results in", "de": "damit"}, {"en": "inflammatory", "de": "entzündlichen"}, {"en": "perivascular cell infiltrates", "de": "perivaskulären Zellinfiltraten"}, {"en": "affected tissue area", "de": "betroffenen Gewebsareal"}]

While tissue-derived cytokines have been discussed primarily as controlling factors of these inflammatory processes, recent evidence suggests direct endothelial activation by various exogenous impulses.
Während bislang in erster Linie die Freisetzung pro-inflammatorischer Zytokine als Voraussetzung für die Entstehung von Entzündungsreaktionen galt, haben sich in jüngster Zeit Hinweise ergeben, daß exogene Faktoren auch ohne Vermittlung von Zytokinen Endothelzellen in einen entzündungsbereiten Zustand versetzten können.
[{"en": "tissue-derived cytokines", "de": "pro-inflammatorischer Zytokine"}, {"en": "inflammatory processes", "de": "Entzündungsreaktionen"}, {"en": "endothelial activation", "de": "Endothelzellen"}, {"en": "exogenous impulses", "de": "exogene Faktoren"}]
[{"en": "While", "de": "Während"}, {"en": "tissue-derived cytokines", "de": "pro-inflammatorischer Zytokine"}, {"en": "inflammatory processes", "de": "Entzündungsreaktionen"}, {"en": "recent evidence", "de": "jüngster Zeit Hinweise"}, {"en": "direct endothelial activation", "de": "Endothelzellen in einen entzündungsbereiten Zustand versetzten"}, {"en": "exogenous impulses", "de": "exogene Faktoren"}]

Endothelial adhesion molecule expression has been found to be exclusively responsive to biochemical or biophysical stimulation, such as the concentration of metal ions, oxygen tension, UV radiationor mechanically operating shear stress without appreciable interaction of cytokines.
Endotheliale Adhäsionsmoleküle können beispielsweise durch chemische oder physikalische Reize wie Änderungen der Metallionenkonzentration oder des Sauerstoffpartialdrucks sowie durch ultraviolette und ionisierende Strahlung oder mechanisch wirksame Scherkräfte induziert werden.
[{"en": "Endothelial adhesion molecule expression", "de": "Endotheliale Adhäsionsmoleküle"}, {"en": "biochemical or biophysical stimulation", "de": "chemische oder physikalische Reize"}, {"en": "concentration of metal ions", "de": "Änderungen der Metallionenkonzentration"}, {"en": "oxygen tension", "de": "Sauerstoffpartialdrucks"}, {"en": "UV radiation", "de": "ultraviolette"}, {"en": "shear stress", "de": "mechanisch wirksame Scherkräfte"}]
[{"en": "Endothelial adhesion molecule expression", "de": "Endotheliale Adhäsionsmoleküle"}, {"en": "found", "de": "können"}, {"en": "responsive", "de": "induziert werden"}, {"en": "biochemical or biophysical stimulation", "de": "chemische oder physikalische Reize"}, {"en": "concentration of metal ions", "de": "Änderungen der Metallionenkonzentration"}, {"en": "oxygen tension", "de": "des Sauerstoffpartialdrucks"}, {"en": "UV radiation", "de": "ultraviolette"}, {"en": "mechanically operating shear stress", "de": "mechanisch wirksame Scherkräfte"}]

These observations indicate that endothelial cells are capable of responding to exogenous stimulation, or rather transduce both exogenous and endogenous impulses, resulting in an integrative process.
Endothelzellen unterliegen also nicht nur der Kontrolle gewebseigener Mediatoren (Zytokine, biogene Amine u.a.), sondern können in ihrer Funktion auch durch äußerliche Hautreize unmittelbar beeinflußt werden.
[{"en": "endothelial cells", "de": "Endothelzellen"}, {"en": "exogenous stimulation", "de": "äußerliche Hautreize"}, {"en": "endogenous impulses", "de": "gewebseigener Mediatoren"}]
[{"en": "endothelial cells", "de": "Endothelzellen"}, {"en": "exogenous", "de": "äußerliche"}, {"en": "stimulation", "de": "Hautreize"}, {"en": "responding", "de": "beeinflußt"}]

In therapy-resistant fibrin reactions within the anterior chamber, especially following combined cataract and glaucoma surgery, injection of TPA is indicated.
Therapieresistente Fibrinreaktionen in der Augenvorderkammer, insbesondere nach kombinierten Katarakt-/Glaukomoperationen stellen eine Indikation für die lokale Gabe von rTPA dar.

This rare benign mesenchymal neoplasm of the lymph node occurs almost exclusively in the inguinal region.

Diagnostic criteria include its composition of myofibroblastic cells (with immunoreactivity for vimentin and actin), which may show nuclear palisading, the presence of peripheral haemorrhage zones and the occurrence of characteristic amianthoid structures, which have the ultrastructural appearance of dense meshworks of collagen fibers.
Zu ihren diagnostischen Kriterien zählen neben dem Aufbau aus abschnittsweise palisadenartig angeordneten myofibroblastären Zellen (mit immunhistologischer Positivität für Vimentin und Aktin) zur Peripherie akzentuierte Hämorrhagiezonen sowie das Vorkommen charakteristischer Amianthoidstrukturen ("amianthoid fibers"), die ultrastrukturell einem dichten Geflecht aus Kollagenfibrillen entsprechen.
[{"en": "Diagnostic criteria", "de": "diagnostischen Kriterien"}, {"en": "myofibroblastic cells", "de": "myofibroblastären Zellen"}, {"en": "immunoreactivity", "de": "immunhistologischer Positivität"}, {"en": "vimentin", "de": "Vimentin"}, {"en": "actin", "de": "Aktin"}, {"en": "nuclear palisading", "de": "palisadenartig angeordneten"}, {"en": "peripheral haemorrhage zones", "de": "zur Peripherie akzentuierte Hämorrhagiezonen"}, {"en": "amianthoid structures", "de": "Amianthoidstrukturen"}, {"en": "ultrastructural appearance", "de": "ultrastrukturell"}, {"en": "dense meshworks of collagen fibers", "de": "dichten Geflecht aus Kollagenfibrillen"}]
[{"en": "Diagnostic criteria", "de": "diagnostischen Kriterien"}, {"en": "composition", "de": "Aufbau"}, {"en": "myofibroblastic cells", "de": "myofibroblastären Zellen"}, {"en": "immunoreactivity", "de": "immunhistologischer Positivität"}, {"en": "vimentin", "de": "Vimentin"}, {"en": "actin", "de": "Aktin"}, {"en": "nuclear palisading", "de": "palisadenartig angeordneten"}, {"en": "presence", "de": "Hämorrhagiezonen"}, {"en": "occurrence", "de": "Vorkommen"}, {"en": "characteristic", "de": "charakteristischer"}, {"en": "amianthoid structures", "de": "Amianthoidstrukturen"}, {"en": "ultrastructural appearance", "de": "ultrastrukturell"}, {"en": "dense meshworks", "de": "dichten Geflecht"}, {"en": "collagen fibers", "de": "Kollagenfibrillen"}]

In all 5 reported patients therapy with single ureteral stents had failed despite correct stent position.
Durch die erhöhte Festigkeit von 2 parallelen inneren Schienen konnten Obstruktion und Kinking vermindert und eine Rückbildung der Stauung des proximalen Hohlsystems erzielt werden.

With the increased stiffness of 2 parallel ureteral silicon 7F Double-J stents ureteral kinking and luminal compression could be reduced leading to sufficient reduction of hydronephrosis.
Ferner ermöglicht diese Technik neben dem Urinfluß innerhalb der Schienen einen vermehrten Fluß zwischen den Schienen, der als entscheidender Mechanismus der Urinpassage bei liegenden Harnleiterschienen angesehen wird.
[{"en": "ureteral silicon 7F Double-J stents", "de": "Harnleiterschienen"}, {"en": "hydronephrosis", "de": "Urinpassage"}]
[{"en": "With the increased stiffness", "de": "Ferner ermöglicht diese Technik"}, {"en": "2 parallel", "de": "vermehrten"}, {"en": "ureteral", "de": "Harnleiterschienen"}, {"en": "silicon 7F Double-J stents", "de": "Schienen"}, {"en": "reduced", "de": "vermehrten Fluß"}, {"en": "sufficient reduction", "de": "entscheidender Mechanismus"}, {"en": "hydronephrosis", "de": "Urinpassage"}]

This approach with potential space between the stents preserves urinary flow through as well as around the stents which is considered to be the most important mechanism in stented ureters.
In Fällen extrinsischer Harnleiterkompression, in denen durch die Einlage einer singulären inneren Schiene keine suffiziente Rückbildung der Ektasie des vorgeschalteten intra- und extrarenalen Hohlraumsystems erreicht werden kann, sollte die simultane Einlage von 2 ipsilateralen inneren Doppel-J-Harnleiterschienen als technisch einfache, komplikationsarme Therapiealternative in Betracht gezogen werden, die einigen Patienten die Einlage eines perkutanen Nephrostomiekatheters oder invasivere Maßnahmen ersparen kann.
[{"en": "stents", "de": "inneren Doppel-J-Harnleiterschienen"}, {"en": "urinary flow", "de": "Harnleiterkompression"}, {"en": "ureters", "de": "Harnleiter"}]

Concerning the so-called minimal invasive procedures currently available for the treatment of lumbar disc prolapse (percutaneous endoscopic discectomy, APLD, laser decompression, chemonucleolysis), the intradiscal application of Chymopapain represents the method with the longest period of clinical use and experience.
Von den zur Behandlung lumbaler Bandscheibenvorfälle zur Verfügung stehenden sog. minimal-invasiven Verfahren (Perkutane endoskopische Nukleotomie/APLD/Laserdekompression/Chemonukleolyse) stellt die intradiskale Applikation von Chymopapain die Methode mit der längsten klinischen Anwendungsdauer und Erfahrung dar.

This review focuses on the analgesic efficacy of spinal opioids and their combination with local anaesthetics for postoperative analgesia, including patient-controlled epidural analgesia.
