Constant estradiol concentrations are achieved, comparable with those seen earlier in the follicular phase.
Es werden gleichmäßige Östradiolkonzentrationen wie in der frühen Follikelphase erreicht.
[{"en": "estradiol concentrations", "de": "Östradiolkonzentrationen"}, {"en": "follicular phase", "de": "Follikelphase"}]
[{"en": "Constant", "de": "gleichmäßige"}, {"en": "estradiol concentrations", "de": "Östradiolkonzentrationen"}, {"en": "achieved", "de": "erreicht"}, {"en": "comparable", "de": "wie"}, {"en": "follicular phase", "de": "Follikelphase"}]

When hormone replacement therapy is given by mouth, the dosage of estradiol needed to reach effective active ingredient levels is 40 times that used for TTS treatment, and then the levels fluctuate markedly with supraphysiological peaks and subnormal nadirs.
Bei der oralen Östrogenersatztherapie muss Östradiol im Vergleich zur TTS-Behandlung 40fach höher dosiert werden, um effektive, dabei aber stark schwankende Wirkstoffspiegel mit supraphysiologischen Spitzenwerten und subnormalen Tiefs zu erzielen.
[{"en": "hormone replacement therapy", "de": "Östrogenersatztherapie"}, {"en": "by mouth", "de": "oralen"}, {"en": "dosage", "de": "dosiert"}, {"en": "estradiol", "de": "Östradiol"}, {"en": "TTS treatment", "de": "TTS-Behandlung"}, {"en": "supraphysiological peaks", "de": "supraphysiologischen Spitzenwerten"}, {"en": "subnormal nadirs", "de": "subnormalen Tiefs"}]
[{"en": "When", "de": "Bei"}, {"en": "hormone replacement therapy", "de": "Östrogenersatztherapie"}, {"en": "given by mouth", "de": "oralen"}, {"en": "dosage", "de": "dosiert"}, {"en": "estradiol", "de": "Östradiol"}, {"en": "needed", "de": "muss"}, {"en": "effective", "de": "effektive"}, {"en": "active ingredient levels", "de": "Wirkstoffspiegel"}, {"en": "40 times", "de": "40fach höher"}, {"en": "TTS treatment", "de": "TTS-Behandlung"}, {"en": "levels fluctuate", "de": "stark schwankende"}, {"en": "supraphysiological peaks", "de": "supraphysiologischen Spitzenwerten"}, {"en": "subnormal nadirs", "de": "subnormalen Tiefs"}]

The high doses are needed for oral administration because estrogen is very strongly metabolized during passage through the liver.
Die hohen Östrogendosen bei oraler Gabe sind notwendig, da es bei der Leberpassage zu einem ausgeprägten Östrogenmetabolismus kommt.
[{"en": "high doses", "de": "hohen Östrogendosen"}, {"en": "oral administration", "de": "oraler Gabe"}, {"en": "estrogen", "de": "Östrogen"}, {"en": "metabolized", "de": "Östrogenmetabolismus"}, {"en": "passage through the liver", "de": "Leberpassage"}]
[{"en": "The high doses", "de": "Die hohen Östrogendosen"}, {"en": "are needed", "de": "sind notwendig"}, {"en": "for oral administration", "de": "bei oraler Gabe"}, {"en": "because", "de": "da"}, {"en": "estrogen", "de": "Östrogen"}, {"en": "is very strongly metabolized", "de": "zu einem ausgeprägten Östrogenmetabolismus kommt"}, {"en": "during passage", "de": "bei der Leberpassage"}]

The aim of this investigation was to evaluate the usefulness of prenatal and postnatal sonography for identifying and following infants with meconium peritonitis.
Welchen Stellenwert hat die Ultraschalluntersuchung des Fetus und Neugeborenen bei der Diagnosestellung und Therapieplanung einer Mekoniumperitonitis.

We describe an eighteen-months-old boy, who suffered from congenital vitium cordis, jejunalatresia, microcephaly, facial dysmorphies and psychomotor retardation in connection with a partial monosomy of the short arm of chromosome 8.
Wir beschreiben einen 18 Monate alten Jungen mit kongenitalem Vitium cordis, Dünndarmatresie, Mikrozephalie, fazialen Dysmorphien und psychomotorischer Retardierung, bei dem eine partielle Monosomie des kurzen Arms von Chromosom 8 vorliegt.

Aims of the present study were the objective estimation of physical work capacity and of exercise-induced changes of oxygen saturation in patients with cystic fibrosis.

Recently the World Health Organization published a new classification of urinary bladder tumors which is intended to take into account better the biology of the various lesions and to better distinguish between clearly benign and malignant lesions.
Grund für die Aktualisierung der WHO-Klassifikation urothelialer Läsionen bzw. Tumoren der Harnblase war, der Biologie der verschiedenen Läsionen besser gerecht zu werden sowie eine schärfere Trennung zwischen benignen und malignen urothelialen Prozessen zu vollziehen.
[{"en": "World Health Organization", "de": "WHO"}, {"en": "classification", "de": "Klassifikation"}, {"en": "urinary bladder tumors", "de": "Tumoren der Harnblase"}, {"en": "biology", "de": "Biologie"}, {"en": "benign", "de": "benignen"}, {"en": "malignant lesions", "de": "malignen urothelialen Prozessen"}]

We examine the possible diagnostic and clinical impact of the new classification, including recent immunohistochemical findings.
Die Bedeutung für Diagnostik und Klinik im Alltag unter Berücksichtigung aktueller immunhistochemischer Befunde wird kritisch betrachtet.

Flat urothelial lesions include hyperplasia, reactive atypia/atypia of unknown significance, dysplasia, and carcinoma in situ.
Papilläre urotheliale Läsionen umfassen Papillome, papilläre urotheliale Neoplasien niedrig malignen Potentials sowie papilläre Karzinome.

Invasive patterns of papillary carcinomas are discussed, with special emphasis on lamina muscularis mucosae substaging.
Flache urotheliale Läsionen umfassen flache Hyperplasien, Atypien (reaktiv oder von unklarer Bedeutung), Dysplasien sowie das Carcinoma in situ (CIS).

Long-term follow-up studies are needed to determine the clinical significance of this differentiation.

We attempted to illustrate connections between selected metabolic parameters and the inflammation course in patients after cataract operations.

Neuropathic pain syndromes may be treated by intervention at the sympathetic nervous system.
Einige neuropathische Schmerzsyndrome können durch eine Intervention am sympathischen Nervensystem behandelt werden.
[{"en": "Neuropathic pain syndromes", "de": "neuropathische Schmerzsyndrome"}, {"en": "sympathetic nervous system", "de": "sympathischen Nervensystem"}]
[{"en": "Neuropathic pain syndromes", "de": "neuropathische Schmerzsyndrome"}, {"en": "intervention", "de": "Intervention"}, {"en": "sympathetic nervous system", "de": "sympathischen Nervensystem"}]

The pain in these syndromes is therefore called sympathetically maintained pain (SMP).
Man spricht dann von einem sympathisch unterhaltenen Schmerz.
[{"en": "sympathetically maintained pain (SMP)", "de": "sympathisch unterhaltenen Schmerz"}]
[{"en": "pain", "de": "Schmerz"}]

Typical disorders with a SMP component are complex regional pain syndromes (reflex sympathetic dystrophy and causalgia), traumatic neuralgias and herpes zoster.
Typische Erkrankungen mit einer sympathischen Schmerzkomponente sind die komplexen regionalen Schmerzsyndrome (sympathische Reflexdystrophie und Kausalgie), die territorialen neuropathischen Schmerzsyndrome und der akute Herpes zoster.
[{"en": "complex regional pain syndromes", "de": "komplexen regionalen Schmerzsyndrome"}, {"en": "reflex sympathetic dystrophy", "de": "sympathische Reflexdystrophie"}, {"en": "causalgia", "de": "Kausalgie"}, {"en": "traumatic neuralgias", "de": "territorialen neuropathischen Schmerzsyndrome"}, {"en": "herpes zoster", "de": "Herpes zoster"}]
[{"en": "Typical disorders", "de": "Typische Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "complex regional pain syndromes", "de": "komplexen regionalen Schmerzsyndrome"}, {"en": "reflex sympathetic dystrophy", "de": "sympathische Reflexdystrophie"}, {"en": "causalgia", "de": "Kausalgie"}, {"en": "traumatic neuralgias", "de": "territorialen neuropathischen Schmerzsyndrome"}, {"en": "herpes zoster", "de": "Herpes zoster"}]

At least for chronic sufferers from back pain and sleep problems, the association between sleep quality and quality of the mattress is significant.
Es gibt für Personen mit chronischen Schlaf- und Rückenbeschwerden einen signifikanten Zusammenhang zwischen Schlafqualität und Qualität der Matratze.
[{"en": "chronic sufferers", "de": "ersonen mit chronischen Schlaf- und Rückenbeschwerden"}, {"en": "back pain", "de": "Rückenbeschwerden"}, {"en": "sleep quality", "de": "Schlafqualität"}, {"en": "quality of the mattress", "de": "Qualität der Matratze"}]

The routine staging work-up for renal cancer includes a contrast-enhanced multiphasic spiral CT and a chest radiograph.
Das diagnostische Routine Work-up für das Nierenzellkarzinom-Staging beinhaltet ein mehrphasisches Abdomen Spiral-CT und ein Thoraxröntgen.
[{"en": "renal cancer", "de": "Nierenzellkarzinom"}, {"en": "contrast-enhanced multiphasic spiral CT", "de": "mehrphasisches Abdomen Spiral-CT"}, {"en": "chest radiograph", "de": "Thoraxröntgen"}]
[{"en": "The routine", "de": "Das diagnostische Routine"}, {"en": "staging work-up", "de": "Work-up für das"}, {"en": "renal cancer", "de": "Nierenzellkarzinom-Staging"}, {"en": "includes", "de": "beinhaltet"}, {"en": "contrast-enhanced", "de": "mehrphasisches"}, {"en": "multiphasic spiral CT", "de": "Abdomen Spiral-CT"}, {"en": "chest radiograph", "de": "Thoraxröntgen"}]

If there is doubt regarding the presence and extent of (supradiaphragmatic) IVC thrombus, MR imaging should be performed.
Bei unklarem Spiral-CT Befund in der Fragestellung intravenöse Tumorausdehnung kann die kontrastmittelverstärkte MRT eine wertvolle diagnostische Alternative darstellen.
[{"en": "doubt", "de": "unklarem"}, {"en": "presence and extent", "de": "intravenöse Tumorausdehnung"}, {"en": "IVC thrombus", "de": "Spiral-CT Befund"}, {"en": "MR imaging", "de": "MRT"}]
[{"en": "doubt", "de": "unklarem"}, {"en": "presence", "de": "intravenöse"}, {"en": "extent", "de": "Tumorausdehnung"}, {"en": "MR imaging", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "performed", "de": "darstellen"}]

Dynamic contrast-enhanced MR imaging should be used in place of CT in any patient with severe renal dysfunction, symptomatic polycystic kidney disease, or a history of allergy to iodinated contrast media.
Die primären Indikationen zur renalen MRT stellen Patienten mit absoluter oder relativer Kontraindikation für nichtionische Röntgenkontrastmittel, Patienten im Stadium der kompensierten (noch nicht dialysepflichtigen) renalen Insuffizienz und Patienten mit symptomatischer polyzystischer Nierendegeneration dar.
[{"en": "Dynamic contrast-enhanced MR imaging", "de": "renalen MRT"}, {"en": "CT", "de": "nichtionische Röntgenkontrastmittel"}, {"en": "severe renal dysfunction", "de": "kompensierten (noch nicht dialysepflichtigen) renalen Insuffizienz"}, {"en": "symptomatic polycystic kidney disease", "de": "symptomatischer polyzystischer Nierendegeneration"}, {"en": "allergy to iodinated contrast media", "de": "Kontraindikation für nichtionische Röntgenkontrastmittel"}]
[{"en": "Dynamic contrast-enhanced MR imaging", "de": "renalen MRT"}, {"en": "CT", "de": "nichtionische Röntgenkontrastmittel"}, {"en": "patient", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "severe renal dysfunction", "de": "kompensierten (noch nicht dialysepflichtigen) renalen Insuffizienz"}, {"en": "symptomatic polycystic kidney disease", "de": "symptomatischer polyzystischer Nierendegeneration"}, {"en": "history of allergy", "de": "Kontraindikation"}, {"en": "iodinated contrast media", "de": "nichtionische Röntgenkontrastmittel"}]

Cavography is no longer needed in the era of (adaptive array detector) spiral CT and MR venography.
Die konventionelle Cavographie ist im Zeitalter der (Mehrzeilen-) Spiral-CT-Venographie und MR-Venographie obsolet.
[{"en": "Cavography", "de": "Cavographie"}, {"en": "spiral CT", "de": "Spiral-CT-Venographie"}, {"en": "MR venography", "de": "MR-Venographie"}]
[{"en": "Cavography", "de": "Cavographie"}, {"en": "no longer needed", "de": "obsolet"}, {"en": "era", "de": "Zeitalter"}, {"en": "spiral CT", "de": "Spiral-CT-Venographie"}, {"en": "MR venography", "de": "MR-Venographie"}]

Most frequent injuries of the eye in the paediatric age are chemical or thermal injuries, corneal erosion, corneal foreign body, ocular contusion, blow-out-fracture, penetrating eye injury, endophthalmitis and traumatic retinopathy.
Die häufigsten Verletzungen des Auges im Kindesalter sind Verätzung, Verbrennung, Lidverletzung, Erosio corneae, Hornhautfremdkörper, Augapfelprellung, Blow-out-Fraktur, perforierende Augenverletzung, Endophthalmitis und traumatische Retinopathie.
[{"en": "injuries of the eye", "de": "Verletzungen des Auges"}, {"en": "paediatric age", "de": "Kindesalter"}, {"en": "chemical or thermal injuries", "de": "Verätzung, Verbrennung"}, {"en": "corneal erosion", "de": "Erosio corneae"}, {"en": "corneal foreign body", "de": "Hornhautfremdkörper"}, {"en": "ocular contusion", "de": "Augapfelprellung"}, {"en": "blow-out-fracture", "de": "Blow-out-Fraktur"}, {"en": "penetrating eye injury", "de": "perforierende Augenverletzung"}, {"en": "endophthalmitis", "de": "Endophthalmitis"}, {"en": "traumatic retinopathy", "de": "traumatische Retinopathie"}]
[{"en": "Most frequent", "de": "häufigsten"}, {"en": "injuries", "de": "Verletzungen"}, {"en": "eye", "de": "Auges"}, {"en": "paediatric age", "de": "Kindesalter"}, {"en": "chemical or thermal injuries", "de": "Verätzung, Verbrennung"}, {"en": "corneal erosion", "de": "Erosio corneae"}, {"en": "corneal foreign body", "de": "Hornhautfremdkörper"}, {"en": "ocular contusion", "de": "Augapfelprellung"}, {"en": "blow-out-fracture", "de": "Blow-out-Fraktur"}, {"en": "penetrating eye injury", "de": "perforierende Augenverletzung"}, {"en": "endophthalmitis", "de": "Endophthalmitis"}, {"en": "traumatic retinopathy", "de": "traumatische Retinopathie"}]

The number of eye injuries per year is about 12 of 100.000.
Die Anzahl ernster Augenverletzungen beträgt etwa 12 auf 100.000 Einwohner/Jahr.
[{"en": "eye injuries", "de": "Augenverletzungen"}, {"en": "per year", "de": "Einwohner/Jahr"}]
[{"en": "The number", "de": "Die Anzahl"}, {"en": "eye injuries", "de": "Augenverletzungen"}, {"en": "per year", "de": "Einwohner/Jahr"}, {"en": "about", "de": "etwa"}, {"en": "12", "de": "12"}, {"en": "100.000", "de": "100.000"}]

They represent the most frequent cause for an unilateral blindness.
Damit repräsentieren sie die häufigste Ursache für eine einseitige Erblindung im Kindesalter.
[{"en": "unilateral blindness", "de": "einseitige Erblindung"}]
[{"en": "They represent", "de": "Damit repräsentieren sie"}, {"en": "the most frequent cause", "de": "die häufigste Ursache"}, {"en": "unilateral blindness", "de": "einseitige Erblindung"}]

Age below 5 years, sex (male > female), care by parents are known risk factors for an eye injury in the paediatric age.
Als Risikofaktoren für eine Augenverletzung im Kindesalter sind u. a. das Alter (<5 Jahre), das Geschlecht (männlich > weiblich) und die elterliche Betreuung bekannt.
[{"en": "Age below 5 years", "de": "Alter (<5 Jahre)"}, {"en": "sex (male > female)", "de": "Geschlecht (männlich > weiblich)"}, {"en": "care by parents", "de": "elterliche Betreuung"}, {"en": "eye injury", "de": "Augenverletzung"}, {"en": "paediatric age", "de": "Kindesalter"}]
[{"en": "Age", "de": "Alter"}, {"en": "below 5 years", "de": "<5 Jahre"}, {"en": "sex", "de": "Geschlecht"}, {"en": "male", "de": "männlich"}, {"en": "female", "de": "weiblich"}, {"en": "care by parents", "de": "elterliche Betreuung"}, {"en": "risk factors", "de": "Risikofaktoren"}, {"en": "eye injury", "de": "Augenverletzung"}, {"en": "paediatric age", "de": "Kindesalter"}]

Visual rehabilitation after eye injury can be affected by a quick and adequate therapy as well as several social factors (e. g., compliance in wearing glasses or treatment for amblyopia).
Die Prognose hinsichtlich der visuellen Rehabilitation nach Augenverletzungen wird neben einer raschen und adäquaten Therapie auch durch psychosoziale Faktoren (Compliance beim Einsatz von Sehhilfen oder Abkleben der Augen zur Amblyopieprophylaxe) beeinflusst.
[{"en": "Visual rehabilitation", "de": "visuellen Rehabilitation"}, {"en": "eye injury", "de": "Augenverletzungen"}, {"en": "quick and adequate therapy", "de": "raschen und adäquaten Therapie"}, {"en": "social factors", "de": "psychosoziale Faktoren"}, {"en": "compliance in wearing glasses", "de": "Compliance beim Einsatz von Sehhilfen"}, {"en": "treatment for amblyopia", "de": "Abkleben der Augen zur Amblyopieprophylaxe"}]
[{"en": "Visual rehabilitation", "de": "visuellen Rehabilitation"}, {"en": "eye injury", "de": "Augenverletzungen"}, {"en": "quick", "de": "raschen"}, {"en": "adequate therapy", "de": "adäquaten Therapie"}, {"en": "social factors", "de": "psychosoziale Faktoren"}, {"en": "compliance", "de": "Compliance"}, {"en": "wearing glasses", "de": "Einsatz von Sehhilfen"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Abkleben"}, {"en": "amblyopia", "de": "Amblyopieprophylaxe"}]

Dysfunctions and imbalances of the spine-supporting muscles increase the risk of low back pain.
Dabei gelten Defizite und Dysbalancen der wirbelsäulenstabilisierenden Muskulatur als bedeutsame somatische Risikofaktoren für das Auftreten von Rückenbeschwerden.
[{"en": "Dysfunctions", "de": "Defizite"}, {"en": "imbalances", "de": "Dysbalancen"}, {"en": "spine-supporting muscles", "de": "wirbelsäulenstabilisierenden Muskulatur"}, {"en": "low back pain", "de": "Rückenbeschwerden"}]
[{"en": "Dysfunctions", "de": "Defizite"}, {"en": "imbalances", "de": "Dysbalancen"}, {"en": "spine-supporting muscles", "de": "wirbelsäulenstabilisierenden Muskulatur"}, {"en": "increase the risk", "de": "bedeutsame somatische Risikofaktoren"}, {"en": "low back pain", "de": "Rückenbeschwerden"}]

Consequently preventive treatment and rehabilitation have to aim at preserving and restoring the full capacity of the spine-supporting muscles as well as training coordination and spine-friendly behaviour.
Daher muß der Erhalt und die Wiederherstellung der vollen Leistungsfähigkeit der die Wirbelsäule stabilisierenden Muskulatur neben der Schulung koordinativer Fähigkeiten und dem Erlernen eines wirbelsäulengerechten Verhaltens Ziel von Prävention und Rehabilitation sein.
[{"en": "preventive treatment", "de": "Prävention"}, {"en": "rehabilitation", "de": "Rehabilitation"}, {"en": "spine-supporting muscles", "de": "die Wirbelsäule stabilisierenden Muskulatur"}, {"en": "coordination", "de": "koordinativer Fähigkeiten"}, {"en": "spine-friendly behaviour", "de": "wirbelsäulengerechten Verhaltens"}]
[{"en": "Consequently", "de": "Daher"}, {"en": "preventive treatment", "de": "Prävention"}, {"en": "rehabilitation", "de": "Rehabilitation"}, {"en": "aim", "de": "Ziel"}, {"en": "preserving", "de": "Erhalt"}, {"en": "restoring", "de": "Wiederherstellung"}, {"en": "full capacity", "de": "vollen Leistungsfähigkeit"}, {"en": "spine-supporting muscles", "de": "die Wirbelsäule stabilisierenden Muskulatur"}, {"en": "training", "de": "Schulung"}, {"en": "coordination", "de": "koordinativer Fähigkeiten"}, {"en": "spine-friendly behaviour", "de": "wirbelsäulengerechten Verhaltens"}]

In addition to various measures of pain therapy, physiotherapeutic treatment including neuro-physiotherapy, physical treatment (eg electrotherapy), balneotherapy and supportive behavioural training, medical rehabilitation therapy (MRT) ranks among the most effective ways of treating low back pain.
Neben den verschiedenen schmerztherapeutischen Maßnahmen, den physiotherapeutischen Behandlungstechniken inklusive der Verfahren auf neurophysiologischer Basis, den physikalisch-balneologischen Maßnahmen und der ergänzenden Verhaltensschulung stellt die medizinische Trainingstherapie ein wichtiges Verfahren bei der Behandlung von Lumbalsyndromen dar.
[{"en": "pain therapy", "de": "schmerztherapeutischen Maßnahmen"}, {"en": "physiotherapeutic treatment", "de": "physiotherapeutischen Behandlungstechniken"}, {"en": "neuro-physiotherapy", "de": "Verfahren auf neurophysiologischer Basis"}, {"en": "physical treatment", "de": "physikalisch-balneologischen Maßnahmen"}, {"en": "supportive behavioural training", "de": "ergänzenden Verhaltensschulung"}, {"en": "medical rehabilitation therapy (MRT)", "de": "medizinische Trainingstherapie"}, {"en": "low back pain", "de": "Lumbalsyndromen"}]
[{"en": "In addition", "de": "Neben"}, {"en": "various measures", "de": "verschiedenen schmerztherapeutischen Maßnahmen"}, {"en": "pain therapy", "de": "schmerztherapeutischen Maßnahmen"}, {"en": "physiotherapeutic treatment", "de": "physiotherapeutischen Behandlungstechniken"}, {"en": "neuro-physiotherapy", "de": "Verfahren auf neurophysiologischer Basis"}, {"en": "physical treatment", "de": "physikalisch-balneologischen Maßnahmen"}, {"en": "balneotherapy", "de": "balneologischen Maßnahmen"}, {"en": "supportive behavioural training", "de": "ergänzenden Verhaltensschulung"}, {"en": "medical rehabilitation therapy", "de": "medizinische Trainingstherapie"}, {"en": "low back pain", "de": "Lumbalsyndromen"}]

MRT applies guidelines and methods of exercise methodology within medically indicated programmes of preventive treatment and rehabilitation.
Die medizinische Trainingstherapie umfaßt den Einsatz von Prinzipien und Methoden der praxisorientierten Trainingslehre und Trainingswissenschaft innerhalb medizinisch indizierter Präventions- und Rehabilitationsmaßnahmen.
[{"en": "MRT", "de": "medizinische Trainingstherapie"}, {"en": "exercise methodology", "de": "praxisorientierten Trainingslehre und Trainingswissenschaft"}, {"en": "preventive treatment", "de": "Präventions"}, {"en": "rehabilitation", "de": "Rehabilitationsmaßnahmen"}]
[{"en": "MRT", "de": "medizinische Trainingstherapie"}, {"en": "guidelines", "de": "Prinzipien"}, {"en": "methods", "de": "Methoden"}, {"en": "exercise methodology", "de": "praxisorientierten Trainingslehre und Trainingswissenschaft"}, {"en": "medically indicated", "de": "medizinisch indizierter"}, {"en": "preventive treatment", "de": "Präventions-"}, {"en": "rehabilitation", "de": "Rehabilitationsmaßnahmen"}]

Various objectives of MRT are outlined with special regard to the stages of MRT treatment, emphasizing positive adaptation of the neuro-muscular system in the course of rehabilitation.
In ihrer Phasenstruktur werden verschiedene Therapieziele, insbesondere aber die positive Anpassung des neuromuskulären Systems entsprechend des Rehabilitationsverlaufs dargestellt.
[{"en": "MRT", "de": "Therapieziele"}, {"en": "neuro-muscular system", "de": "neuromuskulären Systems"}, {"en": "rehabilitation", "de": "Rehabilitationsverlaufs"}]
[{"en": "Various", "de": "verschiedene"}, {"en": "objectives", "de": "Therapieziele"}, {"en": "MRT", "de": "ihrer Phasenstruktur"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Rehabilitationsverlaufs"}, {"en": "positive adaptation", "de": "positive Anpassung"}, {"en": "neuro-muscular system", "de": "neuromuskulären Systems"}]

Physicians are responsible for MRT diagnosis and control.
Indikationsstellung und Überwachung der medizinischen Trainingstherapie sind ärztliche Aufgaben.
[{"en": "Physicians", "de": "ärztliche Aufgaben"}, {"en": "MRT diagnosis", "de": "Indikationsstellung"}, {"en": "control", "de": "Überwachung der medizinischen Trainingstherapie"}]
[{"en": "Physicians", "de": "ärztliche"}, {"en": "responsible", "de": "Aufgaben"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Indikationsstellung"}, {"en": "control", "de": "Überwachung"}]

Taking into account the base disorder and the progress of therapy physiotherapists and the physicians in charge determine MRT objectives and treatment strategies.
Entsprechend der zugrundeliegenden Störung und des Therapieverlaufs werden Therapieziele und Behandlungskonzept in Zusammenarbeit von Physiotherapeuten und behandelnden Ärzten angepaßt.
[{"en": "base disorder", "de": "zugrundeliegenden Störung"}, {"en": "therapy physiotherapists", "de": "Physiotherapeuten"}, {"en": "physicians in charge", "de": "behandelnden Ärzten"}, {"en": "MRT objectives", "de": "Therapieziele"}, {"en": "treatment strategies", "de": "Behandlungskonzept"}]
[{"en": "Taking into account", "de": "Entsprechend"}, {"en": "base disorder", "de": "zugrundeliegenden Störung"}, {"en": "progress of therapy", "de": "Therapieverlaufs"}, {"en": "physiotherapists", "de": "Physiotherapeuten"}, {"en": "physicians in charge", "de": "behandelnden Ärzten"}, {"en": "determine", "de": "angepaßt"}, {"en": "objectives", "de": "Therapieziele"}, {"en": "treatment strategies", "de": "Behandlungskonzept"}]

The indication for operative treatment in spondylolisthesis results from pain, progressive sliding and, in up to 60 % of the patients with progressive dislocation, from radicular malfunction.
Die Operationsindikation beim Wirbelgleiten ergibt sich aus Schmerzen, einem progredienten Gleiten und, bei bis zu 60 % der Patienten mit fortgeschrittener Dislokation, aus radikulären Funktionsstörungen.
[{"en": "operative treatment", "de": "Operationsindikation"}, {"en": "spondylolisthesis", "de": "Wirbelgleiten"}, {"en": "pain", "de": "Schmerzen"}, {"en": "progressive sliding", "de": "progredienten Gleiten"}, {"en": "radicular malfunction", "de": "radikulären Funktionsstörungen"}]
[{"en": "The indication", "de": "Die Operationsindikation"}, {"en": "operative treatment", "de": "beim"}, {"en": "spondylolisthesis", "de": "Wirbelgleiten"}, {"en": "results from", "de": "ergibt sich aus"}, {"en": "pain", "de": "Schmerzen"}, {"en": "progressive sliding", "de": "progredienten Gleiten"}, {"en": "up to", "de": "bei bis zu"}, {"en": "60 %", "de": "60 %"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "progressive dislocation", "de": "fortgeschrittener Dislokation"}, {"en": "radicular malfunction", "de": "radikulären Funktionsstörungen"}]

The posterolateral fusion in situ is a safe procedure, but the deformation remains and in spondyloptosis plastic deformation of the fusion mass can lead to further dislocation.
Die posterolaterale Fusion in situ ist ein risikoarmes Verfahren, jedoch bleibt die Deformität bestehen und bei Spondyloptosen kann eine plastische Verformung der ossären Spondylodesemasse mit weiterer Progredienz des Gleitens eintreten.
[{"en": "posterolateral fusion in situ", "de": "posterolaterale Fusion in situ"}, {"en": "deformation", "de": "Deformität"}, {"en": "spondyloptosis", "de": "Spondyloptosen"}, {"en": "plastic deformation", "de": "plastische Verformung"}, {"en": "fusion mass", "de": "ossären Spondylodesemasse"}, {"en": "dislocation", "de": "Progredienz des Gleitens"}]
[{"en": "The", "de": "Die"}, {"en": "posterolateral fusion", "de": "posterolaterale Fusion"}, {"en": "in situ", "de": "in situ"}, {"en": "is a safe procedure", "de": "ist ein risikoarmes Verfahren"}, {"en": "but", "de": "jedoch"}, {"en": "the deformation", "de": "die Deformität"}, {"en": "and", "de": "und"}, {"en": "in spondyloptosis", "de": "bei Spondyloptosen"}, {"en": "plastic deformation", "de": "plastische Verformung"}, {"en": "fusion mass", "de": "ossären Spondylodesemasse"}, {"en": "further dislocation", "de": "weiterer Progredienz des Gleitens"}]

With the external fixator as an instrument for reduction and the internal fixator for stabilization the reduction of even serious spondyloptosis and the recovery of a normal spine alignement and posture is possible, with an acceptable neurological risk.
Mit dem externen Fixateur als Repositionsinstrument und dem internen Fixateur zur Stabilisierung ist heute auch die Reposition schwerer Gleitvorgänge und die Wiederherstellung einer normalen Wirbelsäulen- und Rumpfform mit vertretbarem neurologischen Risiko möglich.
[{"en": "external fixator", "de": "externen Fixateur"}, {"en": "instrument for reduction", "de": "Repositionsinstrument"}, {"en": "internal fixator", "de": "internen Fixateur"}, {"en": "stabilization", "de": "Stabilisierung"}, {"en": "serious spondyloptosis", "de": "schwerer Gleitvorgänge"}, {"en": "normal spine alignement", "de": "normalen Wirbelsäulen-"}, {"en": "posture", "de": "Rumpfform"}, {"en": "acceptable neurological risk", "de": "vertretbarem neurologischen Risiko"}]
[{"en": "With", "de": "Mit"}, {"en": "external fixator", "de": "externen Fixateur"}, {"en": "instrument", "de": "Repositionsinstrument"}, {"en": "internal fixator", "de": "internen Fixateur"}, {"en": "stabilization", "de": "Stabilisierung"}, {"en": "reduction", "de": "Reposition"}, {"en": "serious", "de": "schwerer"}, {"en": "recovery", "de": "Wiederherstellung"}, {"en": "normal spine alignement", "de": "normalen Wirbelsäulen-"}, {"en": "posture", "de": "Rumpfform"}, {"en": "acceptable", "de": "vertretbarem"}, {"en": "neurological risk", "de": "neurologischen Risiko"}]

Therefore a concept of treatment is suggested, which as a rule is aiming at the anatomical reduction of the dislocated vertrebra beside stabilization and nerveroot decompression.
Daher wird ein Behandlungskonzept vorgeschlagen, daß neben der Stabilisierung und Nervenwurzeldekompression in jedem Falle auch die anatomische Reposition des Gleitwirbels zum Ziel hat.
[{"en": "concept of treatment", "de": "Behandlungskonzept"}, {"en": "anatomical reduction", "de": "anatomische Reposition"}, {"en": "stabilization", "de": "Stabilisierung"}, {"en": "nerveroot decompression", "de": "Nervenwurzeldekompression"}]
[{"en": "Therefore", "de": "Daher"}, {"en": "concept of treatment", "de": "Behandlungskonzept"}, {"en": "suggested", "de": "vorgeschlagen"}, {"en": "as a rule", "de": "in jedem Falle"}, {"en": "aiming at", "de": "zum Ziel hat"}, {"en": "anatomical reduction", "de": "anatomische Reposition"}, {"en": "beside", "de": "neben"}, {"en": "stabilization", "de": "Stabilisierung"}, {"en": "nerveroot decompression", "de": "Nervenwurzeldekompression"}]

Depending on the extent of the slip, reduction and stabilization is to be performed in one, two or three stages.
In Abhängigkeit vom Ausmaß des Gleitens sollen Reposition und Stabilisierung in 1, 2 oder 3 Operationsschritten erfolgen.
[{"en": "extent of the slip", "de": "Ausmaß des Gleitens"}, {"en": "reduction", "de": "Reposition"}, {"en": "stabilization", "de": "Stabilisierung"}]
[{"en": "Depending", "de": "In Abhängigkeit"}, {"en": "extent", "de": "Ausmaß"}, {"en": "slip", "de": "Gleitens"}, {"en": "reduction", "de": "Reposition"}, {"en": "stabilization", "de": "Stabilisierung"}, {"en": "one, two or three", "de": "1, 2 oder 3"}, {"en": "stages", "de": "Operationsschritten"}]

An anterior or posterior fusion is sufficient in grade I dislocation.
Eine alleinige dorsale oder ventrale Fusion ist bei Grad-1-Dislokationen ausreichend.
[{"en": "anterior", "de": "ventrale"}, {"en": "grade I dislocation", "de": "Grad-1-Dislokationen"}]
[{"en": "An", "de": "Eine"}, {"en": "anterior", "de": "ventrale"}, {"en": "posterior", "de": "dorsale"}, {"en": "fusion", "de": "Fusion"}, {"en": "is", "de": "ist"}, {"en": "sufficient", "de": "ausreichend"}, {"en": "grade I", "de": "Grad-1"}, {"en": "dislocation", "de": "Dislokationen"}]

In grade II-V a combined posterior and anterior surgical proceedure is recommended.
Bei Grad II und darüber wird die kombinierte dorsoventrale Spondylodese empfohlen.
[{"en": "grade II-V", "de": "Grad II"}, {"en": "combined posterior and anterior surgical proceedure", "de": "kombinierte dorsoventrale Spondylodese"}]
[{"en": "In", "de": "Bei"}, {"en": "grade", "de": "Grad"}, {"en": "II-V", "de": "II und darüber"}, {"en": "combined", "de": "kombinierte"}, {"en": "posterior and anterior", "de": "dorsoventrale"}, {"en": "surgical proceedure", "de": "Spondylodese"}, {"en": "recommended", "de": "empfohlen"}]

The goal of this evaluation study is to analyze the effects of a new gerontopsychiatric institution, the gerontopsychiatric center (GC:
Ziel der Evaluationsstudie, über deren ausgewählte Ergebnisse dieser Beitrag berichtet, ist es, die Auswirkungen eines Gerontopsychiatrischen Zentrums (GZ:
[{"en": "evaluation study", "de": "Evaluationsstudie"}, {"en": "gerontopsychiatric institution", "de": "Gerontopsychiatrischen Zentrums"}, {"en": "gerontopsychiatric center", "de": "Gerontopsychiatrischen Zentrums"}]
[{"en": "The goal", "de": "Ziel"}, {"en": "evaluation study", "de": "Evaluationsstudie"}, {"en": "analyze", "de": "Auswirkungen"}, {"en": "effects", "de": "berichtet"}, {"en": "gerontopsychiatric institution", "de": "Gerontopsychiatrischen Zentrums"}, {"en": "gerontopsychiatric center", "de": "Gerontopsychiatrischen Zentrums"}]

a combination of a home-based outpatient service, a day-hospital and a consulting office for elderly with mental disorders) on the reorganization process of the treatment system from intramural toward extramural structures, as experts of the government of the FRG have been demanding for a long time.
eine Kombination von ambulantem Dienst, Tagesklinik und Altenberatung) auf den von der Expertenkommission der Bundesregierung geforderten und ausführlich begründeten Wandlungsprozeß von "intramuralen" (stationären) zu "extramuralen" (tagesklinischen und klinisch-ambulanten, i. w. hausgestützten) regionalen Versorgungsstrukturen erstmalig einer empirischen Prüfung zu unterziehen.
[{"en": "home-based outpatient service", "de": "ambulantem Dienst"}, {"en": "day-hospital", "de": "Tagesklinik"}, {"en": "consulting office for elderly with mental disorders", "de": "Altenberatung"}, {"en": "government of the FRG", "de": "Expertenkommission der Bundesregierung"}, {"en": "intramural", "de": "intramuralen"}, {"en": "extramural", "de": "extramuralen"}]
[{"en": "a combination", "de": "eine Kombination"}, {"en": "home-based outpatient service", "de": "ambulantem Dienst"}, {"en": "day-hospital", "de": "Tagesklinik"}, {"en": "consulting office", "de": "Altenberatung"}, {"en": "reorganization process", "de": "Wandlungsprozeß"}, {"en": "treatment system", "de": "Versorgungsstrukturen"}, {"en": "intramural", "de": "intramuralen"}, {"en": "extramural", "de": "extramuralen"}, {"en": "experts", "de": "Expertenkommission"}, {"en": "government", "de": "Bundesregierung"}]

Based on data of cross-sectional and longitudinal studies two regional catchment areas - the city of Bielefeld (without GC, control region) and the district of Gütersloh (with GC) - are compared and analyzed, whether changes within the gerontopsychiatric system (subsystem A), the system of general medical treatment (subsystem B), or within the elderly care system (subsystem C) occurred.
Auf der Basis umfangreicher Quer- und Längsschnittdaten werden durch einen Vergleich der Versorgungsregion der Stadt Bielefeld (ohne GZ) mit der des Kreises Gütersloh (mit GZ) Veränderungen in den regionalen Versorgungsteilstrukturen der Gerontopsychiatrie (Subsystem A), der Allgemeinmedizin (Subsystem B) und der Altenhilfe (Subsystem C) analysiert.
[{"en": "cross-sectional and longitudinal studies", "de": "Quer- und Längsschnittdaten"}, {"en": "city of Bielefeld", "de": "Stadt Bielefeld"}, {"en": "district of Gütersloh", "de": "Kreises Gütersloh"}, {"en": "gerontopsychiatric system", "de": "Gerontopsychiatrie"}, {"en": "general medical treatment", "de": "Allgemeinmedizin"}, {"en": "elderly care system", "de": "Altenhilfe"}]
[{"en": "Based on", "de": "Auf der Basis"}, {"en": "cross-sectional", "de": "Quer"}, {"en": "longitudinal studies", "de": "Längsschnittdaten"}, {"en": "regional catchment areas", "de": "Versorgungsregion"}, {"en": "the city of Bielefeld", "de": "der Stadt Bielefeld"}, {"en": "the district of Gütersloh", "de": "des Kreises Gütersloh"}, {"en": "compared", "de": "Vergleich"}, {"en": "analyzed", "de": "analysiert"}, {"en": "changes", "de": "Veränderungen"}, {"en": "gerontopsychiatric system", "de": "Gerontopsychiatrie"}, {"en": "subsystem A", "de": "Subsystem A"}, {"en": "general medical treatment", "de": "Allgemeinmedizin"}, {"en": "subsystem B", "de": "Subsystem B"}, {"en": "elderly care system", "de": "Altenhilfe"}, {"en": "subsystem C", "de": "Subsystem C"}]

Concerning subsystem A the results are that the GC has a strong impact on the intended shift from intra- to extramural structures, without selecting patients by diagnosis nor by severity degrees of their mental disorders in extramural treatment facilities.
Die Untersuchung ergibt hinsichtlich Subsystem A, Daß ein GZ auf die intendierte Strukturform von intra- zu extramuraler Versorgung erheblichen Einfluß hat, ohne dabei seine Klientel nach Art und Schweregrad der psychischen Störung zu selegieren.
[{"en": "subsystem A", "de": "Subsystem A"}, {"en": "GC", "de": "GZ"}, {"en": "intra- to extramural structures", "de": "intra- zu extramuraler Versorgung"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Art"}, {"en": "severity degrees", "de": "Schweregrad"}, {"en": "mental disorders", "de": "psychischen Störung"}, {"en": "extramural treatment facilities", "de": "extramuraler Versorgung"}]
[{"en": "Concerning", "de": "hinsichtlich"}, {"en": "subsystem A", "de": "Subsystem A"}, {"en": "results", "de": "Untersuchung ergibt"}, {"en": "strong impact", "de": "erheblichen Einfluß"}, {"en": "intended shift", "de": "intendierte Strukturform"}, {"en": "intra-", "de": "intra-"}, {"en": "extramural", "de": "extramuraler"}, {"en": "without", "de": "ohne"}, {"en": "selecting", "de": "selegieren"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Klientel"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Art"}, {"en": "severity degrees", "de": "Schweregrad"}, {"en": "mental disorders", "de": "psychischen Störung"}]

An effect of the GC on subsystem C is possibly the fact that in its region the rate of direct transfers of patients from the clinical gerontopsychiatric department into homes for the elderly is significantly lower than in the region without GC.
Ein Effekt des GZ auf das System der Altenhilfe (Subsystem C) findet möglicherweise darin seine Ausdruck, daß in der Versorgungsregion Gütersloh die Heimeinweisungsrate nach klinisch-stationärer Behandlung deutlich geringer als in der Bielefelder Kontrollregion ist.
[{"en": "effect", "de": "Effekt"}, {"en": "GC", "de": "GZ"}, {"en": "subsystem C", "de": "System der Altenhilfe (Subsystem C)"}, {"en": "direct transfers", "de": "Heimeinweisungsrate"}, {"en": "clinical gerontopsychiatric department", "de": "klinisch-stationärer Behandlung"}, {"en": "homes for the elderly", "de": "Versorgungsregion Gütersloh"}, {"en": "region", "de": "Kontrollregion"}]
[{"en": "An effect", "de": "Ein Effekt"}, {"en": "the GC", "de": "des GZ"}, {"en": "subsystem C", "de": "System der Altenhilfe (Subsystem C)"}, {"en": "possibly", "de": "möglicherweise"}, {"en": "the fact", "de": "darin seine Ausdruck"}, {"en": "rate", "de": "Heimeinweisungsrate"}, {"en": "direct transfers", "de": "klinisch-stationärer Behandlung"}, {"en": "homes for the elderly", "de": "Heime"}, {"en": "significantly lower", "de": "deutlich geringer"}, {"en": "region", "de": "Versorgungsregion"}, {"en": "without GC", "de": "Bielefelder Kontrollregion"}]

A 62-year-old woman developed eosinophilic cellulitis of her right arm, accompanied by systemic signs (fever, leucocytosis) and massive restriction of the motility of her right shoulder joint.
Eine 62jährige Patientin entwickelte eine eosinophile Zellulitis am rechten Arm mit Systemzeichen (Fieber, Leukozytose) und massiver Bewegungseinschränkung im rechten Schultergelenk.
[{"en": "eosinophilic cellulitis", "de": "eosinophile Zellulitis"}, {"en": "right arm", "de": "rechten Arm"}, {"en": "fever", "de": "Fieber"}, {"en": "leucocytosis", "de": "Leukozytose"}, {"en": "right shoulder joint", "de": "rechten Schultergelenk"}]
[{"en": "A", "de": "Eine"}, {"en": "62-year-old", "de": "62jährige"}, {"en": "woman", "de": "Patientin"}, {"en": "developed", "de": "entwickelte"}, {"en": "eosinophilic cellulitis", "de": "eosinophile Zellulitis"}, {"en": "right arm", "de": "rechten Arm"}, {"en": "systemic signs", "de": "Systemzeichen"}, {"en": "fever", "de": "Fieber"}, {"en": "leucocytosis", "de": "Leukozytose"}, {"en": "massive restriction", "de": "massiver Bewegungseinschränkung"}, {"en": "motility", "de": "Bewegung"}, {"en": "right shoulder joint", "de": "rechten Schultergelenk"}]

Sonography and computed tomography revealed massive cutaneous and subcutaneous oedema, and accumulations of fluid around the deep muscular fasciae, interstices and (less severe) within the joint.
Sonographisch und computertomographisch wurden neben einem Ödem von Haut und Fettgewebe auch ausgedehnte Flüssigkeitsansammlungen um die tiefen Muskelfaszien, in den Interstitien und - weniger ausgeprägt - im Schultergelenk nachgewiesen.
[{"en": "Sonography", "de": "Sonographisch"}, {"en": "computed tomography", "de": "computertomographisch"}, {"en": "cutaneous and subcutaneous oedema", "de": "Ödem von Haut und Fettgewebe"}, {"en": "accumulations of fluid", "de": "Flüssigkeitsansammlungen"}, {"en": "deep muscular fasciae", "de": "tiefen Muskelfaszien"}, {"en": "interstices", "de": "Interstitien"}, {"en": "joint", "de": "Schultergelenk"}]
[{"en": "Sonography", "de": "Sonographisch"}, {"en": "computed tomography", "de": "computertomographisch"}, {"en": "massive", "de": "ausgedehnte"}, {"en": "cutaneous", "de": "Haut"}, {"en": "subcutaneous", "de": "Fettgewebe"}, {"en": "oedema", "de": "Ödem"}, {"en": "accumulations", "de": "Flüssigkeitsansammlungen"}, {"en": "fluid", "de": "Flüssigkeits"}, {"en": "deep muscular fasciae", "de": "tiefen Muskelfaszien"}, {"en": "interstices", "de": "Interstitien"}, {"en": "joint", "de": "Schultergelenk"}]

High-dose systemic corticosteroid treatment led to rapid clearing of the skin lesions, and joint motility was restored several weeks later.
Unter systemischer Kortikoidtherapie kam es schnell zur Abheilung der Hautläsionen, im weiteren Verlauf auch zur Wiederherstellung der Beweglichkeit im Schultergelenk.
[{"en": "High-dose systemic corticosteroid treatment", "de": "systemischer Kortikoidtherapie"}, {"en": "skin lesions", "de": "Hautläsionen"}, {"en": "joint motility", "de": "Beweglichkeit im Schultergelenk"}]
[{"en": "High-dose", "de": "systemischer"}, {"en": "systemic", "de": "Kortikoidtherapie"}, {"en": "corticosteroid treatment", "de": "Kortikoidtherapie"}, {"en": "led to", "de": "kam es"}, {"en": "rapid", "de": "schnell"}, {"en": "clearing", "de": "Abheilung"}, {"en": "skin lesions", "de": "Hautläsionen"}, {"en": "joint motility", "de": "Beweglichkeit"}, {"en": "restored", "de": "Wiederherstellung"}, {"en": "several weeks later", "de": "im weiteren Verlauf"}]

This is the first case of eosinophilic cellulitis in which involvement of deep structures adjacent to joints has been demonstrated by modern imaging techniques.
Am beschriebenen Fall wurde erstmals mit modernen bildgebenden Verfahren eine Beteiligung gelenksnaher Strukturen im Rahmen einer eosinophilen Zellulitis nachgewiesen.
[{"en": "eosinophilic cellulitis", "de": "eosinophilen Zellulitis"}, {"en": "deep structures", "de": "gelenksnaher Strukturen"}, {"en": "modern imaging techniques", "de": "modernen bildgebenden Verfahren"}]
[{"en": "This is the first case", "de": "erstmals"}, {"en": "eosinophilic cellulitis", "de": "eosinophilen Zellulitis"}, {"en": "involvement", "de": "Beteiligung"}, {"en": "deep structures", "de": "gelenksnaher Strukturen"}, {"en": "adjacent to joints", "de": "gelenksnaher Strukturen"}, {"en": "demonstrated", "de": "nachgewiesen"}, {"en": "modern imaging techniques", "de": "modernen bildgebenden Verfahren"}]

Neoadjuvant chemotherapy with epirubicin and cyclophosphamide makes breast conserving therapy possible in patients with large tumors, which are primarily not suited for this treatment.
Die neoadjuvante Chemotherapie mit Epirubicin/Cyclophosphamid ermöglicht eine brusterhaltende Behandlung bei größeren Tumoren, die primär für eine brusterhaltende Behandlung nicht geeignet sind.
[{"en": "Neoadjuvant chemotherapy", "de": "neoadjuvante Chemotherapie"}, {"en": "epirubicin", "de": "Epirubicin"}, {"en": "cyclophosphamide", "de": "Cyclophosphamid"}, {"en": "breast conserving therapy", "de": "brusterhaltende Behandlung"}, {"en": "large tumors", "de": "größeren Tumoren"}]
[{"en": "Neoadjuvant chemotherapy", "de": "neoadjuvante Chemotherapie"}, {"en": "epirubicin", "de": "Epirubicin"}, {"en": "cyclophosphamide", "de": "Cyclophosphamid"}, {"en": "breast conserving therapy", "de": "brusterhaltende Behandlung"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "bei"}, {"en": "large tumors", "de": "größeren Tumoren"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Behandlung"}]

The regression of the tumor can be followed by mammography, ultrasound and MRI.
Die Rückbildung des Tumors läßt sich mit Mammographie, Ultraschall oder MRT verfolgen.
[{"en": "regression", "de": "Rückbildung"}, {"en": "tumor", "de": "Tumors"}, {"en": "mammography", "de": "Mammographie"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "Ultraschall"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}]

Mammography is reproducible and easily available.
Für die Mammographie spricht die gute Reproduzierbarkeit und Verfügbarkeit.
[{"en": "Mammography", "de": "Mammographie"}, {"en": "reproducible", "de": "gute Reproduzierbarkeit"}, {"en": "easily available", "de": "Verfügbarkeit"}]

Tumors, which cannot be measured mammographically, usually can be followed with ultrasound.
Mammographisch nicht abgrenzbare Tumoren können meist sonographisch dargestellt werden.
[{"en": "Tumors", "de": "Tumoren"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}]
[{"en": "Tumors", "de": "Tumoren"}, {"en": "cannot be measured", "de": "nicht abgrenzbare"}, {"en": "mammographically", "de": "Mammographisch"}, {"en": "usually", "de": "meist"}, {"en": "can be followed", "de": "können"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}]

MR allows imaging of the tumor independent of structure and density of the parenchyma.
In der MRT stellt sich die Tumorausdehnung unabhängig von Struktur und Dichte des Mammaparenchyms dar.
[{"en": "MR", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "tumor", "de": "Tumorausdehnung"}, {"en": "structure", "de": "Struktur"}, {"en": "density", "de": "Dichte"}, {"en": "parenchyma", "de": "Mammaparenchyms"}]

In addition the measurement of functional parameters is possible. - All methods are restricted in the imaging of tumor residuals after neoadjuvant chemotherapy, because imaging of small microscopic foci of invasive or even non invasive tumorresiduals is hardly possible.
Sie erlaubt zusätzlich die Erfassung funktioneller Parameter. - Die Bestimmung der Ausdehnung von Tumorresiduen nach neoadjuvanter Chemotherapie ist mit allen verfügbaren Methoden eingeschränkt, da sich mikroskopisch kleine invasive und insbesondere nichtinvasive Tumorreste kaum nachweisen lassen.
[{"en": "measurement", "de": "Erfassung"}, {"en": "functional parameters", "de": "funktioneller Parameter"}, {"en": "tumor residuals", "de": "Tumorresiduen"}, {"en": "neoadjuvant chemotherapy", "de": "neoadjuvanter Chemotherapie"}, {"en": "small microscopic foci", "de": "mikroskopisch kleine"}, {"en": "invasive", "de": "invasive"}, {"en": "non invasive", "de": "nichtinvasive"}]
[{"en": "In addition", "de": "zusätzlich"}, {"en": "measurement", "de": "Erfassung"}, {"en": "functional parameters", "de": "funktioneller Parameter"}, {"en": "All methods", "de": "allen verfügbaren Methoden"}, {"en": "restricted", "de": "eingeschränkt"}, {"en": "imaging", "de": "nachweisen"}, {"en": "tumor residuals", "de": "Tumorresiduen"}, {"en": "after", "de": "nach"}, {"en": "neoadjuvant chemotherapy", "de": "neoadjuvanter Chemotherapie"}, {"en": "small", "de": "mikroskopisch kleine"}, {"en": "invasive", "de": "invasive"}, {"en": "non invasive", "de": "nichtinvasive"}, {"en": "hardly possible", "de": "kaum"}]

They do not regress under chemotherapy, even if the invasive tumor regresses, and they typically hint for non invasive tumor residuals.
Diese bilden sich auch bei Rückbildung des invasiven Tumors nicht zurück und zeigen typischerweise intraduktale, nichtinvasive Tumorresiduen an.

Guillain Barré syndrome (GBS) is an acute, inflammatory, demyelinating disease of the peripheral nerve system.
Das Guillain-Barré-Syndrom (GBS) ist eine akute, entzündliche, demyelinisierende Erkrankung des peripheren Nervensystems.
[{"en": "Guillain Barré syndrome (GBS)", "de": "Guillain-Barré-Syndrom (GBS)"}, {"en": "acute, inflammatory, demyelinating disease", "de": "akute, entzündliche, demyelinisierende Erkrankung"}, {"en": "peripheral nerve system", "de": "peripheren Nervensystems"}]
[{"en": "Guillain Barré syndrome", "de": "Guillain-Barré-Syndrom"}, {"en": "GBS", "de": "GBS"}, {"en": "acute", "de": "akute"}, {"en": "inflammatory", "de": "entzündliche"}, {"en": "demyelinating", "de": "demyelinisierende"}, {"en": "disease", "de": "Erkrankung"}, {"en": "peripheral nerve system", "de": "peripheren Nervensystems"}]

Clinical hallmarks are symmetric muscle paralysis, areflexia and pronouced autonomic disturbances.
Die Erkrankung präsentiert sich klinisch mit symmetrischen Lähmungen, Areflexie und ausgeprägten vegetativen Störungen.
[{"en": "symmetric muscle paralysis", "de": "symmetrischen Lähmungen"}, {"en": "areflexia", "de": "Areflexie"}, {"en": "autonomic disturbances", "de": "vegetativen Störungen"}]

Respiratory failure and cardiovascular instability are the main reasons for intensive care support in patients with GBS.
Respiratorisches Versagen und kardiovaskuläre Instabilität sind die Hauptgründe für die Verlegung eines Patienten mit GBS auf die Intensivstation.
[{"en": "Respiratory failure", "de": "Respiratorisches Versagen"}, {"en": "cardiovascular instability", "de": "kardiovaskuläre Instabilität"}, {"en": "intensive care support", "de": "Intensivstation"}, {"en": "patients with GBS", "de": "Patienten mit GBS"}]

The present report of a 33 year old man with Miller-Fisher syndrome, a variant of the GBS, discusses the management of patients with GBS in the intensive care unit.

In order to prevent dissections in large coronary vessels (>=2.5 mm), we evaluated stent implantation without predilatation in 98 selected patients with favorable coronary anatomy and lesion morphology.
Stentimplantation ohne Vordehnung erscheint bei morphologisch geeigneten Stenosen in der Lage, eine entstehende Dissektion sofort anzulegen und damit zu verhindern.

There is a world-wide renaissance of neurosurgical treatments of Parkinson's disease (PD), based on substantial progress in basic sciences.

A model of parallel motor circuitry has identified potential targets for lesioning by clarifying the pathophysiological role of the basal ganglia in PD.

Subacute encephalopathy with seizures in alcoholics (SESA syndrome) is a rare disease entity following chronic alcohol ingestion.
Subakute Enzephalopathie mit epileptischen Anfällen bei Patienten mit chronischem Al-koholismus (SESA-Syndrom) ist neben häufigeren Erkrankungen wie Delirium tremens, Alkoholentzugskrampf, Wernicke-Korsakow-Syndrom, zentraler pontiner Myelinolyse und Marchiafava-Bignami-Syndrom eine seltene Alkoholfolgekrankheit.

It is rare for solitary basal cell cancer not to be associated with the naevoid basal cell carcinoma syndrome (NBCCS), xeroderma pigmentosum, an organoid nevus or X-ray therapy in children (to date 86 cases have been documented in the literature).
Solitäre Basaliome im Kindes- und Jugendalter ohne Assoziation mit einem Basalzellnaevussyndrom (BZNS), einem Xeroderma pigmentosum, einem organoiden Naevus oder im Anschluß an eine Radiotherapie sind sehr selten (bisher 86 Fälle in der Weltliteratur).
[{"en": "solitary basal cell cancer", "de": "Solitäre Basaliome"}, {"en": "naevoid basal cell carcinoma syndrome (NBCCS)", "de": "Basalzellnaevussyndrom (BZNS)"}, {"en": "xeroderma pigmentosum", "de": "Xeroderma pigmentosum"}, {"en": "organoid nevus", "de": "organoiden Naevus"}, {"en": "X-ray therapy", "de": "Radiotherapie"}]
[{"en": "rare", "de": "sehr selten"}, {"en": "solitary basal cell cancer", "de": "Solitäre Basaliome"}, {"en": "not to be associated", "de": "ohne Assoziation"}, {"en": "naevoid basal cell carcinoma syndrome", "de": "Basalzellnaevussyndrom"}, {"en": "NBCCS", "de": "BZNS"}, {"en": "xeroderma pigmentosum", "de": "Xeroderma pigmentosum"}, {"en": "organoid nevus", "de": "organoiden Naevus"}, {"en": "X-ray therapy", "de": "Radiotherapie"}, {"en": "children", "de": "Kindes- und Jugendalter"}, {"en": "86 cases", "de": "86 Fälle"}, {"en": "literature", "de": "Weltliteratur"}]

Aetiologically, the tumours might be a forme fruste of the NBCCS or they might follow a somatic point mutation of keratinocytes.
Ätiologisch könnte es sich um eine Abortivform des BZNS oder um die Folge einer somatischen Punktmutation von Keratinozyten handeln.
[{"en": "Aetiologically", "de": "Ätiologisch"}, {"en": "tumours", "de": "Abortivform"}, {"en": "NBCCS", "de": "BZNS"}, {"en": "somatic point mutation", "de": "somatischen Punktmutation"}, {"en": "keratinocytes", "de": "Keratinozyten"}]

Up to now, data on the repair mechanism following UV-induced DNA damage are not available in these patients.
Untersuchungen über Reparaturmechanismen UV-induzierter DNA-Schäden liegen bei diesen Patienten bisher nicht vor.

We report on a 10-year-old boy with a solitary nodular basal cell cancer in the right malar region.
Es wird über einen 10jährigen Jungen berichtet mit einem solitären nodulären Basaliom der rechten Infraorbitalregion.

Neither the patient's history nor the clinical findings suggested a genetic disposition to development of the tumour.

An immunohistochemical and morphometric study was performed on bone marrow biopsies in 604 patients with chronic myelogenous leukemia (CML) to compare morphological and clinical features and to evaluate effects of interferon (IFN) and chemotherapy.
Bei 604 Patienten mit einer chronischen myeloischen Leuk‰mie (CML) wurde anhand von Beckenkammbiopsien eine immunhistochemische und morphometrische Studie durchgef¸hrt, um morphologische und klinische Befunde miteinander zu vergleichen und die Auswirkungen der Interferon- (IFN) und Chemotherapie abzukl‰ren.
[{"en": "immunohistochemical and morphometric study", "de": "immunhistochemische und morphometrische Studie"}, {"en": "bone marrow biopsies", "de": "Beckenkammbiopsien"}, {"en": "chronic myelogenous leukemia (CML)", "de": "chronischen myeloischen Leuk‰mie (CML)"}, {"en": "morphological and clinical features", "de": "morphologische und klinische Befunde"}, {"en": "interferon (IFN)", "de": "Interferon- (IFN)"}, {"en": "chemotherapy", "de": "Chemotherapie"}]
[{"en": "immunohistochemical and morphometric study", "de": "immunhistochemische und morphometrische Studie"}, {"en": "bone marrow biopsies", "de": "Beckenkammbiopsien"}, {"en": "in", "de": "Bei"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "to compare", "de": "zu vergleichen"}, {"en": "morphological and clinical features", "de": "morphologische und klinische Befunde"}, {"en": "and to evaluate", "de": "und"}, {"en": "effects", "de": "Auswirkungen"}, {"en": "interferon (IFN)", "de": "Interferon- (IFN)"}, {"en": "and chemotherapy", "de": "Chemotherapie"}]

Following morphometry significant correlations were calculated between number of CD61+ megakaryocytes, including their precursors with fiber density.
Anhand der morphometrischen Analyse konnten signifikante Korrelationen zwischen der Anzahl CD61+-Megakaryozyten einschlieﬂlich ihrer Vorl‰uferzellen mit der Faserdichte berechnet werden.
[{"en": "morphometry", "de": "morphometrischen Analyse"}, {"en": "CD61+ megakaryocytes", "de": "CD61+-Megakaryozyten"}, {"en": "fiber density", "de": "Faserdichte"}]
[{"en": "Following", "de": "Anhand"}, {"en": "morphometry", "de": "morphometrischen Analyse"}, {"en": "significant correlations", "de": "signifikante Korrelationen"}, {"en": "number", "de": "Anzahl"}, {"en": "CD61+", "de": "CD61+"}, {"en": "megakaryocytes", "de": "Megakaryozyten"}, {"en": "including", "de": "einschlieﬂlich"}, {"en": "their precursors", "de": "ihrer Vorl‰uferzellen"}, {"en": "fiber density", "de": "Faserdichte"}]

This finding is in line with the close functional relationship between megakaryopoiesis and fibroblasts regarding the complex pathomechanism of myelofibrosis.
Dieser Befund spiegelt die enge funktionelle Beziehung zwischen der Megakaryopoese und den Fibroblasten im Hinblick auf den komplexen Pathomechanismus der Myelofibroseentstehung wider.
[{"en": "megakaryopoiesis", "de": "Megakaryopoese"}, {"en": "fibroblasts", "de": "Fibroblasten"}, {"en": "myelofibrosis", "de": "Myelofibroseentstehung"}, {"en": "pathomechanism", "de": "Pathomechanismus"}]

The latter was observed in about 28% of patients already at diagnosis.
Diese war bei etwa 28% der Patienten bereits zum Diagnosezeitpunkt zu beobachten.

In a similar way, the frequency of CD68+ macrophages was correlated with the amount of Ret40f+ nucleated erythroid precursors, implicating an involvement of this cell lineage in iron turnover, hemoglobin synthesis, and degradation of the expelled nuclei from normoblasts.
In ‰hnlicher Weise war die Anzahl der CD68+-Makrophagen mit der Menge an Ret40f+-kernhaltigen erythropoetischen Vorl‰uferzellen korreliert, was durch die Einbindung dieser Zellinie in den Eisenstoffwechsel, die H‰moglobinsynthese sowie den Abbau der ausgestoﬂenen Normoblastenkerne in Zusammenhang gebracht werden kann.

Die (-D-Galaktosylreste-expremierende) Pseudo-Gaucherzellen lieﬂen sich in 30% der Biopsien vor Behandlung nachweisen.

Sequential biopsies in 173 patients with monotherapy by IFN, hydroxyurea (HU), or busulfan (BU) revealed a fibrogenic effect of IFN in contrast to a fiber-reducing property of HU.
Sequenzbiopsien an 173 Patienten, die eine Monotherapie mit IFN, Hydroxyurea (HU) oder Busulfan (BU) erhielten, zeigten einen fibrogenetischen Effekt von IFN im Gegensatz zu einer eher faserreduzierenden Eigenschaft von HU.

Histological subgroups showed a transition from a (nonfibrotic) granulocytic and megakaryocyte pattern to the myelofibrotic subtype in about 40% of patients.

This change was opposed to a numerical reduction in the myelofibrotic subtype which occurred in 17 patients (36%), but predominantly in those under HU therapy.

In conclusion, the striking heterogeneity of bone marrow features in CML warrants a careful morphological evaluation of trephine biopsies and appropriate means of processing to achieve relevant correlations with clinical data and, thus, allows a more elaborate insight into the dynamics of the disease process.
Zusammengefaﬂt erfordert die auffallende Heterogenit‰t der Knochenmarkbefunde bei der CML eine sorgf‰ltige morphologische Auswertung von Biopsien mit geeigneten Methoden, um relevante Korrelationen zwischen klinischen Daten zu berechnen und somit einen besseren Einblick in die Dynamik der Krankheitsentwicklung zu gewinnen.

Psychic disorders were studied with a naturalistic design in 125 consecutive patients of a medical-geriatric department in a general hospital.

The other 74 patients underwent these diagnostic procedures including clinical investigation and three screening-scales (Geriatric Depression Scale (11);
Die übrigen 74 Patienten wurden klinisch und mit Screening-Skalen (Geriatric Depression Scale (11);
[{"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "diagnostic procedures", "de": "klinisch"}, {"en": "clinical investigation", "de": "klinisch"}, {"en": "screening-scales", "de": "Screening-Skalen"}, {"en": "Geriatric Depression Scale", "de": "Geriatric Depression Scale"}]
[{"en": "The other", "de": "Die übrigen"}, {"en": "74 patients", "de": "74 Patienten"}, {"en": "underwent", "de": "wurden"}, {"en": "diagnostic procedures", "de": "klinisch"}, {"en": "clinical investigation", "de": "klinisch"}, {"en": "screening-scales", "de": "Screening-Skalen"}, {"en": "Geriatric Depression Scale", "de": "Geriatric Depression Scale"}]

Dementia was detected or excluded by neuropsychological tests.
Dementielle Entwicklungen wurden ggf. durch neuropsychologische Testungen nachgewiesen oder ausgeschlossen.
[{"en": "Dementia", "de": "Dementielle Entwicklungen"}, {"en": "neuropsychological tests", "de": "neuropsychologische Testungen"}]
[{"en": "Dementia", "de": "Dementielle Entwicklungen"}, {"en": "detected", "de": "nachgewiesen"}, {"en": "excluded", "de": "ausgeschlossen"}, {"en": "neuropsychological tests", "de": "neuropsychologische Testungen"}]

Psychic disorders were found in 41 patients, mostly adaptation disorders and depressions, the disorder was estimated to be relevant for the whole hospital therapy.
Bei 41 Patienten wurden psychische Störungen von Krankheitswert (meist Anpassungsstörungen oder Depression) gefunden, bei über der Hälfte davon war die Störung relevant für die Gesamtbehandlung in der Klinik.
[{"en": "Psychic disorders", "de": "psychische Störungen"}, {"en": "adaptation disorders", "de": "Anpassungsstörungen"}, {"en": "depressions", "de": "Depression"}, {"en": "hospital therapy", "de": "Gesamtbehandlung in der Klinik"}]
[{"en": "Psychic disorders", "de": "psychische Störungen"}, {"en": "41 patients", "de": "41 Patienten"}, {"en": "mostly", "de": "meist"}, {"en": "adaptation disorders", "de": "Anpassungsstörungen"}, {"en": "depressions", "de": "Depression"}, {"en": "disorder", "de": "Störung"}, {"en": "hospital therapy", "de": "Gesamtbehandlung in der Klinik"}]

The screening instruments turned out to be reliable, so they can be recommended for further use.
Die eingesetzten Screening-Instrumente erwiesen sich als zuverlässig, so daß sie für den weiteren Einsatz empfohlen werden können.
[{"en": "screening instruments", "de": "Screening-Instrumente"}, {"en": "reliable", "de": "zuverlässig"}, {"en": "further use", "de": "weiteren Einsatz"}]
[{"en": "The", "de": "Die"}, {"en": "screening instruments", "de": "Screening-Instrumente"}, {"en": "turned out to be", "de": "erwiesen sich als"}, {"en": "reliable", "de": "zuverlässig"}, {"en": "so", "de": "so"}, {"en": "they", "de": "sie"}, {"en": "can be", "de": "können"}, {"en": "recommended", "de": "empfohlen"}, {"en": "for further use", "de": "für den weiteren Einsatz"}]

Difficult to answer remains the question, how the treatment of the psychic disorders - in our sample necessary for each 5th to 6th patient - can be implemented in a medical-geriatric department.
Offen bleibt aber, wie die nach diesem Resultat bei jedem 5. bis 6. Patienten erforderliche Therapie der psychischen Störung im Setting einer medizinisch-geriatrischen Abteilung gewährleistet werden kann.
[{"en": "treatment", "de": "Therapie"}, {"en": "psychic disorders", "de": "psychischen Störung"}, {"en": "medical-geriatric department", "de": "medizinisch-geriatrischen Abteilung"}]
[{"en": "Difficult to answer", "de": "Offen bleibt"}, {"en": "the question", "de": "aber"}, {"en": "the treatment", "de": "Therapie"}, {"en": "psychic disorders", "de": "psychischen Störung"}, {"en": "our sample", "de": "diesem Resultat"}, {"en": "patient", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "implemented", "de": "gewährleistet werden kann"}, {"en": "medical-geriatric department", "de": "medizinisch-geriatrischen Abteilung"}]

Involvement of the sacroiliac joints is a hallmark of the spondyloarthropathies, especially in ankylosing spondylitis.
Die entzündliche Beteiligung der Sakroiliakalgelenke ist das Schlüsselsymptom der Spondylarthropathien, vor allem bei der ankylosierenden Spondylitis.
[{"en": "sacroiliac joints", "de": "Sakroiliakalgelenke"}, {"en": "spondyloarthropathies", "de": "Spondylarthropathien"}, {"en": "ankylosing spondylitis", "de": "ankylosierenden Spondylitis"}]
[{"en": "Involvement", "de": "Beteiligung"}, {"en": "sacroiliac joints", "de": "Sakroiliakalgelenke"}, {"en": "hallmark", "de": "Schlüsselsymptom"}, {"en": "spondyloarthropathies", "de": "Spondylarthropathien"}, {"en": "especially", "de": "vor allem"}, {"en": "ankylosing spondylitis", "de": "ankylosierenden Spondylitis"}]

The conventional diagnostic imaging of sacroiliitis in early stages might cause problems, because sensitivity of conventional radiographic methods is known to be too low in early stages of the disease.
Die konventionelle bildgebende Diagnostik der Sakroiliitis gilt in den Frühstadien als problematisch, da die Sensitivität konventioneller Röntgenaufnahmen hier sehr gering ist.
[{"en": "conventional diagnostic imaging", "de": "konventionelle bildgebende Diagnostik"}, {"en": "sacroiliitis", "de": "Sakroiliitis"}, {"en": "early stages", "de": "Frühstadien"}, {"en": "sensitivity", "de": "Sensitivität"}, {"en": "conventional radiographic methods", "de": "konventioneller Röntgenaufnahmen"}]
[{"en": "conventional", "de": "konventionelle"}, {"en": "diagnostic imaging", "de": "bildgebende Diagnostik"}, {"en": "sacroiliitis", "de": "Sakroiliitis"}, {"en": "early stages", "de": "Frühstadien"}, {"en": "cause problems", "de": "problematisch"}, {"en": "sensitivity", "de": "Sensitivität"}, {"en": "conventional radiographic methods", "de": "konventioneller Röntgenaufnahmen"}, {"en": "low", "de": "gering"}]

Magnetic resonance imaging of the sacroiliac joints certainly enables one to detect acute as well as chronic inflammatory changes in all stages of the disease.
Die Magnetresonanztomographie der Sakroiliakalgelenke ist in der Lage, sowohl akut entzündliche als auch chronische Veränderungen in allen Stadien zu erfassen.
[{"en": "Magnetic resonance imaging", "de": "Magnetresonanztomographie"}, {"en": "sacroiliac joints", "de": "Sakroiliakalgelenke"}, {"en": "acute", "de": "akut entzündliche"}, {"en": "chronic inflammatory changes", "de": "chronische Veränderungen"}, {"en": "stages of the disease", "de": "allen Stadien"}]
[{"en": "Magnetic resonance imaging", "de": "Magnetresonanztomographie"}, {"en": "sacroiliac joints", "de": "Sakroiliakalgelenke"}, {"en": "detect", "de": "erfassen"}, {"en": "acute", "de": "akut"}, {"en": "chronic", "de": "chronische"}, {"en": "all stages", "de": "allen Stadien"}, {"en": "disease", "de": "Stadien"}]

The potential disadvantages of this method are the dependency on the examiner, the lack of standardization, and the relatively high costs.
Mögliche Nachteile dieser Methode sind Untersucherabhängigkeit, bislang fehlende Standardisierung sowie die noch relativ hohen Kosten.
[{"en": "potential disadvantages", "de": "Mögliche Nachteile"}, {"en": "method", "de": "Methode"}, {"en": "dependency on the examiner", "de": "Untersucherabhängigkeit"}, {"en": "lack of standardization", "de": "bislang fehlende Standardisierung"}, {"en": "relatively high costs", "de": "noch relativ hohen Kosten"}]
[{"en": "The potential disadvantages", "de": "Mögliche Nachteile"}, {"en": "of this method", "de": "dieser Methode"}, {"en": "the dependency", "de": "Untersucherabhängigkeit"}, {"en": "the lack of standardization", "de": "bislang fehlende Standardisierung"}, {"en": "relatively high costs", "de": "noch relativ hohen Kosten"}]

Therefore, the "Workgroup of Diagnostic Imaging in Rheumatology of the Regional Center of Rheumatology of Berlin" including experienced rheumatologists, skeletal radiologists, and orthopedists acquired an imaging graduation for detection of sacroiliitis in consideration of the clinical background, the technical details of the methods, questions of ionizing radiation exposure, and cost effectiveness.
Deshalb hat der "Arbeitskreis bildgebende Diagnostik in der Rheumatologie des Regionalen Rheumazentrums Berlin", welcher sich aus erfahrenen Rheumatologen, Skelettradiologen und Orthopäden zusammensetzt, eine Übersicht der bildgebenden Diagnostik der Sakroiliitis erarbeitet, in welcher neben dem klinischen Hintergrund auch technische Details ausgeführt und Strahlenexposition und Kosteneffektivität berücksichtigt werden.
[{"en": "Workgroup of Diagnostic Imaging in Rheumatology of the Regional Center of Rheumatology of Berlin", "de": "Arbeitskreis bildgebende Diagnostik in der Rheumatologie des Regionalen Rheumazentrums Berlin"}, {"en": "rheumatologists", "de": "Rheumatologen"}, {"en": "skeletal radiologists", "de": "Skelettradiologen"}, {"en": "orthopedists", "de": "Orthopäden"}, {"en": "imaging graduation", "de": "bildgebende Diagnostik"}, {"en": "sacroiliitis", "de": "Sakroiliitis"}, {"en": "ionizing radiation exposure", "de": "Strahlenexposition"}, {"en": "cost effectiveness", "de": "Kosteneffektivität"}]
[{"en": "Therefore", "de": "Deshalb"}, {"en": "Workgroup of Diagnostic Imaging in Rheumatology", "de": "Arbeitskreis bildgebende Diagnostik in der Rheumatologie"}, {"en": "Regional Center of Rheumatology of Berlin", "de": "Regionalen Rheumazentrums Berlin"}, {"en": "experienced", "de": "erfahrenen"}, {"en": "rheumatologists", "de": "Rheumatologen"}, {"en": "skeletal radiologists", "de": "Skelettradiologen"}, {"en": "orthopedists", "de": "Orthopäden"}, {"en": "imaging graduation", "de": "bildgebenden Diagnostik"}, {"en": "detection", "de": "Diagnostik"}, {"en": "sacroiliitis", "de": "Sakroiliitis"}, {"en": "clinical background", "de": "klinischen Hintergrund"}, {"en": "technical details", "de": "technische Details"}, {"en": "ionizing radiation exposure", "de": "Strahlenexposition"}, {"en": "cost effectiveness", "de": "Kosteneffektivität"}]

Hyperimmunoglobulin E syndrome (Hiob syndrome or Buckley syndrome) is a rare disorder of the immune system that can show characteristic manifestations in the head and neck.
Das Hyperimmunglobulin-E-Syndrom (Job's Syndrom, Hiob-Syndrom, Buckley-Syndrom) ist eine seltene Erkrankung des Immunsystems, die im HNO-Bereich charakteristische Manifestationen zeigen kann.
[{"en": "Hyperimmunoglobulin E syndrome", "de": "Hyperimmunglobulin-E-Syndrom"}, {"en": "Hiob syndrome", "de": "Hiob-Syndrom"}, {"en": "Buckley syndrome", "de": "Buckley-Syndrom"}, {"en": "immune system", "de": "Immunsystems"}, {"en": "head and neck", "de": "HNO-Bereich"}]
[{"en": "Hyperimmunoglobulin E syndrome", "de": "Hyperimmunglobulin-E-Syndrom"}, {"en": "Hiob syndrome", "de": "Hiob-Syndrom"}, {"en": "Buckley syndrome", "de": "Buckley-Syndrom"}, {"en": "rare", "de": "seltene"}, {"en": "disorder", "de": "Erkrankung"}, {"en": "immune system", "de": "Immunsystems"}, {"en": "characteristic manifestations", "de": "charakteristische Manifestationen"}, {"en": "head and neck", "de": "HNO-Bereich"}]

Typical symptoms are fever, recurrent urticarial rashes, lymphadenitis, and bacterial infections of the skin and various parenchymatous organs.
Das Krankheitsbild ist gekennzeichnet durch rezidivierende urtikarielle Exantheme, Fieber, Lymphadenitis, Hyperplasie lymphatischer Organe und bakteriellen Haut- und Organinfektionen.
[{"en": "fever", "de": "Fieber"}, {"en": "recurrent urticarial rashes", "de": "rezidivierende urtikarielle Exantheme"}, {"en": "lymphadenitis", "de": "Lymphadenitis"}, {"en": "bacterial infections", "de": "bakteriellen Haut- und Organinfektionen"}, {"en": "skin", "de": "Haut"}, {"en": "parenchymatous organs", "de": "lymphatischer Organe"}]
[{"en": "Typical symptoms", "de": "Das Krankheitsbild"}, {"en": "fever", "de": "Fieber"}, {"en": "recurrent urticarial rashes", "de": "rezidivierende urtikarielle Exantheme"}, {"en": "lymphadenitis", "de": "Lymphadenitis"}, {"en": "bacterial infections", "de": "bakteriellen"}, {"en": "skin", "de": "Haut"}, {"en": "organs", "de": "Organinfektionen"}]

Diagnosis is established by elevated serum IgE concentrations with the absence of any signs of allergy or parasitic disease.
Diagnostisch richtungsweisend sind stark erhöhte IgE-Konzentrationen im Serum beim gleichzeitigem Fehlen von Hinweisen auf allergische und parasitäre Erkrankungen.
[{"en": "Diagnosis", "de": "Diagnostisch"}, {"en": "elevated serum IgE concentrations", "de": "erhöhte IgE-Konzentrationen im Serum"}, {"en": "absence", "de": "Fehlen"}, {"en": "signs of allergy", "de": "Hinweisen auf allergische"}, {"en": "parasitic disease", "de": "parasitäre Erkrankungen"}]
[{"en": "Diagnosis", "de": "Diagnostisch"}, {"en": "established", "de": "richtungsweisend"}, {"en": "elevated", "de": "erhöhte"}, {"en": "serum", "de": "Serum"}, {"en": "IgE concentrations", "de": "IgE-Konzentrationen"}, {"en": "absence", "de": "Fehlen"}, {"en": "signs", "de": "Hinweisen"}, {"en": "allergy", "de": "allergische"}, {"en": "parasitic disease", "de": "parasitäre Erkrankungen"}]

High-dose intravenous immunoglobulin therapy (IVIG) was found to be well-tolerated and effective.
Therapeutisch erwies sich eine Behandlung mit hochdosiertem intravenösem Immunglobulin (IVIG) als ausgezeichnet verträglich und gut wirksam.
[{"en": "High-dose intravenous immunoglobulin therapy", "de": "hochdosiertem intravenösem Immunglobulin"}, {"en": "IVIG", "de": "IVIG"}, {"en": "well-tolerated", "de": "ausgezeichnet verträglich"}, {"en": "effective", "de": "gut wirksam"}]

More than one year after a single course of immunoglobin therapy symptoms markedly improved.
Mehr als ein Jahr nach der einmaligen Therapie ist die Symptomatik anhaltend gebessert.
[{"en": "one year", "de": "ein Jahr"}, {"en": "immunoglobin therapy", "de": "Therapie"}, {"en": "symptoms", "de": "Symptomatik"}, {"en": "improved", "de": "gebessert"}]

Current knowledge and therapeutic options in hyper IgE syndrome are discussed.
Der derzeitige Kenntnisstand und die zur Verfügung stehenden Therapieoptionen beim Hyper-IgE-Syndrom werden dargestellt und diskutiert.

We recommend that IVIG be considered as one of the first choices in the treatment of hyper IgE syndrome.
Beim Hyper-IgE-Syndrom sollte ein Therapieversuch mit IVIG eine Option der ersten Wahl darstellen.

Quality of life was evaluated with the Gastrointestinal Quality of Life Index (GIQLI).
Die vorliegende Arbeit präsentiert die Ergebnisse nach laparoskopischer "floppy Nissen"-Fundoplicatio bei 70 Patienten anhand von Lebensqualitätsdaten 3 Jahre nach der Operation.
[{"en": "Quality of life", "de": "Lebensqualitätsdaten"}]
[{"en": "Quality of life", "de": "Lebensqualitätsdaten"}, {"en": "evaluated", "de": "präsentiert die Ergebnisse"}, {"en": "Gastrointestinal Quality of Life Index", "de": "laparoskopischer \"floppy Nissen\"-Fundoplicatio"}]

There was no difference detectable in the subdimensions of GIQLI.
Die einzelnen Subdimensionen des GLQI verzeichnen entsprechende Punktescores.
[{"en": "subdimensions", "de": "Subdimensionen"}, {"en": "GIQLI", "de": "GLQI"}]

Ninety-eight percent of the patients estimated their satisfaction with the procedure as excellent or good and would undergo surgery again if necessary.
Über 98 % aller Patienten beurteilen den Erfolg der Operation mit sehr gut oder gut und würden sich gegebenenfalls einer neuerlichen Antirefluxoperation unterziehen.
[{"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "satisfaction", "de": "Erfolg"}, {"en": "procedure", "de": "Operation"}, {"en": "excellent or good", "de": "sehr gut oder gut"}, {"en": "surgery", "de": "Antirefluxoperation"}]

Four patients suffered from minimal side effects from the procedure, but had no decrease in their quality of life.
Anhaltende, jedoch die Lebensqualität nicht beeinträchtigende Nebeneffekte der Operation wurden von 4 Patienten angegeben.
[{"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "side effects", "de": "Nebeneffekte"}, {"en": "procedure", "de": "Operation"}, {"en": "quality of life", "de": "Lebensqualität"}]
[{"en": "Four patients", "de": "4 Patienten"}, {"en": "side effects", "de": "Nebeneffekte"}, {"en": "procedure", "de": "Operation"}, {"en": "no decrease", "de": "nicht beeinträchtigende"}, {"en": "quality of life", "de": "Lebensqualität"}]

None of the patients needed antireflux medications postoperatively.
Kein Patient benötigte eine erneute medikamentöse Antirefluxtherapie.
[{"en": "patients", "de": "Patient"}, {"en": "antireflux medications", "de": "medikamentöse Antirefluxtherapie"}, {"en": "postoperatively", "de": "erneute"}]

Laparoscopic redo-fundoplication was performed in two patients 3 months after initial surgery because of persisting dysphagia.
Eine laparoskopische Refundoplicatio war aufgrund einer persistierenden Dysphagie in 2 Fällen innerhalb der ersten 3 postoperativen Monate notwendig.
[{"en": "Laparoscopic redo-fundoplication", "de": "laparoskopische Refundoplicatio"}, {"en": "two patients", "de": "2 Fällen"}, {"en": "3 months", "de": "ersten 3 postoperativen Monate"}, {"en": "initial surgery", "de": "postoperativen"}, {"en": "persisting dysphagia", "de": "persistierenden Dysphagie"}]
