We studied nine explanted allografted kidneys of sex-mismatched donors by means of non-isotopic in situ hybridization (NISH).
Vor diesem Hintergrund untersuchten wir 9 explantierte Transplantatnieren gegengeschlechtlicher Spender mit Hilfe der nichtradioaktiven In-situ-Hybridisierung (NISH).
[{"en": "explanted allografted kidneys", "de": "explantierte Transplantatnieren"}, {"en": "sex-mismatched donors", "de": "gegengeschlechtlicher Spender"}, {"en": "non-isotopic in situ hybridization", "de": "nichtradioaktiven In-situ-Hybridisierung"}, {"en": "NISH", "de": "NISH"}]
[{"en": "We studied", "de": "untersuchten wir"}, {"en": "nine", "de": "9"}, {"en": "allografted kidneys", "de": "Transplantatnieren"}, {"en": "sex-mismatched donors", "de": "gegengeschlechtlicher Spender"}, {"en": "by means of", "de": "mit Hilfe der"}, {"en": "non-isotopic in situ hybridization", "de": "nichtradioaktiven In-situ-Hybridisierung"}, {"en": "NISH", "de": "NISH"}]

We used biotinylated centromer-specific DNA probes of the human chromosomes Y and X. In a further step, monoclonal and polyclonal antibodies against CD45, CD3, CD20, CD31, CD1a, S100, -actin, factor VIII and UEA were used to analyse the various infiltrating cell types and the cells involved in allograft arteriopathy.
Wir benutzten biotinilierte zentromerspezifische DNA-Sonden für das humane Chromosom Y und X. In einem weiteren Schritt wurden mono- bzw. polyklonale Antikörper gegen CD45, CD3, CD20, CD31, CD1a, S100, -Aktin, Faktor VIII und UEA eingesetzt, um die infiltrierenden Zellen und die an der Transplantatvaskulopathie beteiligten Zellen zu charakterisieren.
[{"en": "biotinylated centromer-specific DNA probes", "de": "biotinilierte zentromerspezifische DNA-Sonden"}, {"en": "human chromosomes Y and X", "de": "humane Chromosom Y und X"}, {"en": "monoclonal and polyclonal antibodies", "de": "mono- bzw. polyklonale Antikörper"}, {"en": "CD45, CD3, CD20, CD31, CD1a, S100, -actin, factor VIII and UEA", "de": "CD45, CD3, CD20, CD31, CD1a, S100, -Aktin, Faktor VIII und UEA"}, {"en": "infiltrating cell types", "de": "infiltrierenden Zellen"}, {"en": "allograft arteriopathy", "de": "Transplantatvaskulopathie"}]
[{"en": "We used", "de": "Wir benutzten"}, {"en": "biotinylated", "de": "biotinilierte"}, {"en": "centromer-specific", "de": "zentromerspezifische"}, {"en": "DNA probes", "de": "DNA-Sonden"}, {"en": "human chromosomes", "de": "humane Chromosom"}, {"en": "Y and X", "de": "Y und X"}, {"en": "In a further step", "de": "In einem weiteren Schritt"}, {"en": "monoclonal and polyclonal antibodies", "de": "mono- bzw. polyklonale Antikörper"}, {"en": "CD45, CD3, CD20, CD31, CD1a, S100, -actin, factor VIII and UEA", "de": "CD45, CD3, CD20, CD31, CD1a, S100, -Aktin, Faktor VIII und UEA"}, {"en": "analyse", "de": "charakterisieren"}, {"en": "various infiltrating cell types", "de": "infiltrierenden Zellen"}, {"en": "cells involved in allograft arteriopathy", "de": "an der Transplantatvaskulopathie beteiligten Zellen"}]

Our study showed that up to several years after transplantation the glomerular, tubular and endothelial cells retained donor origin.
Unsere Studie konnte zeigen, daß auch mehrere Jahre nach Transplantation die glomerulären, tubulären und endothelialen Zellen das Geschlecht des Spenders beibehielten.
[{"en": "study", "de": "Studie"}, {"en": "transplantation", "de": "Transplantation"}, {"en": "glomerular", "de": "glomerulären"}, {"en": "tubular", "de": "tubulären"}, {"en": "endothelial cells", "de": "endothelialen Zellen"}, {"en": "donor origin", "de": "Geschlecht des Spenders"}]
[{"en": "Our study", "de": "Unsere Studie"}, {"en": "showed", "de": "konnte zeigen"}, {"en": "up to several years", "de": "mehrere Jahre"}, {"en": "after transplantation", "de": "nach Transplantation"}, {"en": "glomerular", "de": "glomerulären"}, {"en": "tubular", "de": "tubulären"}, {"en": "endothelial cells", "de": "endothelialen Zellen"}, {"en": "donor origin", "de": "Geschlecht des Spenders"}]

The only cells of recipient origin were the inflammatory cells, predominantly macrophages and T lymphocytes.
Die einzigen im Transplantat nachweisbaren Empfängerzellen waren die Entzündungszellen, die sich vornehmlich aus T-Lymphozyten und Makrophagen zusammensetzen.
[{"en": "recipient origin", "de": "Empfängerzellen"}, {"en": "inflammatory cells", "de": "Entzündungszellen"}, {"en": "macrophages", "de": "Makrophagen"}, {"en": "T lymphocytes", "de": "T-Lymphozyten"}]
[{"en": "The only", "de": "Die einzigen"}, {"en": "recipient", "de": "Empfänger"}, {"en": "origin", "de": "nachweisbaren"}, {"en": "inflammatory cells", "de": "Entzündungszellen"}, {"en": "predominantly", "de": "vornehmlich"}, {"en": "macrophages", "de": "Makrophagen"}, {"en": "T lymphocytes", "de": "T-Lymphozyten"}]

In 1991 the diagnosis of cerebral circulatory arrest with Doppler sonography was accepted by the Medical Council of the Bundesaerztekammer as one of the methods able to shorten the waiting time for fulfilling the criteria for diagnosis of cerebral death.
1991 wurde die dopplersonographische Feststellung des zerebralen Kreislaufstillstandes als eine der die Wartezeit bis zur endgültigen Diagnose des Hirntodes abkürzende Methode vom Wissenschaftlichen Beirat der Bundesärztekammer anerkannt.
[{"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Feststellung"}, {"en": "cerebral circulatory arrest", "de": "zerebralen Kreislaufstillstandes"}, {"en": "Doppler sonography", "de": "dopplersonographische"}, {"en": "Medical Council", "de": "Wissenschaftlichen Beirat"}, {"en": "Bundesaerztekammer", "de": "Bundesärztekammer"}, {"en": "criteria", "de": "Wartezeit"}, {"en": "cerebral death", "de": "Hirntodes"}]
[{"en": "In 1991", "de": "1991"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Feststellung"}, {"en": "cerebral circulatory arrest", "de": "zerebralen Kreislaufstillstandes"}, {"en": "Doppler sonography", "de": "dopplersonographische"}, {"en": "accepted", "de": "anerkannt"}, {"en": "Medical Council", "de": "Wissenschaftlichen Beirat"}, {"en": "Bundesaerztekammer", "de": "Bundesärztekammer"}, {"en": "methods", "de": "Methode"}, {"en": "shorten", "de": "abkürzende"}, {"en": "waiting time", "de": "Wartezeit"}, {"en": "criteria", "de": "Diagnose"}, {"en": "cerebral death", "de": "Hirntodes"}]

A survey was undertaken to determine how frequently Doppler sonography has been used since that time in certifying brain death.
Durch eine Umfrage sollte geklärt werden, in welchem Umfang die Dopplersonographie in diesem Zusammenhang seither eingesetzt wird und welche Erfahrungen gemacht wurden.
[{"en": "survey", "de": "Umfrage"}, {"en": "Doppler sonography", "de": "Dopplersonographie"}, {"en": "brain death", "de": "diesem Zusammenhang"}]
[{"en": "A survey", "de": "eine Umfrage"}, {"en": "undertaken", "de": "geklärt werden"}, {"en": "Doppler sonography", "de": "Dopplersonographie"}, {"en": "since that time", "de": "seither"}, {"en": "certifying", "de": "eingesetzt wird"}, {"en": "brain death", "de": "Erfahrungen gemacht wurden"}]

A total of 400 questionnaires were sent out to all neurological (272) and neurosurgical (128) departments in Germany.
400 Fragebögen wurden an alle Neurologischen (272) und Neurochirurgischen (128) Abteilungen Deutschlands verschickt.
[{"en": "questionnaires", "de": "Fragebögen"}, {"en": "neurological", "de": "Neurologischen"}, {"en": "neurosurgical", "de": "Neurochirurgischen"}, {"en": "departments", "de": "Abteilungen"}, {"en": "Germany", "de": "Deutschlands"}]
[{"en": "A total of", "de": "400"}, {"en": "questionnaires", "de": "Fragebögen"}, {"en": "to all", "de": "an alle"}, {"en": "neurological", "de": "Neurologischen"}, {"en": "neurosurgical", "de": "Neurochirurgischen"}, {"en": "departments", "de": "Abteilungen"}, {"en": "Germany", "de": "Deutschlands"}]

The question of whether false positive results have been observed was answered five times in the affirmative.
In 71 Abteilungen wird die Dopplersonographie auch im Sinne der Entscheidungshilfen zur Feststellung des Hirntodes eingesetzt und zwar meist in Verbindung mit anderen Methoden.
[{"en": "false positive results", "de": "Dopplersonographie"}, {"en": "affirmative", "de": "Entscheidungshilfen"}]
[{"en": "The question", "de": "In"}, {"en": "whether", "de": "wird"}, {"en": "false positive results", "de": "Dopplersonographie"}, {"en": "observed", "de": "eingesetzt"}, {"en": "answered", "de": "und"}, {"en": "five times", "de": "meist"}, {"en": "affirmative", "de": "anderen Methoden"}]


In order to indicate pitfalls, the examiners reported borderline situations which in part did not fulfil the prerequisites.
Die Besprechung ergab, daß von den Untersuchern bewußt Grenzsituationen mitgeteilt wurden, in denen z. T. auch die Voraussetzungen nicht vollständig gegeben waren.
[{"en": "pitfalls", "de": "Grenzsituationen"}, {"en": "examiners", "de": "Untersuchern"}, {"en": "borderline situations", "de": "Grenzsituationen"}, {"en": "prerequisites", "de": "Voraussetzungen"}]
[{"en": "In order", "de": "Die Besprechung"}, {"en": "indicate", "de": "mitgeteilt"}, {"en": "pitfalls", "de": "Grenzsituationen"}, {"en": "examiners", "de": "Untersuchern"}, {"en": "reported", "de": "wurden"}, {"en": "borderline situations", "de": "Grenzsituationen"}, {"en": "prerequisites", "de": "Voraussetzungen"}]

In none of these cases had the diagnosis of brain death been based on ultrasound data.
In keinem dieser Fälle wurde die Ultraschalluntersuchung zur Feststellung des Hirntodes eingesetzt.
[{"en": "diagnosis of brain death", "de": "Feststellung des Hirntodes"}, {"en": "ultrasound data", "de": "Ultraschalluntersuchung"}]
[{"en": "In none of these cases", "de": "In keinem dieser Fälle"}, {"en": "the diagnosis", "de": "die"}, {"en": "brain death", "de": "Hirntodes"}, {"en": "based on", "de": "zur Feststellung"}, {"en": "ultrasound data", "de": "Ultraschalluntersuchung"}]

Doppler sonography for the diagnosis of cerebral circulatory arrest has been used by a considerable number of neurological and neurosurgical departments in Germany as an additional confirmatory test and rather seldom as the only method to shorten the waiting period.
Die Dopplersonographie wird von einer nicht unerheblichen Zahl von Neurologischen und Neurochirurgischen Abteilungen zur Feststellung des zerebralen Kreislaufstillstandes und als Entscheidungshilfe zur Diagnose des Hirntodes eingesetzt und zwar im wesentlichen zur weiteren Sicherung der Diagnose, seltener als alleinige, die Wartezeit verkürzende Methode.
[{"en": "Doppler sonography", "de": "Dopplersonographie"}, {"en": "diagnosis of cerebral circulatory arrest", "de": "Feststellung des zerebralen Kreislaufstillstandes"}, {"en": "neurological and neurosurgical departments", "de": "Neurologischen und Neurochirurgischen Abteilungen"}, {"en": "waiting period", "de": "Wartezeit"}]
[{"en": "Doppler sonography", "de": "Dopplersonographie"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Feststellung"}, {"en": "cerebral circulatory arrest", "de": "zerebralen Kreislaufstillstandes"}, {"en": "considerable number", "de": "nicht unerheblichen Zahl"}, {"en": "neurological", "de": "Neurologischen"}, {"en": "neurosurgical departments", "de": "Neurochirurgischen Abteilungen"}, {"en": "additional confirmatory test", "de": "weiteren Sicherung der Diagnose"}, {"en": "waiting period", "de": "Wartezeit"}]

Recent evidence suggests a possible role for Haeme oxygenase (HO)-derived carbon monoxide (CO) in the regulation of vascular tone through elevation of cyclic 3'-5' guanosine monophosphate (cGMP).
Für die endogene Bildung von CO ist ausschließlich die mikrosomale Hämoxygenase (HO) verantwortlich, die als konstitutives Enzym (HO-2) sowie in einer streßinduzierbaren Isoform (HO-1 oder Hitzeschockprotein 32) vorliegt.
[{"en": "Haeme oxygenase (HO)", "de": "Hämoxygenase (HO)"}, {"en": "carbon monoxide (CO)", "de": "CO"}, {"en": "vascular tone", "de": "endogene Bildung"}]
[{"en": "Haeme oxygenase", "de": "Hämoxygenase"}, {"en": "HO", "de": "HO"}, {"en": "carbon monoxide", "de": "CO"}, {"en": "CO", "de": "CO"}]

We therefore investigated the organ-specific expression pattern of the stress-inducible protein haeme oxygenase-1/heat shock protein 32 after haemorrhage and resuscitation.
In der vorliegenden Arbeit wurde daher das organspezifische Expressionsmuster der streßinduzierbaren Isoform des Enzyms nach hämorrhagischem Schock und Volumentherapie untersucht.
[{"en": "organ-specific expression pattern", "de": "organspezifische Expressionsmuster"}, {"en": "stress-inducible protein haeme oxygenase-1/heat shock protein 32", "de": "streßinduzierbaren Isoform des Enzyms"}, {"en": "haemorrhage", "de": "hämorrhagischem Schock"}, {"en": "resuscitation", "de": "Volumentherapie"}]

The effects of glycerol are discussed in detail.
Glycerin führt zu einer Umwandlung von kristallinen Lipidstrukturen in den Hornschichtlipiden in flüssigkristalline Zustände.
[{"en": "glycerol", "de": "Glycerin"}]
[{"en": "effects", "de": "Umwandlung"}, {"en": "glycerol", "de": "Glycerin"}]

Glycerol can lead to a transition of crystalline lipid structures within the horny layer lipids into liquid crystalline states.
Es verbessert besonders bei Anwendung in O/W-Emulsion die Hornschichthydratation in einem erheblichen und deutlich über der Harnstoffwirkung liegenden Maß.
[{"en": "Glycerol", "de": "Es"}, {"en": "crystalline lipid structures", "de": "Hornschichthydratation"}, {"en": "horny layer lipids", "de": "O/W-Emulsion"}, {"en": "liquid crystalline states", "de": "Harnstoffwirkung"}]
[{"en": "Glycerol", "de": "Es"}, {"en": "lead to", "de": "verbessert"}, {"en": "transition", "de": "Anwendung"}, {"en": "crystalline", "de": "Hornschichthydratation"}, {"en": "lipid structures", "de": "O/W-Emulsion"}, {"en": "horny layer lipids", "de": "Harnstoffwirkung"}, {"en": "liquid crystalline states", "de": "liegenden Maß"}]


Furthermore, by using glycerol, the mechanical properties of the skin can be influenced;
besonders bei Langzeitanwendung läßt sich die Verformung der Haut im Ansaugversuch durch Glycerin verstärken.
[{"en": "glycerol", "de": "Glycerin"}, {"en": "mechanical properties", "de": "Verformung"}, {"en": "skin", "de": "Haut"}]

Objectives Stabilization of posterior instability or dislocation of the shoulder in adolescents with a bone block combined with a soft tissue procedure.

Complications in the long-term follow-up due to degeneration of venous grafts may be reduced using arterial conduits.
Komplikationen des Langzeitverlaufs, die aus der Degeneration venöser Grafts resultieren, können mit diesem Operationsverfahren reduziert werden.
[{"en": "Complications", "de": "Komplikationen"}, {"en": "long-term follow-up", "de": "Langzeitverlaufs"}, {"en": "degeneration of venous grafts", "de": "Degeneration venöser Grafts"}, {"en": "arterial conduits", "de": "Operationsverfahren"}]

Prolonged operating times and increased trauma due to harvesting of multiple arterial grafts have been arguments for the conventional operative approach.
Aufgrund verlängerter Operationszeiten und des erhöhten operativen Traumas bei Verwendung multipler arterieller Grafts sind diese bisher nur in Ausnahmen zum Einsatz gekommen.
[{"en": "Prolonged operating times", "de": "verlängerter Operationszeiten"}, {"en": "increased trauma", "de": "erhöhten operativen Traumas"}, {"en": "multiple arterial grafts", "de": "multipler arterieller Grafts"}, {"en": "conventional operative approach", "de": "bisher nur in Ausnahmen zum Einsatz gekommen"}]

We present our experience using new operative techniques, such as skeletonization of arterial grafts and the T-graft configuration.
Wir stellen unsere Ergebnisse der komplett arteriellen Revaskularisation unter Verwendung neuer Techniken (Skelettierung arterieller Conduits/T-Graft-Konfiguration) vor.
[{"en": "operative techniques", "de": "neuer Techniken"}, {"en": "skeletonization of arterial grafts", "de": "Skelettierung arterieller Conduits"}, {"en": "T-graft configuration", "de": "T-Graft-Konfiguration"}]

Material and methods:
Material und Methoden:
[{"en": "Material and methods", "de": "Material und Methoden"}]
[{"en": "Material", "de": "Material"}, {"en": "and", "de": "und"}, {"en": "methods", "de": "Methoden"}]

Between 3/96 and 7/99, 405 patients with multiple coronary artery disease underwent complete arterial revascularization at our institution.
Zwischen 3/96 bis 7/99 wurden in unserer Klinik 405 Patienten mit koronarer Mehrgefäßerkrankung komplett arteriell revaskularisiert.
[{"en": "multiple coronary artery disease", "de": "koronarer Mehrgefäßerkrankung"}, {"en": "complete arterial revascularization", "de": "komplett arteriell revaskularisiert"}]
[{"en": "Between", "de": "Zwischen"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "multiple coronary artery disease", "de": "koronarer Mehrgefäßerkrankung"}, {"en": "underwent", "de": "wurden"}, {"en": "complete arterial revascularization", "de": "komplett arteriell revaskularisiert"}, {"en": "our institution", "de": "unserer Klinik"}]

The operations were performed using only two skeletonized grafts, both internal thoracic arteries in 105 patients (25.9%), internal thoracic artery and radial artery in 299 patients (73.8%) and 1 radial artery in 1 patient (0.3%).
Alle Operationen wurden mit maximal 2 skelettierten Grafts durchgeführt, in 105 Patienten (25,9%) bilaterale Arteriae thoracicae internae, in 299 Patienten (73,8%) Arteria thoracica interna und Radialarterie und in 1 Patienten (0,3%) 1 Radialarterie.
[{"en": "operations", "de": "Operationen"}, {"en": "skeletonized grafts", "de": "skelettierten Grafts"}, {"en": "internal thoracic arteries", "de": "Arteriae thoracicae internae"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "internal thoracic artery", "de": "Arteria thoracica interna"}, {"en": "radial artery", "de": "Radialarterie"}]
[{"en": "The operations", "de": "Alle Operationen"}, {"en": "using", "de": "mit"}, {"en": "only", "de": "maximal"}, {"en": "two", "de": "2"}, {"en": "skeletonized grafts", "de": "skelettierten Grafts"}, {"en": "both", "de": "bilaterale"}, {"en": "internal thoracic arteries", "de": "Arteriae thoracicae internae"}, {"en": "105 patients", "de": "105 Patienten"}, {"en": "25.9%", "de": "25,9%"}, {"en": "internal thoracic artery", "de": "Arteria thoracica interna"}, {"en": "radial artery", "de": "Radialarterie"}, {"en": "299 patients", "de": "299 Patienten"}, {"en": "73.8%", "de": "73,8%"}, {"en": "1 radial artery", "de": "1 Radialarterie"}, {"en": "1 patient", "de": "1 Patienten"}, {"en": "0.3%", "de": "0,3%"}]

In 346 patients (85.4%) a T-graft configuration was used.
In 346 Patienten (85,4%) erfolgte die Implantation der beiden arteriellen Grafts in T-Konfiguration.
[{"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "T-graft configuration", "de": "T-Konfiguration"}]
[{"en": "In", "de": "In"}, {"en": "346 patients", "de": "346 Patienten"}, {"en": "85.4%", "de": "85,4%"}, {"en": "T-graft configuration", "de": "T-Konfiguration"}, {"en": "was used", "de": "erfolgte die Implantation"}]

A mean of 4.1 +/- 0.9 coronary anastomoses were performed per patient.
Im Mittel wurden 4,1 +/- 0,9 Koronargefäße pro Patient anastomosiert.
[{"en": "mean", "de": "Mittel"}, {"en": "coronary anastomoses", "de": "Koronargefäße"}, {"en": "per patient", "de": "pro Patient"}]
[{"en": "A mean of", "de": "Im Mittel wurden"}, {"en": "4.1 +/- 0.9", "de": "4,1 +/- 0,9"}, {"en": "coronary", "de": "Koronargefäße"}, {"en": "per patient", "de": "pro Patient"}]

In hospital mortality was 2%.
Die Krankenhausletalität betrug 2%.
[{"en": "hospital mortality", "de": "Krankenhausletalität"}]
[{"en": "In hospital mortality", "de": "Die Krankenhausletalität"}, {"en": "was", "de": "betrug"}, {"en": "2%", "de": "2%"}]

Sternal dehiscence or infection occured in 0.8% of patients.
Sternumwundheilungsstörungen traten bei 0,8% der Patienten auf.
[{"en": "Sternal dehiscence", "de": "Sternumwundheilungsstörungen"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}]
[{"en": "Sternal", "de": "Sternum"}, {"en": "occured", "de": "traten"}, {"en": "0.8%", "de": "0,8%"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}]

Harvesting of the radial artery was performable with a low morbidity.
Komplikationen nach Entnahme der Radialarterie waren bis auf temporäre Parästhesien nicht zu verzeichnen.
[{"en": "Harvesting", "de": "Entnahme"}, {"en": "radial artery", "de": "Radialarterie"}, {"en": "low morbidity", "de": "Komplikationen"}]
[{"en": "Harvesting", "de": "Entnahme"}, {"en": "radial artery", "de": "Radialarterie"}, {"en": "low morbidity", "de": "nicht zu verzeichnen"}]

One week postoperatively, coronary angiography showed 96.7% of coronary anastomoses free of stenosis >50%.
In der angiographischen Kontrolle 1 Woche postoperativ waren 96,7% der Koronaranastomosen frei von Stenosen >50%.
[{"en": "postoperatively", "de": "postoperativ"}, {"en": "coronary angiography", "de": "angiographischen Kontrolle"}, {"en": "coronary anastomoses", "de": "Koronaranastomosen"}, {"en": "stenosis >50%", "de": "Stenosen >50%"}]
[{"en": "One week", "de": "1 Woche"}, {"en": "postoperatively", "de": "postoperativ"}, {"en": "coronary angiography", "de": "angiographischen Kontrolle"}, {"en": "showed", "de": "waren"}, {"en": "coronary anastomoses", "de": "Koronaranastomosen"}, {"en": "free of", "de": "frei von"}, {"en": "stenosis", "de": "Stenosen"}]

Complete arterial coronary revascularization using skeletonized grafts and the T-graft approach is a safe technique in the treatment of multiple coronary artery disease.
Die komplett arterielle Bypasschirurgie unter Verwendung skelettierter Arterien und der T-Graft-Technik ist ein sicheres Verfahren zur Therapie der koronaren Mehrgefäßerkrankung.

Intracranial pressure (ICP) monitoring has a key role within the neuromonitoring, although ICP does not monitor processes of the central neuron directly and only with delay.
Die Messung des intrakraniellen Drucks hat eine Schlüsselstellung innerhalb des Neuromonitorings erhalten, obwohl durch den Hirndruck die eigentlichen metabolischen Prozesse am zentralen Neuron nicht direkt und auch nur zeitlich verzögert registriert werden können.

For melanoma the following approaches are suggested:
Für das Melanom bieten sich an:
[{"en": "melanoma", "de": "Melanom"}]
[{"en": "For", "de": "Für"}, {"en": "melanoma", "de": "das Melanom"}]

vaccination with tumour-specific, HLA-associated antigens using peptides or `naked DNA', vaccination with melanoma cells transfected with cytokine genes or B7, adoptive immunotherapy with specific T-lymphocytes or transfected tumour-infiltrating lymphocytes, or transfection of tumour cells with a tumour suppressor gene whose dysfunction plays a crucial role in melanoma.
Vakzinierung mit Tumor-spezifischen, HLA-assoziierten Antigenen mittels Peptiden oder "naked DNA", Vakzinierung mit Melanomzellen, die mit einem Zytokingen oder mit B7 transfiziert wurden, adoptive Immuntherapie mit in vitro propagierten spezifischen T-Zellen, transfizierten Tumor-infiltrierenden Lymphozyten, oder Transfektion der Tumorzellen in vivo mit einem Tumorsuppressorgen, dessen Dysfunktion im Melanom eine zentrale Rolle spielt.
[{"en": "vaccination", "de": "Vakzinierung"}, {"en": "tumour-specific, HLA-associated antigens", "de": "Tumor-spezifischen, HLA-assoziierten Antigenen"}, {"en": "peptides", "de": "Peptiden"}, {"en": "naked DNA", "de": "naked DNA"}, {"en": "melanoma cells", "de": "Melanomzellen"}, {"en": "cytokine genes", "de": "Zytokingen"}, {"en": "B7", "de": "B7"}, {"en": "adoptive immunotherapy", "de": "adoptive Immuntherapie"}, {"en": "specific T-lymphocytes", "de": "spezifischen T-Zellen"}, {"en": "transfected tumour-infiltrating lymphocytes", "de": "transfizierten Tumor-infiltrierenden Lymphozyten"}, {"en": "tumour suppressor gene", "de": "Tumorsuppressorgen"}, {"en": "dysfunction", "de": "Dysfunktion"}, {"en": "melanoma", "de": "Melanom"}]
[{"en": "vaccination", "de": "Vakzinierung"}, {"en": "tumour-specific", "de": "Tumor-spezifischen"}, {"en": "HLA-associated antigens", "de": "HLA-assoziierten Antigenen"}, {"en": "peptides", "de": "Peptiden"}, {"en": "naked DNA", "de": "naked DNA"}, {"en": "melanoma cells", "de": "Melanomzellen"}, {"en": "cytokine genes", "de": "Zytokingen"}, {"en": "adoptive immunotherapy", "de": "adoptive Immuntherapie"}, {"en": "specific T-lymphocytes", "de": "spezifischen T-Zellen"}, {"en": "tumour-infiltrating lymphocytes", "de": "Tumor-infiltrierenden Lymphozyten"}, {"en": "transfection", "de": "Transfektion"}, {"en": "tumour cells", "de": "Tumorzellen"}, {"en": "tumour suppressor gene", "de": "Tumorsuppressorgen"}, {"en": "dysfunction", "de": "Dysfunktion"}, {"en": "melanoma", "de": "Melanom"}]

Evaluation of psychotherapeutic or psychopharmacological treatment frequently uses rating scales without regard for patients' defensiveness.
Der Einfluß von Verfälschungstendenzen ("Abwehr") mancher Patienten auf die Evaluation von Therapieergebnissen war bisher nicht exakt einzuschätzen.
[{"en": "Evaluation", "de": "Evaluation"}, {"en": "psychotherapeutic", "de": "Therapieergebnissen"}, {"en": "psychopharmacological treatment", "de": "Therapieergebnissen"}, {"en": "rating scales", "de": "Verfälschungstendenzen"}, {"en": "patients' defensiveness", "de": "Abwehr"}]
[{"en": "Evaluation", "de": "Evaluation"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Therapieergebnissen"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}]

This study demonstrates on 309 psychotherapy patients treated with inpatient client-centered therapy and followed-up 1 year after treatment that defensiveness, measured with validity scales of personality inventories MMPI-K, FPI-R and Gieﬂen-Test, influences ratings (scales CGI, HAMA, HAMD, BRMES) before and after therapy.
An 309 stationär mit Gesprächspsychotherapie behandelten und ein Jahr später nachuntersuchten Patienten wird gezeigt, in welchem Ausmaß sich Rater bei den Skalen CGI, HAMA, HAMD, BRMES durch Abwehrhaltungen der Patienten beeinflussen lassen, die mit Validitätsskalen der Persönlichkeitstests MMPI-K, FPI-R und Gießen-Test gemessen wurden:
[{"en": "psychotherapy patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "inpatient client-centered therapy", "de": "stationär mit Gesprächspsychotherapie"}, {"en": "defensiveness", "de": "Abwehrhaltungen"}, {"en": "validity scales", "de": "Validitätsskalen"}, {"en": "personality inventories", "de": "Persönlichkeitstests"}, {"en": "MMPI-K", "de": "MMPI-K"}, {"en": "FPI-R", "de": "FPI-R"}, {"en": "Gieﬂen-Test", "de": "Gießen-Test"}, {"en": "ratings", "de": "Rater"}, {"en": "scales", "de": "Skalen"}, {"en": "CGI", "de": "CGI"}, {"en": "HAMA", "de": "HAMA"}, {"en": "HAMD", "de": "HAMD"}, {"en": "BRMES", "de": "BRMES"}]
[{"en": "This study", "de": "An"}, {"en": "psychotherapy patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "treated", "de": "behandelten"}, {"en": "inpatient", "de": "stationär"}, {"en": "client-centered therapy", "de": "Gesprächspsychotherapie"}, {"en": "followed-up", "de": "nachuntersuchten"}, {"en": "1 year", "de": "ein Jahr"}, {"en": "after treatment", "de": "später"}, {"en": "defensiveness", "de": "Abwehrhaltungen"}, {"en": "measured", "de": "gemessen"}, {"en": "validity scales", "de": "Validitätsskalen"}, {"en": "personality inventories", "de": "Persönlichkeitstests"}, {"en": "MMPI-K, FPI-R and Gieﬂen-Test", "de": "MMPI-K, FPI-R und Gießen-Test"}, {"en": "influences ratings", "de": "beeinflussen lassen"}, {"en": "scales", "de": "Skalen"}, {"en": "CGI, HAMA, HAMD, BRMES", "de": "CGI, HAMA, HAMD, BRMES"}]


Inpatient client-centered psychotherapy improved defensiveness in the case of initial self-criticism and diminished it in the case of initial retentiveness.
Ihre relativen Besserungen (Effektstärken Ratingskalen) fallen in dem Maße geringer aus, wie ihre Offenheit zunimmt (Validitätsskalen). - Stationäre Gesprächspsychotherapie stärkte die Abwehr bei aggravierenden und verminderte sie bei dissimulierenden Patienten.
[{"en": "Inpatient client-centered psychotherapy", "de": "Stationäre Gesprächspsychotherapie"}, {"en": "defensiveness", "de": "Abwehr"}, {"en": "self-criticism", "de": "aggravierenden"}, {"en": "retentiveness", "de": "dissimulierenden Patienten"}]

About 25 % of operated clubfeet will develop a recurrency or show a marked residual deformity.
Trotz frühzeitiger konservativer und anschließend zeitgerechter, dem Schweregrad der Deformität angepaßter, operativer Therapie des kongenitalen Klumpfußes wird über ca. 25 % Rezidive und behandlungsbedürftige residuale Deformitäten berichtet.
[{"en": "operated clubfeet", "de": "kongenitalen Klumpfußes"}, {"en": "recurrency", "de": "Rezidive"}, {"en": "marked residual deformity", "de": "behandlungsbedürftige residuale Deformitäten"}]

As main factor the failure of concentric reduction at the time of initial surgery has to be considered.

For ethical and socio-economical reasons (cost-explosion in transfusion-medicine, patient's individual destiny), devepolment and consistent application of allogeneic transfusion sparing techniques in surgery is a chal- lenge to anesthesiologists, surgeons and blood-bankers.

The combination of different techniques, i.e. autologous predonation, hemodilution, choice of anesthetic regimen, deliberate hypotension, application of anti-fibrinolytic agents and autotransfusion of intraoperatively saved blood allow for avoidance of allogeneic blood transfusion even in patients presenting important intraoperative hemorrhage.
Die Kombination verschiedener Verfahren, wie z.B. präoperative Eigenblutspende, präoperative Hämodilution, Wahl des Anästhesieverfahrens, kontrollierte Hypotension, intraoperative Applikation von Antifibrinolytika und maschinelle Autotransfusion von autologem Wundblut, erlauben es, auch Patienten mit großen intraoperativen Blutverlusten die Transfusion von allogenem Blut zu ersparen.
[{"en": "autologous predonation", "de": "präoperative Eigenblutspende"}, {"en": "hemodilution", "de": "präoperative Hämodilution"}, {"en": "anesthetic regimen", "de": "Anästhesieverfahren"}, {"en": "deliberate hypotension", "de": "kontrollierte Hypotension"}, {"en": "anti-fibrinolytic agents", "de": "Antifibrinolytika"}, {"en": "autotransfusion", "de": "maschinelle Autotransfusion"}, {"en": "intraoperatively saved blood", "de": "autologem Wundblut"}, {"en": "allogeneic blood transfusion", "de": "Transfusion von allogenem Blut"}, {"en": "intraoperative hemorrhage", "de": "intraoperativen Blutverlusten"}]
[{"en": "The combination", "de": "Die Kombination"}, {"en": "different techniques", "de": "verschiedener Verfahren"}, {"en": "autologous predonation", "de": "präoperative Eigenblutspende"}, {"en": "hemodilution", "de": "präoperative Hämodilution"}, {"en": "choice of anesthetic regimen", "de": "Wahl des Anästhesieverfahrens"}, {"en": "deliberate hypotension", "de": "kontrollierte Hypotension"}, {"en": "application of anti-fibrinolytic agents", "de": "intraoperative Applikation von Antifibrinolytika"}, {"en": "autotransfusion of intraoperatively saved blood", "de": "maschinelle Autotransfusion von autologem Wundblut"}, {"en": "avoidance", "de": "zu ersparen"}, {"en": "allogeneic blood transfusion", "de": "Transfusion von allogenem Blut"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "intraoperative hemorrhage", "de": "intraoperativen Blutverlusten"}]

Prof. Gustav Adolph Michaelis (1798-1848), director of the Obstetric Hospital and the School of Midwifery at Kiel/Germany, is known as one of the founders of scientific obstetrics.
Prof. Gustav Adolph Michaelis (1798-1848), Direktor des Kieler Gebärhauses und der Hebammen-Lehranstalt, gilt als einer der Begründer der wissenschaftlichen Geburtsmedizin.
[{"en": "Obstetric Hospital", "de": "Kieler Gebärhauses"}, {"en": "School of Midwifery", "de": "Hebammen-Lehranstalt"}, {"en": "scientific obstetrics", "de": "wissenschaftlichen Geburtsmedizin"}]

Repetitive magnetic stimulation (rTMS) is a non-invasive, painless method to induce transient activation in circumscript regions of the human cortex.
Die repetitive transkranielle Magnetstimulation (rTMS) ist ein nichtinvasives, schmerzloses Verfahren, mit dem beim Menschen in umschriebene Kortexareale temporäre Reizeffekte ausgelöst werden können.

Facial nerve schwannomas are rare benign tumors, when occurring, they are located most frequently in the distal fallopian canal and present as extracranial masses.
Neurinome des N. facialis sind seltene, gutartige Tumoren, die zumeist im Verlauf des distalen intratemporalen Abschnitts des Nervs auftreten, nach extratemporal vorwachsen und dann als Raumforderung extrakraniell bemerkt werden.
[{"en": "Facial nerve schwannomas", "de": "Neurinome des N. facialis"}, {"en": "rare benign tumors", "de": "seltene, gutartige Tumoren"}, {"en": "distal fallopian canal", "de": "distalen intratemporalen Abschnitts des Nervs"}, {"en": "extracranial masses", "de": "Raumforderung extrakraniell"}]

The predominant symptom is a progressive facial nerve paralysis.

Status epilepticus (SE) is defined as a seizure persisting over 10 min or repeated seizures without recovery between the attacks.
Ein Status epilepticus (SE) liegt vor, wenn ein kontinuierlicher Anfall besteht oder mehrere Anfälle, zwischen denen der Patient das Bewußtsein nicht wiedererlangt.
[{"en": "Status epilepticus (SE)", "de": "Status epilepticus (SE)"}, {"en": "seizure", "de": "Anfall"}, {"en": "repeated seizures", "de": "mehrere Anfälle"}]
[{"en": "Status epilepticus", "de": "Status epilepticus"}, {"en": "SE", "de": "SE"}, {"en": "defined", "de": "liegt vor"}, {"en": "seizure", "de": "Anfall"}, {"en": "persisting", "de": "besteht"}, {"en": "over 10 min", "de": "kontinuierlicher"}, {"en": "repeated seizures", "de": "mehrere Anfälle"}, {"en": "without recovery", "de": "nicht wiedererlangt"}, {"en": "between the attacks", "de": "zwischen denen der Patient das Bewußtsein"}]

However, there are very few controlled clinical trials.
Die aktuellen Behandlungsstrategien beruhen allerdings noch fast ausschließlich auf theoretischen Überlegungen und kleinen Fallserien.
[{"en": "controlled clinical trials", "de": "Fallserien"}]
[{"en": "However", "de": "allerdings"}]

Phenytoin and Phenobarbital are employed if Benzodiazepines are not successful.
Die initiale Behandlung erfolgt mit Benzodiazepinen und ist bei den meisten Patienten erfolgreich, bei Erfolglosigkeit wird Phenytoin und Phenobarbital eingesetzt.

A tendon transfer or interposition tendon graft is usually recommended for treatment of late diagnosed ruptures of the tibial anterior tendon.
Zur Therapie einer veralteten Ruptur der Sehne des M. tibialis anterior wird entweder eine Sehnentransposition oder Sehnentransplantation empfohlen.

Especially the indications for using the heart rate variability analysis and the baroreflex sensitivity evaluation are well defined and proven in large prospective studies.

The ventilatory and cardiac chemoreflex sensitivities are tools which could improve prediction of malignant cardiac arrhythmias and the prognosis of patients with advanced chronic heart failure.
Die ventilatorischen und kardialen Chemoreflexsensitivitäten dagegen als potentielle Prädiktoren maligner kardialer Arrhythmien und der Prognose bei chronischer Herzinsuffizienz sind zur Zeit Gegenstand intensiver Forschungsaktivitäten.

Especially sepsis and MODS, as ICU-relevant disorders, are coupled with an impairment of autonomic function.
Auch Sepsis und MODS als besonders für die Intensivmedizin relevante Erkrankungen sind mit einer Beeinträchtigung der autonomen Funktion, gemessen als Reduktion der Herzfrequenzvariabilität, verbunden.
[{"en": "sepsis", "de": "Sepsis"}, {"en": "MODS", "de": "MODS"}, {"en": "ICU-relevant disorders", "de": "für die Intensivmedizin relevante Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "impairment of autonomic function", "de": "Beeinträchtigung der autonomen Funktion"}]
[{"en": "Especially", "de": "Auch"}, {"en": "sepsis", "de": "Sepsis"}, {"en": "MODS", "de": "MODS"}, {"en": "ICU-relevant disorders", "de": "für die Intensivmedizin relevante Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "impairment", "de": "Beeinträchtigung"}, {"en": "autonomic function", "de": "autonomen Funktion"}]

Thus, the reduction of heart rate variability in such patients culminated in the loss of the nerval-humoral organ interaction ("uncoupling of biological oscillators") hypothesis.
Die Einschränkung der Herzfrequenzvariabilität bei solchen Patienten ist ein Hinweis auf den Verlust der neuro-humoralen Organinteraktion ("Uncoupling of biological oscillators").
[{"en": "reduction of heart rate variability", "de": "Einschränkung der Herzfrequenzvariabilität"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "nerval-humoral organ interaction", "de": "neuro-humoralen Organinteraktion"}, {"en": "uncoupling of biological oscillators", "de": "Uncoupling of biological oscillators"}]
[{"en": "Thus", "de": "Die"}, {"en": "reduction", "de": "Einschränkung"}, {"en": "heart rate variability", "de": "Herzfrequenzvariabilität"}, {"en": "such patients", "de": "solchen Patienten"}, {"en": "loss", "de": "Verlust"}, {"en": "nerval-humoral organ interaction", "de": "neuro-humoralen Organinteraktion"}, {"en": "hypothesis", "de": "Hinweis"}]

This idea nowadays contributes to the pathophysiological concept of the clinical manifestations of sepsis and MODS.
Diese Idee scheint im pathophysiologischen Konzept der Sepsis und des MODS zunehmend an Attraktivität zu gewinnen.

Three patients presented with an acquired green discoloration of their scalp hair.
Wir berichten über 3 Patienten mit einer erworbenen Grünverfärbung der Kopfbehaarung.

History revealed that all of them swam regularly in private swimming pools.

Examination of the hair by atomic emission spectroscopy showed that the green discoloration was caused by an excessively high copper content of the hair.
Die Untersuchung der Haare mittels Atomemissionsspektroskopie wies einen exzessiv hohen Kupfergehalt als Ursache der Grünverfärbung nach.
[{"en": "Examination", "de": "Untersuchung"}, {"en": "hair", "de": "Haare"}, {"en": "atomic emission spectroscopy", "de": "Atomemissionsspektroskopie"}, {"en": "green discoloration", "de": "Grünverfärbung"}, {"en": "copper content", "de": "Kupfergehalt"}]
[{"en": "Examination", "de": "Die Untersuchung"}, {"en": "the hair", "de": "der Haare"}, {"en": "atomic emission spectroscopy", "de": "Atomemissionsspektroskopie"}, {"en": "green discoloration", "de": "Grünverfärbung"}, {"en": "caused", "de": "Ursache"}, {"en": "excessively high", "de": "exzessiv hohen"}, {"en": "copper content", "de": "Kupfergehalt"}]

This exogeneous discoloration is characteristically related to the uptake of copper from private swimming pools.
An Hand unserer Beobachtungen möchten wir auf die charakteristische Verknüpfung dieser exogenen Haarverfärbung mit der Aufnahme von Kupfer durch Schwimmwasser hauseigener Schwimmbecken hinweisen.

A 36-year old man suffered an isolated head injury with a fracture of the skull, epidural and subdural hematomas as well as brain contusion (Abbreviated Injury Scale (AIS):
Ein 36jähriger Mann erlitt nach einem Fahrradsturz ein isoliertes Schädel-Hirn-Trauma (SHT) mit Schädelbasisfraktur, Epidural- und Subduralhämatom sowie einer Kontusionsblutung [Abbreviated Injury Scale (AIS):

Hohe ICP-Werte machten ein Barbituratkoma über 10 Tage notwendig.

X-rays and CT-scanning revealed severe heterotopic ossification (HO) of both hips with ancylosis (Brooker type IV).
In der Beckenübersichtsaufnahme und der Computertomographie zeigten sich ankylosierende heterotope Ossifikationen (HO) beider Hüftgelenke (Brooker Typ IV).

Resection of HO was carried out in a two stage procedure using Smith-Petersen approach.
Die HO wurden 2 Jahre nach dem Unfall zweizeitig jeweils über einen Smith-Petersen-Zugang entfernt.

The prophylaxis for recurrence of HO included preoperative single-dose radiation (8 Gy) and postoperative treatment with indomethacin (150 mg per day).
Die HO-Rezidivprophylaxe erfolgte mittels einer einmaligen präoperativen Bestrahlung (8 Gy) und einer postoperativen Verabreichung von Indomethacin (150 mg/Tag) über 3 Monate.

A polymerase chain reaction (PCR) assay for the detection of dermatophytes was established.
Ein Nachweissystem für Dermatophyten mittels Polymerase-Kettenreaktion (PCR) wurde entwickelt.
[{"en": "polymerase chain reaction (PCR)", "de": "Polymerase-Kettenreaktion (PCR)"}, {"en": "detection of dermatophytes", "de": "Nachweissystem für Dermatophyten"}]
[{"en": "A", "de": "Ein"}, {"en": "polymerase chain reaction", "de": "Polymerase-Kettenreaktion"}, {"en": "PCR", "de": "PCR"}, {"en": "assay", "de": "Nachweissystem"}, {"en": "detection", "de": "mittels"}, {"en": "dermatophytes", "de": "Dermatophyten"}, {"en": "established", "de": "entwickelt"}]

The primers "TR1" and "TR2" amplify a 581 bp fragment within the gene coding for the small ribosomal subunit (18S rRNA) of fungi.
Die Primer "TR1" und "TR2" flankieren eine 581 bp lange Sequenz innerhalb des Gens, das für die kleine ribosomale Untereinheit (18S rRNA) von Pilzen kodiert.
[{"en": "primers", "de": "Primer"}, {"en": "TR1", "de": "TR1"}, {"en": "TR2", "de": "TR2"}, {"en": "gene", "de": "Gens"}, {"en": "small ribosomal subunit", "de": "kleine ribosomale Untereinheit"}, {"en": "18S rRNA", "de": "18S rRNA"}, {"en": "fungi", "de": "Pilzen"}]
[{"en": "The primers", "de": "Die Primer"}, {"en": "TR1", "de": "TR1"}, {"en": "and", "de": "und"}, {"en": "TR2", "de": "TR2"}, {"en": "amplify", "de": "flankieren"}, {"en": "581 bp", "de": "581 bp"}, {"en": "fragment", "de": "Sequenz"}, {"en": "within", "de": "innerhalb"}, {"en": "the gene", "de": "des Gens"}, {"en": "coding for", "de": "kodiert"}, {"en": "small ribosomal subunit", "de": "kleine ribosomale Untereinheit"}, {"en": "18S rRNA", "de": "18S rRNA"}, {"en": "of fungi", "de": "von Pilzen"}]

PCR allowed the detection of isolates of 7 common dermatophytes and in addition several yeasts and moulds.
Mittels PCR ließ sich die DNA von Isolaten der 7 häufigsten Dermatophyten amplifizieren, daneben die von einigen Hefe- und Schimmelpilzen.
[{"en": "PCR", "de": "PCR"}, {"en": "detection", "de": "amplifizieren"}, {"en": "isolates", "de": "Isolaten"}, {"en": "dermatophytes", "de": "Dermatophyten"}, {"en": "yeasts", "de": "Hefe"}, {"en": "moulds", "de": "Schimmelpilzen"}]
[{"en": "PCR", "de": "PCR"}, {"en": "allowed", "de": "ließ"}, {"en": "detection", "de": "amplifizieren"}, {"en": "isolates", "de": "Isolaten"}, {"en": "7 common dermatophytes", "de": "7 häufigsten Dermatophyten"}, {"en": "in addition", "de": "daneben"}, {"en": "several", "de": "einigen"}, {"en": "yeasts", "de": "Hefe"}, {"en": "moulds", "de": "Schimmelpilzen"}]

Hybridisation with specific oligonucleotides results in the identification of dermatophytes and Candida albicans.
Durch Hybridisierung mit spezifischen Detektionsoligonukleotiden gelang die Identifizierung von Dermatophyten und Candida albicans.
[{"en": "Hybridisation", "de": "Hybridisierung"}, {"en": "specific oligonucleotides", "de": "spezifischen Detektionsoligonukleotiden"}, {"en": "identification", "de": "Identifizierung"}, {"en": "dermatophytes", "de": "Dermatophyten"}, {"en": "Candida albicans", "de": "Candida albicans"}]
[{"en": "Hybridisation", "de": "Hybridisierung"}, {"en": "specific", "de": "spezifischen"}, {"en": "oligonucleotides", "de": "Detektionsoligonukleotiden"}, {"en": "identification", "de": "Identifizierung"}, {"en": "dermatophytes", "de": "Dermatophyten"}, {"en": "Candida albicans", "de": "Candida albicans"}]

Restriction analysis of the PCR product allowed us to distinguish between dermatophytes and yeasts or moulds.
Die Restriktionsfragmentanalyse erlaubte die Abgrenzung der Dermatophyten gegenüber den Hefe- und Schimmelpilzen.
[{"en": "Restriction analysis", "de": "Restriktionsfragmentanalyse"}, {"en": "PCR product", "de": "Abgrenzung"}, {"en": "dermatophytes", "de": "Dermatophyten"}, {"en": "yeasts", "de": "Hefe"}, {"en": "moulds", "de": "Schimmelpilzen"}]

The specifity of the PCR with respect to fungi was assessed by testing human DNA collected from 42 dermis and epidermis specimens as well as DNA from selected plants and animals.
Die Spezifität der PCR für Pilze wurde an menschlicher DNA aus 42 Dermis- und Epidermisproben sowie an ausgesuchter tierischer und pflanzlicher DNA überprüft.
[{"en": "PCR", "de": "PCR"}, {"en": "fungi", "de": "Pilze"}, {"en": "human DNA", "de": "menschlicher DNA"}, {"en": "dermis and epidermis specimens", "de": "Dermis- und Epidermisproben"}, {"en": "plants and animals", "de": "tierischer und pflanzlicher DNA"}]

To evaluate the clinical relevance of the PCR assay, 69 routinely collected skin and nail specimens were examined by PCR and culture.
Um die klinische Relevanz des Verfahrens zu evaluieren, wurden 69 routinemäßig gewonnene Haut- und Nagelproben mit der PCR und der Kultur untersucht.
[{"en": "clinical relevance", "de": "klinische Relevanz"}, {"en": "PCR assay", "de": "Verfahren"}, {"en": "skin and nail specimens", "de": "Haut- und Nagelproben"}, {"en": "PCR", "de": "PCR"}, {"en": "culture", "de": "Kultur"}]

PCR detected dermatophytes in 35 and culture in 28 of 38 specimens that were classified as positive.
Mit der PCR wurden in 35 und mit der Kultur in 28 der insgesamt 38 positiv bewerteten Patientenproben Dermatophyten nachgewiesen.
[{"en": "PCR", "de": "PCR"}, {"en": "dermatophytes", "de": "Dermatophyten"}, {"en": "culture", "de": "Kultur"}, {"en": "specimens", "de": "Patientenproben"}]

Sensitivity of PCR (92%) was higher than that of culture (73%).
Die Sensitivität der PCR (92%) war höher als die der Kultur (73%).
[{"en": "Sensitivity", "de": "Sensitivität"}, {"en": "PCR", "de": "PCR"}, {"en": "culture", "de": "Kultur"}]
[{"en": "Sensitivity", "de": "Sensitivität"}, {"en": "of PCR", "de": "der PCR"}, {"en": "higher", "de": "höher"}, {"en": "than that of", "de": "als die der"}, {"en": "culture", "de": "Kultur"}]

These results show that PCR has advantages over culture for the detection of dermatophytes.
Das Ergebnis dieser Untersuchung zeigt, daß die PCR Vorteile gegenüber der Kultur beim Nachweis von Dermatophyten hat.
[{"en": "PCR", "de": "PCR"}, {"en": "advantages", "de": "Vorteile"}, {"en": "culture", "de": "Kultur"}, {"en": "detection", "de": "Nachweis"}, {"en": "dermatophytes", "de": "Dermatophyten"}]

The development of arthroscopic wrist surgery has helped to understand the anatomy and pathology of the wrist joint.
Die Handgelenkarthroskopie hat dazu beigetragen, daß ein besseres Verständnis für die Anatomie und Pathologie des Handgelenks entwickelt werden konnte.
[{"en": "arthroscopic wrist surgery", "de": "Handgelenkarthroskopie"}, {"en": "anatomy", "de": "Anatomie"}, {"en": "pathology", "de": "Pathologie"}, {"en": "wrist joint", "de": "Handgelenks"}]

The arthroscopy of the wrist offers significant information independent from the standard radiological diagnostic tools.
Die Handgelenkarthroskopie ist hierbei neben funktionsradiologischen Verfahren von entscheidender Bedeutung.
[{"en": "arthroscopy of the wrist", "de": "Handgelenkarthroskopie"}, {"en": "standard radiological diagnostic tools", "de": "funktionsradiologischen Verfahren"}]
[{"en": "The arthroscopy", "de": "Die Handgelenkarthroskopie"}, {"en": "wrist", "de": "Handgelenk"}, {"en": "significant information", "de": "von entscheidender Bedeutung"}, {"en": "independent", "de": "neben"}, {"en": "standard radiological diagnostic tools", "de": "funktionsradiologischen Verfahren"}]

TFCC lesions and scapholunate dissociation remain to be the most common causes for arthroscopic wrist surgery.
Die Verletzungen am Discus ulnaris und am skapholunären Bandapparat sind die häufigsten arthroskopischen Operationsindikationen.
[{"en": "TFCC lesions", "de": "Verletzungen am Discus ulnaris"}, {"en": "scapholunate dissociation", "de": "skapholunären Bandapparat"}, {"en": "arthroscopic wrist surgery", "de": "arthroskopischen Operationsindikationen"}]
[{"en": "TFCC lesions", "de": "Verletzungen am Discus ulnaris"}, {"en": "scapholunate dissociation", "de": "skapholunären Bandapparat"}, {"en": "most common causes", "de": "häufigsten"}, {"en": "arthroscopic wrist surgery", "de": "arthroskopischen Operationsindikationen"}]

Over the last decade mtDNA analysis has gained high importance for forensic identification casework, archeological research as well as for evolutionary and population genetic studies.
Die Analyse mitochondrialer DNA fand während der letzten Dekade zunehmend Anwendung in der rechtsmedizinischen Praxis, in der Archäologie sowie in evolutions- und populationsgenetischen Studien.
[{"en": "mtDNA analysis", "de": "Analyse mitochondrialer DNA"}, {"en": "forensic identification casework", "de": "rechtsmedizinischen Praxis"}, {"en": "archeological research", "de": "Archäologie"}, {"en": "evolutionary and population genetic studies", "de": "evolutions- und populationsgenetischen Studien"}]
[{"en": "Over the last decade", "de": "während der letzten Dekade"}, {"en": "mtDNA analysis", "de": "Analyse mitochondrialer DNA"}, {"en": "high importance", "de": "zunehmend Anwendung"}, {"en": "forensic identification casework", "de": "rechtsmedizinischen Praxis"}, {"en": "archeological research", "de": "in der Archäologie"}, {"en": "evolutionary and population genetic studies", "de": "evolutions- und populationsgenetischen Studien"}]

The structure of the mitochondrial DNA is described with particular consideration of the non-coding hypervariable regions.
Die Struktur der mitochondrialen DNA unter besonderer Berücksichtigung der nichtkodierenden hypervariablen Regionen wird beschrieben.
[{"en": "mitochondrial DNA", "de": "mitochondrialen DNA"}, {"en": "non-coding hypervariable regions", "de": "nichtkodierenden hypervariablen Regionen"}]
[{"en": "The structure", "de": "Die Struktur"}, {"en": "mitochondrial DNA", "de": "mitochondrialen DNA"}, {"en": "described", "de": "wird beschrieben"}, {"en": "particular consideration", "de": "besonderer Berücksichtigung"}, {"en": "non-coding", "de": "nichtkodierenden"}, {"en": "hypervariable regions", "de": "hypervariablen Regionen"}]

Furthermore the importance of sequence polymorphisms for evolution biological investigations is discussed.

[{"en": "sequence polymorphisms", "de": "Sequenzpolymorphismen"}, {"en": "evolution biological investigations", "de": "evolutionsbiologische Untersuchungen"}]
[{"en": "Furthermore", "de": "Ferner"}, {"en": "the importance", "de": "die Bedeutung"}, {"en": "sequence polymorphisms", "de": "Sequenzpolymorphismen"}, {"en": "evolution", "de": "evolutionsbiologische"}, {"en": "biological investigations", "de": "Untersuchungen"}, {"en": "is discussed", "de": "erörtert"}]

The forensic value of the size and the stucture of sequence databases is underlined.

Experimental studies dealing with mtDNA analysis of extracts from teeth, hair shafts and contaminated evidential material are presented.

SLO microperimetric examination after the extraction of choroidal neovascular membranes (CNV) in age-related macular degeneration (AMD) shows absolute scotoma in the area of pigment epithelial loss.

Magnetic Resonance imaging with its excellent soft tissue contrast represents the method of choice for examination of intraarticular and periarticular structures of joints.
Die Magnetresonanztomographie (MRT) mit ihrem hohen Weichteilkontrast ist die bildgebende Methode der Wahl zur Darstellung der intraartikulären Strukturen und der umgebenden Weichteile der Gelenke.
[{"en": "Magnetic Resonance imaging", "de": "Magnetresonanztomographie (MRT)"}, {"en": "soft tissue contrast", "de": "hohen Weichteilkontrast"}, {"en": "intraarticular and periarticular structures", "de": "intraartikulären Strukturen und der umgebenden Weichteile"}, {"en": "joints", "de": "Gelenke"}]

However, conventional MR-imaging without intraarticular contrast application is not suitable for the diagnosis of labral lesions.
Zur Diagnostik von Labrumläsionen des Hüftgelenks ist die Nativ-MRT jedoch nicht geeignet.
[{"en": "conventional MR-imaging", "de": "Nativ-MRT"}, {"en": "intraarticular contrast application", "de": "Labrumläsionen des Hüftgelenks"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Diagnostik"}, {"en": "labral lesions", "de": "Labrumläsionen"}]

MR-arthrography (MRA) of the hip clearly demonstrates labral pathology by distension of the joint space and entrance of the contrast medium into the lesion.
Die MR-Arthrographie (MRA) des Hüftgelenks erlaubt durch die Distension des Gelenkraums und Markierung der Läsion die direkte Darstellung von Labrumläsionen.
[{"en": "MR-arthrography", "de": "MR-Arthrographie"}, {"en": "MRA", "de": "MRA"}, {"en": "hip", "de": "Hüftgelenks"}, {"en": "labral pathology", "de": "Labrumläsionen"}, {"en": "joint space", "de": "Gelenkraums"}, {"en": "contrast medium", "de": "Markierung"}, {"en": "lesion", "de": "Läsion"}]

Multiplanar 3-D-gradient echo sequences enable visualisation of the most important cranio-ventral portion of the labrum.
Multiplanare dreidimensionale (3D-)Sequenzen ermöglichen die Beurteilung in den entscheidenden kranioventralen Abschnitten.
[{"en": "Multiplanar 3-D-gradient echo sequences", "de": "Multiplanare dreidimensionale (3D-)Sequenzen"}, {"en": "cranio-ventral portion of the labrum", "de": "kranioventralen Abschnitten"}]

With the MRA labral lesions can be subdivided into different, clinically relevant stages.
Die Labrumläsionen können mit der MRA in verschiedene, klinisch relevante Stadien eingeteilt werden.
[{"en": "MRA labral lesions", "de": "Labrumläsionen"}, {"en": "clinically relevant stages", "de": "klinisch relevante Stadien"}]

In our study including operatively verified cases, MRA showed excellent sensitivity (90 %) and accuracy (91 %) in detecting labral lesions.
In einer von uns durchgeführten Studie mit operativ verifizierten Fällen zeigte die MRA eine ausgezeichnete Sensitivität (90 %) und Treffsicherheit (91 %).
[{"en": "study", "de": "Studie"}, {"en": "sensitivity", "de": "Sensitivität"}, {"en": "accuracy", "de": "Treffsicherheit"}, {"en": "labral lesions", "de": "Fällen"}]

So far no complication occurred with more than 100 MRA's.

The rigidity of varicose veins was higher than that of normal veins;
Es zeigte sich, daß die Varicenwand rigider war als die Wand normaler Venen, davon war auch die Venenwand unterhalb einer noch intakten Venenklappe betroffen.
[{"en": "rigidity", "de": "rigider"}, {"en": "varicose veins", "de": "Varicenwand"}, {"en": "normal veins", "de": "Wand normaler Venen"}]
[{"en": "rigidity", "de": "rigider"}, {"en": "varicose veins", "de": "Varicenwand"}, {"en": "higher", "de": "war"}, {"en": "normal veins", "de": "normaler Venen"}]

there was no difference between the varicose vein above a competent valve and the "normal" vein below this competent valve.
Die Veränderung der Vene und damit die Ursache für die Änderung der Zugfestigkeit lag in der Venenwand und hier insbesondere an den Bestandteilen der extracellulären Matrix.
[{"en": "varicose vein", "de": "Vene"}, {"en": "competent valve", "de": "Änderung der Zugfestigkeit"}]
[{"en": "varicose vein", "de": "Vene"}, {"en": "vein", "de": "Vene"}]

These results suggest that the role of the venous valves in the development of varicose veins is secondary to changes of the vein wall.
In der Zusammenschau der mechanischen Versuche und der immunhistochemischen Ergebnisse läßt sich die Theorie der primären Klappenzerstörung und der anschließenden varicösen Umbildung der Vene nicht bestätigen, viel eher kommt es zunächst zu einer Veränderung der Venenwand und damit auch zu einer Klappeninsuffizienz.
[{"en": "venous valves", "de": "Klappen"}, {"en": "development", "de": "Umbildung"}, {"en": "varicose veins", "de": "varicösen"}, {"en": "changes of the vein wall", "de": "Veränderung der Venenwand"}]

A specific angiographic or duplex sonographic diagnostic investigation is necessary to show the arterial occlusion.

The success rate of combined glaucoma and small incision cataract surgery is not yet established.

Propofol is known to possess direct antiemetic effects.
Die direkte antiemetische Wirkung von Propofol ist bereits bekannt.
[{"en": "Propofol", "de": "Propofol"}, {"en": "direct antiemetic effects", "de": "direkte antiemetische Wirkung"}]
[{"en": "Propofol", "de": "Propofol"}, {"en": "is known", "de": "ist bereits bekannt"}, {"en": "direct", "de": "direkte"}, {"en": "antiemetic effects", "de": "antiemetische Wirkung"}]

Its use for induction and maintenance of anaesthesia has been shown to be associated with a lower incidence of postoperative nausea and vomiting (PONV) when compared to any other anaesthetic drug or technique.
Die Kombinationen von Anästhesieeinleitung und Anästhesieunterhalt mit Propofol ergeben bei Total intravenöser Anästhesie (TIVA) eine, im Vergleich zu anderen Anästhesiemedikamenten oder -techniken, verminderte Inzidenz von postoperativer Übelkeit und Erbrechen (PONV).
[{"en": "induction", "de": "Anästhesieeinleitung"}, {"en": "maintenance of anaesthesia", "de": "Anästhesieunterhalt"}, {"en": "postoperative nausea and vomiting", "de": "postoperativer Übelkeit und Erbrechen"}, {"en": "anaesthetic drug", "de": "Anästhesiemedikamenten"}, {"en": "technique", "de": "-techniken"}]

In this article, the best ways to take advantage of propofol's antiemetic properties are emphasized.

Postoperative cosmetic results in soft tissue after combined surgical and prosthetic treatment of the extremely atrophic edentulous maxilla by maxillary advancement, sinus lift, and insertion of enosseous implants are rarely considered during preoperative planning.

In a prospective study that began in 1993 in 23 patients, the treatment concept was determined by a medical rapid prototyping model and video imaging to predict the soft tissue profile, taking into consideration the appearance of the front teeth.
In einer prospektiven Studie seit 1993 wurde bei 23 Patienten das Behandlungskonzept anhand der Anfertigung eines medizinischen Rapid Prototyping-Modells des Gesichtsschädels und einer Weichteilprofilprognose mit Video-Imaging unter besonderer Berücksichtigung der Frontzahnästhetik festgelegt.
[{"en": "prospective study", "de": "prospektiven Studie"}, {"en": "medical rapid prototyping model", "de": "medizinischen Rapid Prototyping-Modells"}, {"en": "video imaging", "de": "Video-Imaging"}, {"en": "soft tissue profile", "de": "Weichteilprofilprognose"}, {"en": "front teeth", "de": "Frontzahnästhetik"}]
[{"en": "In a prospective study", "de": "In einer prospektiven Studie"}, {"en": "began in 1993", "de": "seit 1993"}, {"en": "23 patients", "de": "23 Patienten"}, {"en": "treatment concept", "de": "Behandlungskonzept"}, {"en": "medical rapid prototyping model", "de": "medizinischen Rapid Prototyping-Modells"}, {"en": "video imaging", "de": "Video-Imaging"}, {"en": "soft tissue profile", "de": "Weichteilprofilprognose"}, {"en": "taking into consideration", "de": "unter besonderer Berücksichtigung"}, {"en": "the appearance of the front teeth", "de": "der Frontzahnästhetik"}]

In eight patients, the surgical and/or the prosthetic concept was modified according to the treatment plan decided on with the patient.

[{"en": "eight patients", "de": "8 Patienten"}, {"en": "surgical", "de": "operative"}, {"en": "prosthetic concept", "de": "prothetische Behandlungskonzept"}, {"en": "treatment plan", "de": "präoperativen Planung"}]

All patients were highly satisfied with the aesthetic and functional result achieved.
Alle Patienten zeigten sich mit dem erzielten funktionellen und ästhetischen Ergebnis sehr zufrieden.
[{"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "aesthetic and functional result", "de": "funktionellen und ästhetischen Ergebnis"}]
[{"en": "All patients", "de": "Alle Patienten"}, {"en": "highly satisfied", "de": "sehr zufrieden"}, {"en": "aesthetic", "de": "ästhetischen"}, {"en": "functional", "de": "funktionellen"}, {"en": "result", "de": "Ergebnis"}, {"en": "achieved", "de": "erzielten"}]

Profile prediction using video imaging is a useful tool in planning rehabilitation of the atrophic maxilla and takes into account the interplay of various factors - the amount of maxillary advancement, the direction of insertion of enosseous implants, and the type of supraconstruction.
Die Profilprognose mit Video-Imaging bedeutet eine sinnvolle Entscheidungshilfe bei der Planung der Rehabilitation des atrophischen Oberkiefers, um die sich gegenseitig beeinflussenden Faktoren - Ausmaß der Oberkiefervorverlagerung, Insertionsrichtung enossaler Implanate und Art der Suprakonstruktion - zu berücksichtigen.
[{"en": "Profile prediction", "de": "Profilprognose"}, {"en": "video imaging", "de": "Video-Imaging"}, {"en": "rehabilitation", "de": "Rehabilitation"}, {"en": "atrophic maxilla", "de": "atrophischen Oberkiefers"}, {"en": "maxillary advancement", "de": "Oberkiefervorverlagerung"}, {"en": "enosseous implants", "de": "enossaler Implanate"}, {"en": "supraconstruction", "de": "Suprakonstruktion"}]

We report on a patient with multicentric juvenile xanthogranuloma, whose unusual clinical and histological pattern initially obscured the diagnosis.
Es wird über ein großknotiges multizentrisches juveniles Xanthogranulom berichtet, dessen ungewöhnlicher klinischer und histologischer Aspekt die Diagnose anfänglich nicht zuließ.
[{"en": "multicentric juvenile xanthogranuloma", "de": "großknotiges multizentrisches juveniles Xanthogranulom"}, {"en": "clinical", "de": "klinischer"}, {"en": "histological pattern", "de": "histologischer Aspekt"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Diagnose"}]
[{"en": "patient", "de": "großknotiges"}, {"en": "multicentric juvenile xanthogranuloma", "de": "multizentrisches juveniles Xanthogranulom"}, {"en": "unusual", "de": "ungewöhnlicher"}, {"en": "clinical", "de": "klinischer"}, {"en": "histological", "de": "histologischer"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Diagnose"}]

Spontaneous remission of the tumour, which has now been maintained for over 2 years, the change from the primary monomorphological fibrocytic appearance to a polymorphological histiocytic picture with multiple fat-storing giant cells, and the lacking demonstration of specific cell organelles finally allowed the nature of the disease to the definitely diagnosed.
Die inzwischen mehr als 2 Jahre währende Spontanregression mit der Änderung des primär monomorphen fibrozytischen hin zu einem polymorphen histiozytischen Aspekt mit zahlreichen fettspeichernden Riesenzellen sowie der fehlende Nachweis spezifischer Zellorganellen konnten die Natur der Erkrankung sichern.
[{"en": "Spontaneous remission", "de": "Spontanregression"}, {"en": "tumour", "de": "Erkrankung"}, {"en": "primary monomorphological fibrocytic appearance", "de": "primär monomorphen fibrozytischen"}, {"en": "polymorphological histiocytic picture", "de": "polymorphen histiozytischen Aspekt"}, {"en": "multiple fat-storing giant cells", "de": "zahlreichen fettspeichernden Riesenzellen"}, {"en": "specific cell organelles", "de": "spezifischer Zellorganellen"}]
[{"en": "Spontaneous remission", "de": "Spontanregression"}, {"en": "tumour", "de": "Erkrankung"}, {"en": "over 2 years", "de": "mehr als 2 Jahre"}, {"en": "change", "de": "Änderung"}, {"en": "primary", "de": "primär"}, {"en": "fibrocytic", "de": "fibrozytischen"}, {"en": "polymorphological", "de": "polymorphen"}, {"en": "histiocytic", "de": "histiozytischen"}, {"en": "giant cells", "de": "Riesenzellen"}, {"en": "specific cell organelles", "de": "spezifischer Zellorganellen"}, {"en": "nature of the disease", "de": "Natur der Erkrankung"}]

The German drug market offers thymus preparations, among other agents, for treatment of rheumatic diseases.
Zur Behandlung von Erkrankungen des rheumatischen Formenkreises werden auf dem deutschen Arzneimittelmarkt unter anderem Thymus-Präparate angeboten.
[{"en": "German drug market", "de": "deutschen Arzneimittelmarkt"}, {"en": "thymus preparations", "de": "Thymus-Präparate"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Behandlung"}, {"en": "rheumatic diseases", "de": "Erkrankungen des rheumatischen Formenkreises"}]
[{"en": "The German", "de": "dem deutschen"}, {"en": "drug market", "de": "Arzneimittelmarkt"}, {"en": "offers", "de": "angeboten"}, {"en": "thymus preparations", "de": "Thymus-Präparate"}, {"en": "among other agents", "de": "unter anderem"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Behandlung"}, {"en": "rheumatic diseases", "de": "Erkrankungen des rheumatischen Formenkreises"}]

The published data on thymus products are based on case reports, on studies with inadequate and partly ethically questionable design and on investigations that were too short and comprised too few patients to allow scientific valid conclusions.
Die publizierten Erkenntnisse zu Thymus-Präparaten beruhen auf Einzelfallberichten, Studien mit mangelhaftem und teilweise ethisch fragwürdigem Studiendesign, sowie Untersuchungen, die aufgrund kurzer Studiendauer und geringer Patientenzahl keine wissenschaftlich begründete Aussage erlauben.
[{"en": "thymus products", "de": "Thymus-Präparaten"}, {"en": "case reports", "de": "Einzelfallberichten"}, {"en": "studies", "de": "Studien"}, {"en": "investigations", "de": "Untersuchungen"}, {"en": "scientific valid conclusions", "de": "wissenschaftlich begründete Aussage"}]
[{"en": "The published data", "de": "Die publizierten Erkenntnisse"}, {"en": "thymus products", "de": "Thymus-Präparaten"}, {"en": "based on", "de": "beruhen auf"}, {"en": "case reports", "de": "Einzelfallberichten"}, {"en": "studies", "de": "Studien"}, {"en": "inadequate", "de": "mangelhaftem"}, {"en": "ethically questionable", "de": "ethisch fragwürdigem"}, {"en": "design", "de": "Studiendesign"}, {"en": "investigations", "de": "Untersuchungen"}, {"en": "too short", "de": "kurzer Studiendauer"}, {"en": "too few patients", "de": "geringer Patientenzahl"}, {"en": "scientific valid conclusions", "de": "wissenschaftlich begründete Aussage"}]

Therefore, reflecting the current status of scientific knowledge, and in consideration of the risks possibly associated with the use of thymus preparations for treatment of rheumatic diseases (e.g. rheumatoid arthritis), there is no medical substantiation for a recommendation of this therapy.
Eine medizinisch vertretbare Therapie-Empfehlung für Thymus-Präparate bei rheumatischen Erkrankungen (z.B. bei rheumatoider Arthritis) lässt sich auf dieser Grundlage mit hinreichender, dem Stand des Wissens entsprechend positiver Nutzen-Risiko-Bewertung, unter Berücksichtigung der mit der Behandlung verbundenen möglichen Risiken derzeit nicht ableiten.
[{"en": "thymus preparations", "de": "Thymus-Präparate"}, {"en": "treatment of rheumatic diseases", "de": "bei rheumatischen Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "rheumatoid arthritis", "de": "rheumatoider Arthritis"}, {"en": "therapy", "de": "Therapie-Empfehlung"}]

Finding the cause of severe hematemesis was challenging due to a previous Billroth-II gastric resection.
Nach zunächst uncharakteristischer Oberbauchsymptomatik war es zu wiederholten akuten oberen Gastrointestinalblutungen bis zur Schocksymptomatik gekommen, deren Ursachenfindung bei Zustand nach Billroth-II-Magenresektion erschwert war.

The superselective angiographic embolization of intrahepatic aneurysms is a promising form of treatment with low risk.
Die superselektive angiographische Embolisation intrahepatischer Aneurysmen ist eine risikoarme und erfolgversprechende Therapiemöglichkeit.

Studies into the pathophysiology of acute ischaemic stroke have indicated that treatment options are likely to be optimised when early signs of stroke are recognised and treatment is initiated within 3 hours from symptom onset.
Untersuchungen zur Pathophysiologie des akuten ischämischen Insultes haben gezeigt, daß optimale Bedingungen bestehen, wenn die Frühsymptome des Schlaganfalls schnell erkannt werden und die Behandlung innerhalb von 3 h nach Einsetzen der Erstsymptome eingeleitet wird.
[{"en": "pathophysiology", "de": "Pathophysiologie"}, {"en": "acute ischaemic stroke", "de": "akuten ischämischen Insultes"}, {"en": "treatment options", "de": "Behandlung"}, {"en": "early signs of stroke", "de": "Frühsymptome des Schlaganfalls"}, {"en": "symptom onset", "de": "Einsetzen der Erstsymptome"}]

For most patients there is a long delay between the onset of symptoms and the start of therapy.
Zwischen dem Auftreten der Symptome und Therapiebeginn geht oft wertvolle Zeit verloren.

For the future, we hope that emergency medical services (EMS) will be able to initiate therapies which must be administered within the first few hours of acute stroke.
Die Steigerung dieser Anzahl ist durch intensivierte Ausbildungsmaßnahmen, die sowohl die Öffentlichkeit als auch das notfallmedizinische Personal berücksichtigen, zu erreichen.

Standard of care by the EMS personnel includes maintenance of oxygenation, treatment of cardiac arrhythmia and hypertension as well as hyperglycemia and hyperthermia.
Der gültige Behandlungsstandard in der Akuttherapie umfaßt eine adäquate zerebrale Oxygenierung, die Behandlung von Herzrhythmusstörungen, das Blutdruck-Management sowie die Therapie von Hyperglykämie und Hyperthermie.

The efficacy of buprenorphine in opioid dependent patients (n=20) was compared to methadone maintained subjects (n=20) in a randomized comparison trial.
Im Rahmen der Erhaltungstherapie mit synthetischen Opioiden wurde über eine Studiendauer von 24 Wochen die Wirksamkeit von sublingual appliziertem Buprenorphin in Tablettenform mit oral verabreichtem Methadon bei 40 opiatabhängigen Patienten verglichen.
[{"en": "efficacy", "de": "Wirksamkeit"}, {"en": "buprenorphine", "de": "Buprenorphin"}, {"en": "opioid dependent patients", "de": "opiatabhängigen Patienten"}, {"en": "methadone", "de": "Methadon"}, {"en": "randomized comparison trial", "de": "Studiendauer von 24 Wochen"}]
[{"en": "efficacy", "de": "Wirksamkeit"}, {"en": "buprenorphine", "de": "Buprenorphin"}, {"en": "opioid dependent patients", "de": "opiatabhängigen Patienten"}, {"en": "compared", "de": "verglichen"}, {"en": "methadone", "de": "Methadon"}, {"en": "trial", "de": "Studie"}]


A trend (p=0.06) could be found in the retention rate of investigated patients being maintained on a mean dosage of 63 mg oral applicable methadone (racemat of L- and D-methadone) in comparison to the group on a mean dosage of 7,3 mg buprenorphine (sublingual tablets).
Es ergab sich bei einer mittleren täglichen Dosis von 7,3 mg Buprenorphin und einer mittleren Dosierung von 63 mg Methadon eine Tendenz bezüglich der Retentionsrate (p=0,06) zugunsten der mit Methadon behandelten Gruppe.
[{"en": "trend", "de": "Tendenz"}, {"en": "retention rate", "de": "Retentionsrate"}, {"en": "mean dosage", "de": "mittleren Dosierung"}, {"en": "oral applicable methadone", "de": "Methadon"}, {"en": "buprenorphine", "de": "Buprenorphin"}]
[{"en": "trend", "de": "Tendenz"}, {"en": "retention rate", "de": "Retentionsrate"}, {"en": "mean dosage", "de": "mittleren Dosierung"}, {"en": "methadone", "de": "Methadon"}, {"en": "buprenorphine", "de": "Buprenorphin"}]

The dropout-rate of 11 subjects at the end of the study in the buprenorphine group was higher when compared to the dropout-rate of 5 in the methadone group.
Die Ausfallsrate in der mit Buprenorphin behandelten Gruppe (n=20) war mit 11 Patienten im Vergleich zu 5 Patienten in der methadonbehandelten Gruppe (n=20) tendenziell höher.

There was no significant difference between the two groups over the treatment period in respect to additional consumption of opiates, benzodiazepines and cocaine as evaluated through urine toxicology.
Hinsichtlich des Zusatzkonsumes von Opiaten, Benzodiazepinen und Kokain ließ sich kein signifikanter Unterschied zwischen den beiden während des Behandlungsverlaufes erheben.

The result in regard to compliance over the study period demonstrates that methadone appears to be the more successful oral opioid (p=0,04).
Methadon stellte sich, was die Verbleibedauer in der Studie betrifft, als die erfolgreichere Substanz dar (p=0,04).

How important and predicative are clinical parameters and locoregional failure after radical radiotherapy of oropharyngeal carcinomas for the probability of the occurrence of distant metastases?

From 1 August 1990 to 1 October 1998, 139 patients with carcinomas of the oropharynx were treated in a prospective study by radical radiotherapy and evaluated in regard to the clinical parameters reflex-otalgia, predominant structure of tumor growth, T-category, presence of involved lymph nodes, and smoking and drinking habits.
Zwischen 1.8.1990 und 1.10.1998 wurden 139 konsekutive Patienten mit Oropharynxkarzinomen in einer prospektiven Studie mit einer radikalen Radiotherapie behandelt und bezüglich der klinischen Parameter, Reflexotalgie, vorherrschende Struktur des Tumorwachstums, T-Kategorie, Lymphknotenbefall und Genußgewohnheiten untersucht.
[{"en": "carcinomas of the oropharynx", "de": "Oropharynxkarzinomen"}, {"en": "radical radiotherapy", "de": "radikalen Radiotherapie"}, {"en": "clinical parameters", "de": "klinischen Parameter"}, {"en": "reflex-otalgia", "de": "Reflexotalgie"}, {"en": "predominant structure of tumor growth", "de": "vorherrschende Struktur des Tumorwachstums"}, {"en": "T-category", "de": "T-Kategorie"}, {"en": "involved lymph nodes", "de": "Lymphknotenbefall"}, {"en": "smoking and drinking habits", "de": "Genußgewohnheiten"}]

Twenty-nine patients received a concomitant chemotherapy.
29 Patienten erhielten eine begleitende Chemotherapie.

[{"en": "Twenty-nine", "de": "29"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "received", "de": "erhielten"}, {"en": "concomitant", "de": "begleitende"}, {"en": "chemotherapy", "de": "Chemotherapie"}]

Twenty-five out of 139 patients had a planned neck dissection after completion of radiotherapy.

The median follow-up time was 24 months (range, 4 to 74).

The tumors were controlled in 77/139 patients (55%).

[{"en": "tumors", "de": "Leiden"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "77/139"}]

The therapy failed in 62/139 patients (45%).
Der Tumor wurde bei 62/139 Patienten (45%) nicht beherrscht.
[{"en": "therapy", "de": "Der Tumor"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}]
[{"en": "The therapy", "de": "Der Tumor"}, {"en": "failed", "de": "nicht beherrscht"}, {"en": "62/139 patients", "de": "62/139 Patienten"}, {"en": "45%", "de": "45%"}]

Both groups, 62 patients with locoregional therapy failure and 77 patients with locoregionally controlled tumors, were comparable in regard to performance status (Karnofsky index), age, gender, TNM-categories, histological differentiation, drinking habits, pretherapeutic diagnostics, total dose (Gy), and number of simultaneous chemotherapy cycles.
Die beiden Patientengruppen, 62 Patienten mit lokalem Therapieversagen und 77 Patienten mit lokal geheiltem Tumorleiden, waren vergleichbar bezüglich Karnofsky-Index, Alter, Geschlecht, histologischer Differenzierung, Alkoholkonsum, prätherapeutischer Diagnostik, Gesamtdosis (Gy) und Anzahl der simultanen Chemotherapiezyklen.
[{"en": "locoregional therapy failure", "de": "lokalem Therapieversagen"}, {"en": "locoregionally controlled tumors", "de": "lokal geheiltem Tumorleiden"}, {"en": "performance status", "de": "Karnofsky-Index"}, {"en": "age", "de": "Alter"}, {"en": "gender", "de": "Geschlecht"}, {"en": "histological differentiation", "de": "histologischer Differenzierung"}, {"en": "drinking habits", "de": "Alkoholkonsum"}, {"en": "pretherapeutic diagnostics", "de": "prätherapeutischer Diagnostik"}, {"en": "total dose (Gy)", "de": "Gesamtdosis (Gy)"}, {"en": "number of simultaneous chemotherapy cycles", "de": "Anzahl der simultanen Chemotherapiezyklen"}]
[{"en": "Both groups", "de": "Die beiden Patientengruppen"}, {"en": "62 patients", "de": "62 Patienten"}, {"en": "therapy failure", "de": "Therapieversagen"}, {"en": "77 patients", "de": "77 Patienten"}, {"en": "controlled tumors", "de": "geheiltem Tumorleiden"}, {"en": "comparable", "de": "vergleichbar"}, {"en": "performance status", "de": "Karnofsky-Index"}, {"en": "age", "de": "Alter"}, {"en": "gender", "de": "Geschlecht"}, {"en": "histological differentiation", "de": "histologischer Differenzierung"}, {"en": "drinking habits", "de": "Alkoholkonsum"}, {"en": "pretherapeutic diagnostics", "de": "prätherapeutischer Diagnostik"}, {"en": "total dose", "de": "Gesamtdosis"}, {"en": "number of simultaneous chemotherapy cycles", "de": "Anzahl der simultanen Chemotherapiezyklen"}]

Locoregional tumor control was significantly determined by the parameters reflex-otalgia (p < 0.0078), predominant growth pattern (p < 0.012), T-category (p < 0.03), and smoking (p < 0.0285).
Die Tumorkontrolle war von den Parametern Reflexotalgie (p < 0,0078), Wachstumsstruktur (p < 0,012), T-Kategorie (p < 0,03) und Rauchen (p < 0,0285) signifikant mitbestimmt.
[{"en": "Locoregional tumor control", "de": "Tumorkontrolle"}, {"en": "parameters", "de": "Parametern"}, {"en": "reflex-otalgia", "de": "Reflexotalgie"}, {"en": "predominant growth pattern", "de": "Wachstumsstruktur"}, {"en": "T-category", "de": "T-Kategorie"}, {"en": "smoking", "de": "Rauchen"}]
[{"en": "Locoregional tumor control", "de": "Die Tumorkontrolle"}, {"en": "significantly", "de": "signifikant"}, {"en": "determined", "de": "mitbestimmt"}, {"en": "parameters", "de": "Parametern"}, {"en": "reflex-otalgia", "de": "Reflexotalgie"}, {"en": "predominant growth pattern", "de": "Wachstumsstruktur"}, {"en": "T-category", "de": "T-Kategorie"}, {"en": "smoking", "de": "Rauchen"}]

The median survival time of patients with locoregional failure is 17 months.
Die mediane Überlebenszeit der Patienten mit lokoregionärem Therapieversagen betrug 17 Monate.
[{"en": "median survival time", "de": "mediane Überlebenszeit"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "locoregional failure", "de": "lokoregionärem Therapieversagen"}, {"en": "17 months", "de": "17 Monate"}]
[{"en": "The median survival time", "de": "Die mediane Überlebenszeit"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "locoregional failure", "de": "lokoregionärem Therapieversagen"}, {"en": "17 months", "de": "17 Monate"}]

At this moment 81% of locoregionally controlled patients are still alive.
Zu diesem Zeitpunkt lebten noch 81% der lokal kontrollierten Patienten.
[{"en": "locoregionally controlled patients", "de": "lokal kontrollierten Patienten"}]
[{"en": "At this moment", "de": "Zu diesem Zeitpunkt"}, {"en": "81%", "de": "81%"}, {"en": "locoregionally controlled patients", "de": "lokal kontrollierten Patienten"}, {"en": "are still alive", "de": "lebten noch"}]

In 14/62 patients (23%) with locoregional failure, distant metastases were detectable against 4/77 (5%) of locally controlled patients, p < 0.0026.
Bei 23% (14/62) der lokoregionär nicht kontrollierten Patienten wurden Fernmetastasen nachgewiesen, dagegen nur bei 4/77 (5%) der lokoregionär geheilten Patienten (p < 0,0026).
[{"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "locoregional failure", "de": "lokoregionär nicht kontrollierten"}, {"en": "distant metastases", "de": "Fernmetastasen"}, {"en": "locally controlled patients", "de": "lokoregionär geheilten Patienten"}]
[{"en": "In", "de": "Bei"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "with", "de": "der"}, {"en": "locoregional failure", "de": "lokoregionär nicht kontrollierten"}, {"en": "distant metastases", "de": "Fernmetastasen"}, {"en": "detectable", "de": "nachgewiesen"}, {"en": "locally controlled patients", "de": "lokoregionär geheilten Patienten"}]

Probability of local control and distant metastases, predominantly pulmonary, reached a plateau after 24 months.
Lokale Kontrollwahrscheinlichkeit und Fernmetastasierung, am häufigsten Lungenmetastasen, erreichten ein Plateau nach 24 Monaten.
[{"en": "Probability of local control", "de": "Lokale Kontrollwahrscheinlichkeit"}, {"en": "distant metastases", "de": "Fernmetastasierung"}, {"en": "predominantly pulmonary", "de": "am häufigsten Lungenmetastasen"}, {"en": "reached a plateau", "de": "erreichten ein Plateau"}, {"en": "24 months", "de": "24 Monaten"}]
