Perfluorocarbone liquids (PFCL) enable explantation of intraocular lenses (IOL) dislocated into the vitreous.
Flüssiges Perfluorkarbon (PFCL) hat sich unter anderem auch zur Elevation und anschließenden Entfernung einer in den Glaskörper dislozierten Intraokularlinse (IOL) bewährt.
[{"en": "Perfluorocarbone liquids (PFCL)", "de": "Flüssiges Perfluorkarbon (PFCL)"}, {"en": "intraocular lenses (IOL)", "de": "Intraokularlinse (IOL)"}, {"en": "dislocated into the vitreous", "de": "in den Glaskörper dislozierten"}]
[{"en": "Perfluorocarbone liquids", "de": "Flüssiges Perfluorkarbon"}, {"en": "PFCL", "de": "PFCL"}, {"en": "intraocular lenses", "de": "Intraokularlinse"}, {"en": "IOL", "de": "IOL"}, {"en": "dislocated", "de": "dislozierten"}, {"en": "vitreous", "de": "Glaskörper"}]

Because of their relatively high specific weight, the IOL can be floated off the retina and repositioned in the anterior segment.
Aufgrund des hohen spezifischen Gewichtes von PFCL wird die IOL aufgeschwemmt und kann in den vorderen Augenabschnitt reponiert werden, wo sie z. B. im Sulcus ciliaris refixiert werden kann.
[{"en": "relatively high specific weight", "de": "hohen spezifischen Gewichtes"}, {"en": "IOL", "de": "IOL"}, {"en": "anterior segment", "de": "vorderen Augenabschnitt"}]
[{"en": "Because of", "de": "Aufgrund"}, {"en": "relatively high", "de": "hohen"}, {"en": "specific weight", "de": "spezifischen Gewichtes"}, {"en": "IOL", "de": "IOL"}, {"en": "floated off", "de": "aufgeschwemmt"}, {"en": "repositioned", "de": "reponiert"}, {"en": "anterior segment", "de": "vorderen Augenabschnitt"}]

If the IOL surface is affected by contact with PFCL is still unknown.
Welche Art von Kontakt PFCL mit der IOL eingeht, ist ungeklärt.
[{"en": "IOL surface", "de": "IOL"}, {"en": "contact with PFCL", "de": "Kontakt PFCL"}]
[{"en": "If", "de": "Welche"}, {"en": "is affected", "de": "eingeht"}, {"en": "contact", "de": "Kontakt"}, {"en": "with", "de": "mit"}, {"en": "is", "de": "ist"}, {"en": "unknown", "de": "ungeklärt"}]


We report on a rare case of a solitary subcutaneous metastasis from a chondrosarcoma.
Es wird über den seltenen Fall einer solitären subkutanen Hautmetastase eines Chondrosarkoms berichtet.
[{"en": "rare case", "de": "seltenen Fall"}, {"en": "solitary subcutaneous metastasis", "de": "solitären subkutanen Hautmetastase"}, {"en": "chondrosarcoma", "de": "Chondrosarkoms"}]
[{"en": "We report", "de": "Es wird"}, {"en": "rare case", "de": "seltenen Fall"}, {"en": "solitary", "de": "solitären"}, {"en": "subcutaneous", "de": "subkutanen"}, {"en": "metastasis", "de": "Hautmetastase"}, {"en": "chondrosarcoma", "de": "Chondrosarkoms"}]

The metastasis occurred 7 years after excision of the primary neoplasm.
Die Metastase trat nach siebenjährigem erscheinungsfreiem postoperativem Intervall auf.
[{"en": "metastasis", "de": "Metastase"}, {"en": "7 years", "de": "siebenjährigem"}]
[{"en": "The metastasis", "de": "Die Metastase"}, {"en": "occurred", "de": "trat"}, {"en": "7 years", "de": "siebenjährigem"}, {"en": "after", "de": "nach"}, {"en": "excision", "de": "postoperativem"}, {"en": "primary neoplasm", "de": "erscheinungsfreiem"}]

Further investigations revealed no evidence of other metastases.
Im Rahmen der weiteren Untersuchungen fanden sich keine klinisch-apparativ erfaßbaren Metastasen.
[{"en": "Further investigations", "de": "weiteren Untersuchungen"}, {"en": "evidence", "de": "erfaßbaren"}, {"en": "metastases", "de": "Metastasen"}]
[{"en": "Further investigations", "de": "weiteren Untersuchungen"}, {"en": "no evidence", "de": "keine"}, {"en": "other metastases", "de": "Metastasen"}]

Nevertheless, according to data in the literature, the prognosis has to be considered very poor.
Unter Berücksichtigung der bisher beschriebenen Fälle ist die Prognose dennoch sehr schlecht.
[{"en": "prognosis", "de": "Prognose"}]
[{"en": "Nevertheless", "de": "dennoch"}, {"en": "according", "de": "Unter Berücksichtigung"}, {"en": "data", "de": "Fälle"}, {"en": "literature", "de": "bisher beschriebenen"}, {"en": "prognosis", "de": "Prognose"}, {"en": "has to be", "de": "ist"}, {"en": "considered", "de": "sehr"}, {"en": "very poor", "de": "sehr schlecht"}]

Developmental anomalies of the pancreas result from fusion failure between the dorsal and ventral pancreatic ducts (pancreas divisum) or from rotational failure of the ventral bud (pancreas anulare).
Entwicklungsanomalien des Pankreas sind auf die embryonale Entstehung des Organs zurückzuführen und sind durch eine Malfusion (Pankreas divisum) oder eine Malrotation (Pankreas anulare) der beiden Anlagen verursacht.
[{"en": "Developmental anomalies", "de": "Entwicklungsanomalien"}, {"en": "pancreas", "de": "Pankreas"}, {"en": "fusion failure", "de": "Malfusion"}, {"en": "dorsal and ventral pancreatic ducts", "de": "der beiden Anlagen"}, {"en": "pancreas divisum", "de": "Pankreas divisum"}, {"en": "rotational failure", "de": "Malrotation"}, {"en": "ventral bud", "de": "Pankreas anulare"}]
[{"en": "Developmental anomalies", "de": "Entwicklungsanomalien"}, {"en": "the pancreas", "de": "des Pankreas"}, {"en": "fusion failure", "de": "Malfusion"}, {"en": "dorsal and ventral pancreatic ducts", "de": "der beiden Anlagen"}, {"en": "pancreas divisum", "de": "Pankreas divisum"}, {"en": "rotational failure", "de": "Malrotation"}, {"en": "ventral bud", "de": "Pankreas anulare"}]

Pancreas divisum and pancreas anulare can be confirmed exclusively by means of pancreatography.
Pankreas divisum und Pankreas anulare können letztlich nur durch eine Gangdarstellung des Pankreasganges gesichert werden.
[{"en": "Pancreas divisum", "de": "Pankreas divisum"}, {"en": "pancreas anulare", "de": "Pankreas anulare"}, {"en": "pancreatography", "de": "Gangdarstellung des Pankreasganges"}]
[{"en": "Pancreas divisum", "de": "Pankreas divisum"}, {"en": "pancreas anulare", "de": "Pankreas anulare"}, {"en": "confirmed", "de": "gesichert werden"}, {"en": "exclusively", "de": "letztlich nur"}, {"en": "by means of", "de": "durch"}, {"en": "pancreatography", "de": "Gangdarstellung des Pankreasganges"}]

Congenital disorders of the pancreas derive from genetic defects involving different organ systems, which usually dominanate the clinical symptoms.
Bei den kongenitalen Erkrankungen liegen genetische Defekte vor, bei denen meist andere Organsysteme mitbetroffen sind und bei denen die extrapankreatischen Schäden meist im Vordergrund der Krankheitsbilder stehen.
[{"en": "Congenital disorders", "de": "kongenitalen Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "pancreas", "de": "extrapankreatischen"}, {"en": "genetic defects", "de": "genetische Defekte"}, {"en": "organ systems", "de": "Organsysteme"}, {"en": "clinical symptoms", "de": "Krankheitsbilder"}]
[{"en": "Congenital disorders", "de": "kongenitalen Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "pancreas", "de": "extrapankreatischen"}, {"en": "genetic defects", "de": "genetische Defekte"}, {"en": "organ systems", "de": "Organsysteme"}, {"en": "clinical symptoms", "de": "Krankheitsbilder"}]

Developmental anomalies and congenital disorders of the pancreas lead to varying morphological alterations of the organ which can be assessed by means of modern imaging.
Sowohl die Entwicklungsanomalien des Pankreas als auch die kongenitalen Erkrankungen führen zu unterschiedlichsten morphologischen Veränderungen des Organs, die mit modernen bildgebenden Verfahren zu erfassen sind.
[{"en": "Developmental anomalies", "de": "Entwicklungsanomalien"}, {"en": "congenital disorders", "de": "kongenitalen Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "pancreas", "de": "Pankreas"}, {"en": "morphological alterations", "de": "morphologischen Veränderungen"}, {"en": "modern imaging", "de": "modernen bildgebenden Verfahren"}]
[{"en": "Developmental anomalies", "de": "Entwicklungsanomalien"}, {"en": "congenital disorders", "de": "kongenitalen Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "pancreas", "de": "Pankreas"}, {"en": "morphological alterations", "de": "morphologischen Veränderungen"}, {"en": "organ", "de": "Organs"}, {"en": "assessed", "de": "erfassen"}, {"en": "modern imaging", "de": "modernen bildgebenden Verfahren"}]

There is often more to a book than the subject matter addressed by its author.
Bücher enthalten oft nicht nur den vom Verfasser abgefaßten Stoff.
[{"en": "book", "de": "Bücher"}, {"en": "subject matter", "de": "Stoff"}, {"en": "author", "de": "Verfasser"}]
[{"en": "There is", "de": "Bücher enthalten"}, {"en": "often", "de": "oft"}, {"en": "more", "de": "nicht nur"}, {"en": "to a book", "de": "den"}, {"en": "subject matter", "de": "Stoff"}, {"en": "addressed", "de": "abgefaßten"}, {"en": "by its author", "de": "vom Verfasser"}]

Taking Bärensprung and Hebra's desktop volume as an example, this article shows how books can tell us more about the history of medicine than might be apparent at first sight.
Anhand des Tafelwerkes von Bärensprung und Hebra wird dargelegt, daß sie auf den zweiten Blick auch manche weitere medizinhistorisch relevante Fakten erkennen lassen.
[{"en": "Bärensprung and Hebra's desktop volume", "de": "Tafelwerkes von Bärensprung und Hebra"}, {"en": "history of medicine", "de": "medizinhistorisch relevante Fakten"}]
[{"en": "Taking", "de": "Anhand"}, {"en": "Bärensprung", "de": "Bärensprung"}, {"en": "Hebra", "de": "Hebra"}, {"en": "example", "de": "Tafelwerkes"}, {"en": "article", "de": "dargelegt"}, {"en": "books", "de": "sie"}, {"en": "history of medicine", "de": "medizinhistorisch"}, {"en": "first sight", "de": "zweiten Blick"}]

About five per cent of the children with congenital diaphragmatic hernia are asymptomatic during parturition and are diagnosed beyond the neonatal period.
Etwa 5% aller Patienten mit kongenitaler Zwerchfellhernie/-defekt sind zum Zeitpunkt der Geburt asymptomatisch und werden jenseits der Neugeborenenperiode diagnostiziert.
[{"en": "children", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "congenital diaphragmatic hernia", "de": "kongenitaler Zwerchfellhernie/-defekt"}, {"en": "asymptomatic", "de": "asymptomatisch"}, {"en": "parturition", "de": "Geburt"}, {"en": "neonatal period", "de": "Neugeborenenperiode"}]
[{"en": "About five per cent", "de": "Etwa 5%"}, {"en": "children", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "congenital diaphragmatic hernia", "de": "kongenitaler Zwerchfellhernie/-defekt"}, {"en": "asymptomatic", "de": "asymptomatisch"}, {"en": "parturition", "de": "Zeitpunkt der Geburt"}, {"en": "diagnosed", "de": "diagnostiziert"}, {"en": "neonatal period", "de": "Neugeborenenperiode"}]

We report about particularities of "late-presenters" with congenital diaphragmatic hernias namely funnel chest and a fatal outcome of an associated acute gastric volvulus.
Wir berichten über ungewöhnliche Befunde bei spätpräsentierten kongenitalen Zwerchfelldefekten, nämlich die Assoziation mit primärer Trichterbrust und einem letalen Verlauf bei akutem Magenvolvulus.
[{"en": "late-presenters", "de": "spätpräsentierten"}, {"en": "congenital diaphragmatic hernias", "de": "kongenitalen Zwerchfelldefekten"}, {"en": "funnel chest", "de": "Trichterbrust"}, {"en": "fatal outcome", "de": "letalen Verlauf"}, {"en": "acute gastric volvulus", "de": "akutem Magenvolvulus"}]
[{"en": "We report", "de": "Wir berichten"}, {"en": "particularities", "de": "ungewöhnliche Befunde"}, {"en": "late-presenters", "de": "spätpräsentierten"}, {"en": "congenital diaphragmatic hernias", "de": "kongenitalen Zwerchfelldefekten"}, {"en": "funnel chest", "de": "Trichterbrust"}, {"en": "fatal outcome", "de": "letalen Verlauf"}, {"en": "associated", "de": "Assoziation"}, {"en": "acute gastric volvulus", "de": "akutem Magenvolvulus"}]

The efficiency of ultrasound was tested in septic arthritis.
Die Aussagefähigkeit der Sonographie bei der bakteriellen Koxitis wurde überprüft.
[{"en": "efficiency", "de": "Aussagefähigkeit"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "Sonographie"}, {"en": "septic arthritis", "de": "bakteriellen Koxitis"}]
[{"en": "efficiency", "de": "Aussagefähigkeit"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "Sonographie"}, {"en": "tested", "de": "überprüft"}, {"en": "septic arthritis", "de": "bakteriellen Koxitis"}]

A total of 259 children with hip pain, septic arthritis (n = 14), transient synovitis (n = 120), juvenile rheumatoid arthritis (n = 12), Legg-Calvé-Perthes disease (n = 92) and slipped capital femoral epiphysis (n = 21) were examined by ultrasound.
259 Kinder mit Hüftschmerzen, bakterieller Koxitis (n = 14), Coxitis fugax (n = 120), juvenile rheumatoide Arthritis (n = 12), Morbus Perthes (n = 92) und Epiphyseolysis capitis femoris (n = 21) wurden sonographisch untersucht.
[{"en": "hip pain", "de": "Hüftschmerzen"}, {"en": "septic arthritis", "de": "bakterieller Koxitis"}, {"en": "transient synovitis", "de": "Coxitis fugax"}, {"en": "juvenile rheumatoid arthritis", "de": "juvenile rheumatoide Arthritis"}, {"en": "Legg-Calvé-Perthes disease", "de": "Morbus Perthes"}, {"en": "slipped capital femoral epiphysis", "de": "Epiphyseolysis capitis femoris"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}]
[{"en": "A total of", "de": "259"}, {"en": "children", "de": "Kinder"}, {"en": "hip pain", "de": "Hüftschmerzen"}, {"en": "septic arthritis", "de": "bakterieller Koxitis"}, {"en": "transient synovitis", "de": "Coxitis fugax"}, {"en": "juvenile rheumatoid arthritis", "de": "juvenile rheumatoide Arthritis"}, {"en": "Legg-Calvé-Perthes disease", "de": "Morbus Perthes"}, {"en": "slipped capital femoral epiphysis", "de": "Epiphyseolysis capitis femoris"}, {"en": "by ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}]

By using the standard planes described by the DEGUM, it is possible to analyze the joint capsule, the surface of the femoral head and the periarticular structures.
Im Ultraschallbild können in den Standardschnittebenen der DEGUM die Gelenkkapsel, die Hüftkopfoberfläche sowie die periartikulären Strukturen beurteilt werden.
[{"en": "standard planes", "de": "Standardschnittebenen"}, {"en": "DEGUM", "de": "DEGUM"}, {"en": "joint capsule", "de": "Gelenkkapsel"}, {"en": "femoral head", "de": "Hüftkopfoberfläche"}, {"en": "periarticular structures", "de": "periartikulären Strukturen"}]
[{"en": "By using", "de": "Im"}, {"en": "standard planes", "de": "Standardschnittebenen"}, {"en": "described", "de": "können"}, {"en": "joint capsule", "de": "Gelenkkapsel"}, {"en": "femoral head", "de": "Hüftkopf"}, {"en": "periarticular structures", "de": "periartikulären Strukturen"}]

In cases with synovitis or joint effusion, capsular distention can be diagnosed by ultrasound.
Eine intraartikuläre Raumforderung (Synovialitis, Erguß) kann sonographisch als Gelenkkapseldistension erfaßt werden.
[{"en": "synovitis", "de": "Synovialitis"}, {"en": "joint effusion", "de": "Erguß"}, {"en": "capsular distention", "de": "Gelenkkapseldistension"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}]
[{"en": "cases", "de": "Raumforderung"}, {"en": "synovitis", "de": "Synovialitis"}, {"en": "joint effusion", "de": "Erguß"}, {"en": "capsular distention", "de": "Gelenkkapseldistension"}, {"en": "diagnosed", "de": "erfaßt"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}]

This distention is typical in septic arthritis, transient synovitis, juvenile rheumatoid arthritis, and in the onset phase of Perthes disease.
Diese Kapselabhebung wurde bei der bakteriellen Koxitis, der Coxitis fugax, der juvenilen rheumatoiden Koxitis und im Frühstadium des Morbus Perthes sonographisch nachgewiesen.
[{"en": "distention", "de": "Kapselabhebung"}, {"en": "septic arthritis", "de": "bakteriellen Koxitis"}, {"en": "transient synovitis", "de": "Coxitis fugax"}, {"en": "juvenile rheumatoid arthritis", "de": "juvenilen rheumatoiden Koxitis"}, {"en": "Perthes disease", "de": "Morbus Perthes"}]
[{"en": "This", "de": "Diese"}, {"en": "distention", "de": "Kapselabhebung"}, {"en": "typical", "de": "sonographisch nachgewiesen"}, {"en": "septic arthritis", "de": "bakteriellen Koxitis"}, {"en": "transient synovitis", "de": "Coxitis fugax"}, {"en": "juvenile rheumatoid arthritis", "de": "juvenilen rheumatoiden Koxitis"}, {"en": "onset phase", "de": "Frühstadium"}, {"en": "Perthes disease", "de": "Morbus Perthes"}]

Because capsular distention and osseous abnormalities in the various diseases are similar differentiation is not possible.
Da die Gelenkkapseldistension bei den einzelnen Erkrankungen keine signifikanten Unterschiede aufweist, ist aufgrund des Sonogramms beim Vorliegen einer Kapseldistension ohne knöcherne Veränderungen eine Differenzierung dieser Erkrankungen nicht möglich.
[{"en": "capsular distention", "de": "Gelenkkapseldistension"}, {"en": "osseous abnormalities", "de": "knöcherne Veränderungen"}, {"en": "various diseases", "de": "einzelnen Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "differentiation", "de": "Differenzierung"}]
[{"en": "capsular distention", "de": "Gelenkkapseldistension"}, {"en": "osseous abnormalities", "de": "knöcherne Veränderungen"}, {"en": "various diseases", "de": "einzelnen Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "differentiation", "de": "Differenzierung"}, {"en": "not possible", "de": "nicht möglich"}]

Therefore, ultrasound cannot distinguish between septic and non-specific arthritis;
Eine bakterielle Koxitis kann somit von Koxitiden anderer Genese sonographisch nicht sicher abgegrenzt werden;
[{"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}, {"en": "septic", "de": "bakterielle"}, {"en": "non-specific arthritis", "de": "Koxitiden anderer Genese"}]
[{"en": "Therefore", "de": "somit"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}, {"en": "cannot", "de": "nicht"}, {"en": "distinguish", "de": "abgegrenzt"}, {"en": "between", "de": "von"}, {"en": "septic", "de": "bakterielle"}, {"en": "and", "de": "anderer"}, {"en": "non-specific", "de": "Koxitiden"}, {"en": "arthritis", "de": "Koxitis"}]

capsular distention is a non-specific ultrasound sign.
die Kapseldistension gilt als ein unspezifisches sonographisches Zeichen.
[{"en": "capsular distention", "de": "Kapseldistension"}, {"en": "non-specific ultrasound sign", "de": "unspezifisches sonographisches Zeichen"}]
[{"en": "capsular distention", "de": "Kapseldistension"}, {"en": "non-specific", "de": "unspezifisches"}, {"en": "ultrasound sign", "de": "sonographisches Zeichen"}]

Immediate diagnostic puncture is necessary if septic arthritis is suspected (possible by ultrasound control).
Bei klinischem Verdacht auf eine bakterielle Koxitis ist eine unverzügliche diagnostische Punktion ggf. unter sonographischer Kontrolle erforderlich.
[{"en": "diagnostic puncture", "de": "diagnostische Punktion"}, {"en": "septic arthritis", "de": "bakterielle Koxitis"}, {"en": "ultrasound control", "de": "sonographischer Kontrolle"}]
[{"en": "Immediate", "de": "unverzügliche"}, {"en": "diagnostic", "de": "diagnostische"}, {"en": "puncture", "de": "Punktion"}, {"en": "necessary", "de": "erforderlich"}, {"en": "suspected", "de": "Verdacht"}, {"en": "ultrasound control", "de": "sonographischer Kontrolle"}]

In cases with both capsular distention and osseous abnormalities, ultrasound usually allows differentiation between slipped capital femoral epiphysis/Perthes disease and septic/non-specific arthritis.
Aufgrund zusätzlicher knöcherner Veränderungen neben der Kapseldistension lassen sich sonographisch die Epiphyseolysis capitis femoris und der Morbus Perthes im Kondensations- und Fragmentationsstadium sowohl von der bakteriellen Koxitis als auch von Koxitiden anderer Genese unterscheiden.
[{"en": "capsular distention", "de": "Kapseldistension"}, {"en": "osseous abnormalities", "de": "knöcherner Veränderungen"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}, {"en": "slipped capital femoral epiphysis", "de": "Epiphyseolysis capitis femoris"}, {"en": "Perthes disease", "de": "Morbus Perthes"}, {"en": "septic/non-specific arthritis", "de": "bakteriellen Koxitis"}]
[{"en": "In cases", "de": "Aufgrund"}, {"en": "capsular distention", "de": "Kapseldistension"}, {"en": "osseous abnormalities", "de": "knöcherner Veränderungen"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographisch"}, {"en": "slipped capital femoral epiphysis", "de": "Epiphyseolysis capitis femoris"}, {"en": "Perthes disease", "de": "Morbus Perthes"}, {"en": "septic", "de": "bakteriellen"}, {"en": "non-specific arthritis", "de": "Koxitiden anderer Genese"}]

The diagnosis of the rare disease Gliomatosis cerebri requires the correlation of clinical, radiological, and pathological findings.
Die Diagnose der seltenen Gliomatosis cerebri kann nur in Zusammenschau von klinischen, radiologischen und histopathologischen Befunden gestellt werden.
[{"en": "rare disease", "de": "seltenen"}, {"en": "Gliomatosis cerebri", "de": "Gliomatosis cerebri"}, {"en": "clinical", "de": "klinischen"}, {"en": "radiological", "de": "radiologischen"}, {"en": "pathological findings", "de": "histopathologischen Befunden"}]
[{"en": "The diagnosis", "de": "Die Diagnose"}, {"en": "rare disease", "de": "seltenen"}, {"en": "Gliomatosis cerebri", "de": "Gliomatosis cerebri"}, {"en": "requires", "de": "kann nur"}, {"en": "correlation", "de": "Zusammenschau"}, {"en": "clinical", "de": "klinischen"}, {"en": "radiological", "de": "radiologischen"}, {"en": "pathological findings", "de": "histopathologischen Befunden"}]

Due to the unusually high malignancy of the tumor cells, diagnosis was complicated by atypical findings such as gadolinium enhancement in MRI and raised intracranial pressure.
Da in beiden Fällen für Gliomatosis cerebri ungewöhnlich hochgradig entdifferenzierte Tumorzellen vorlagen, wurde die Diagnosefindung durch atypische Befunde wie Kontrastmittelaufnahme im MRT und klinische Zeichen der intrakraniellen Drucksteigerung erschwert.
[{"en": "unusually high malignancy", "de": "ungewöhnlich hochgradig entdifferenzierte"}, {"en": "tumor cells", "de": "Tumorzellen"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Diagnosefindung"}, {"en": "atypical findings", "de": "atypische Befunde"}, {"en": "gadolinium enhancement", "de": "Kontrastmittelaufnahme"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "raised intracranial pressure", "de": "intrakraniellen Drucksteigerung"}]
[{"en": "Due to", "de": "Da"}, {"en": "unusually high", "de": "ungewöhnlich hochgradig"}, {"en": "malignancy", "de": "entdifferenzierte"}, {"en": "tumor cells", "de": "Tumorzellen"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Diagnosefindung"}, {"en": "atypical findings", "de": "atypische Befunde"}, {"en": "gadolinium enhancement", "de": "Kontrastmittelaufnahme"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "raised intracranial pressure", "de": "intrakraniellen Drucksteigerung"}]

The clinical course, differential diagnosis, and literature are summarized briefly.
Klinischer Verlauf, Differentialdiagnosen und Literatur werden kurz dargestellt.
[{"en": "clinical course", "de": "Klinischer Verlauf"}, {"en": "differential diagnosis", "de": "Differentialdiagnosen"}, {"en": "literature", "de": "Literatur"}]
[{"en": "The clinical course", "de": "Klinischer Verlauf"}, {"en": "differential diagnosis", "de": "Differentialdiagnosen"}, {"en": "literature", "de": "Literatur"}, {"en": "summarized", "de": "dargestellt"}, {"en": "briefly", "de": "kurz"}]

Several study designs such as cohort studies, case-control studies or randomized controlled trials are explained in detail, and their problems and their interpretation are discussed.
Verschiedene Versuchsdesigns wie Kohortenstudie, Fall-Kontroll-Studie und randomisierte klinische Studie werden dargestellt, erläutert, und es wird auf Probleme hingewiesen.
[{"en": "study designs", "de": "Versuchsdesigns"}, {"en": "cohort studies", "de": "Kohortenstudie"}, {"en": "case-control studies", "de": "Fall-Kontroll-Studie"}, {"en": "randomized controlled trials", "de": "randomisierte klinische Studie"}, {"en": "problems", "de": "Probleme"}, {"en": "interpretation", "de": "erläutert"}]
[{"en": "Several", "de": "Verschiedene"}, {"en": "study designs", "de": "Versuchsdesigns"}, {"en": "cohort studies", "de": "Kohortenstudie"}, {"en": "case-control studies", "de": "Fall-Kontroll-Studie"}, {"en": "randomized controlled trials", "de": "randomisierte klinische Studie"}, {"en": "explained", "de": "erläutert"}, {"en": "problems", "de": "Probleme"}, {"en": "interpretation", "de": "es wird auf"}]

It is demonstrated that observational studies may yield valuable information about associations between exposure and outcome variables but that only properly designed randomized clinical trials of adequate sample size make it possible to answer research questions about causal relationships.
Auf wichtige Aspekte randomisierter Studien wird im Detail eingegangen und dargestellt, daß sie die einzige Möglichkeit sind, in einer empirischen Wissenschaft wie der Medizin zu Aussagen über kausale Zusammenhänge zu gelangen.
[{"en": "observational studies", "de": "randomisierter Studien"}, {"en": "exposure and outcome variables", "de": "kausale Zusammenhänge"}, {"en": "randomized clinical trials", "de": "randomisierter Studien"}, {"en": "adequate sample size", "de": "empirischen Wissenschaft"}, {"en": "causal relationships", "de": "kausale Zusammenhänge"}]
[{"en": "observational studies", "de": "randomisierter Studien"}, {"en": "valuable information", "de": "Aussagen"}, {"en": "associations", "de": "Zusammenhänge"}, {"en": "exposure", "de": "kausale"}, {"en": "outcome variables", "de": "empirischen Wissenschaft"}, {"en": "randomized clinical trials", "de": "Medizin"}, {"en": "adequate sample size", "de": "im Detail eingegangen"}, {"en": "research questions", "de": "Möglichkeit"}, {"en": "causal relationships", "de": "kausale Zusammenhänge"}]

It is emphasized that good clinical research depends on properly designed studies more than on complicated statistical procedures.
Es wird argumentiert, daß sich die biometrischen Anforderungen an klinische Forschung nicht durch die Anwendung komplexer statistischer Verfahren erfüllen lassen, sondern daß in diesem Sinne gute klinische Forschung ganz vorrangig von einer sorgfältigen Studienplanung abhängt.
[{"en": "good clinical research", "de": "gute klinische Forschung"}, {"en": "properly designed studies", "de": "sorgfältigen Studienplanung"}, {"en": "complicated statistical procedures", "de": "komplexer statistischer Verfahren"}]

A potential impact of tricyclic antidepressants on oral anticoagulation is controversial.
Eine mögliche Beeinflussung der Antikoagulanzientherapie durch trizyklische Antidepressiva wird bislang unterschiedlich bewertet.

Seven patients, aged 61-85 years with symptomatic infrarenal aortic stenosis caused by arteriosclerosis, were treated with transluminal angioplasty and primary implantation of a Palmaz stent, between 1 April 1996 and 30 June 1998.

Since Aspergillus flavus is pathogenic in humans, we believe that intravenous antimycotic therapy with Amphotericin B should started immediately if a patient test positive in trachea culture for Aspergillus flavus.
Durch die richtige Einschätzung der Pathogenität von Aspergillus flavus sollte auch schon bei einmaligem kulturellen Nachweis von Aspergillus flavus in der Trachea eine intravenöse antimykotische Therapie mit Amphotericin B eingeleitet werden.

After refractive or cataract surgery, ocular optical errors can occur that are not correctable with spherical or astigmatic lenses and are probably responsible for the fact that in many cases the best possible (retinal) acuity is not achieved in spite of an optimum refraction.
Nach refraktiven Eingriffen an der Hornhaut und nach Kataraktoperationen können okulare Bildfehler (Aberrationen) auftreten, die nicht mit sphärischen oder astigmatischen Linsen korrigierbar und wahrscheinlich der Grund dafür sind, daß der maximale retinal bedingte Visus trotz optimaler Korrektur häufig nicht erreicht wird.

By this experimental arrangement Ecke and Hofmann found comparable results for flexible and rigid methods of internal stabilization of the pubic symphysis.

In consequence, neither wire loops nor PDS banding should be used for stabilization of injured pubic symphysis if early mobilization with partial weight bearing is desired.

In a 69-year-old female patient a moderately pleomorphic spindle-cell thyroid tumour measuring 5 cm in diameter was initially misinterpreted as primary anaplastic thyroid carcinoma.
Bei einer 69 jährigen Patientin wurde ein 5 cm großer, mäßig pleomorpher spindelzelliger Schilddrüsentumor zunächst als primäres anaplastisches Schilddrüsenkarzinom verkannt.

During clinical investigations to elucidate the cause of severe anaemia, 17 months later an ulcerated duodenal leiomyosarcoma was detected and removed by duodenopancreatectomy.
Erst im Rahmen einer 17 Monate später durchgeführten Anämieabklärung wurde ein 7 cm durchmessendes duodenales Leiomyosarkom entdeckt und mittels Duodenopankreatektomie reseziert.

Reevaluation of the thyroid nodule led to revision of the initial diagnosis to metastatic leiomyosarcoma.
Die erneute Beurteilung der Primärhistologie führte zur Revision der initialen Diagnose und zur Einstufung des Schilddrüsentumors als metastatisches Leiomyosarkom.

Six months later the patient died from cerebral stroke.
Die Patientin verstarb weitere 6 Monate später an einem apoplektischen Insult.

Pharmacotherapy of erectile dysfunction comprises oral and local application of drugs.
Die medikamentöse Therapie der erektilen Dysfunktion umfaßt die orale sowie die lokale Applikation von Pharmaka.

Today, Yohimbin is the only drug listed for this indication.
Die zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt einzige zugelassene orale Substanz mit nachgewiesener Effektivität ist Yohimbin, ein zentral wirksamer Alpharezeptorenblocker.

Yohimbin acts via central alpha-receptor blockade and showed a significant effect in a recent double blind study compared to placebo.
Weitere orale Medikamente mit zentralem Angriffspunkt sind Trazodon und Apomorphin, wobei Apomorphin signifikant besser wirkte als Placebo.

The centrally acting substances Apomorphin and Trazodone were also tested for their potential use with Apomorphin showing promising results.
Sildenafil, ein Phosphodiesterase-Isoenzym-V-Inhibitor mit überwiegend peripherem Wirkmechanismus, zeigte ebenfalls ermutigende Ergebnisse in klinischen Studien.

The orally active phosphodiesterase-V inhibitor Sildenafil acts predominantly on the peripheral side;
Zur lokalen Applikation stehen sowohl die intraurethrale (MUSE) als auch der intracavernöse Anwendungsweise zur Verfügung.

broad clinical studies demonstrated a significant effect of the drugs compared to placebo.

A form of non-verbal psychotherapy, the work with sound, pulsation and rhythm instruments:
Eine Form nonverbaler Psychotherapie wird dargestellt, die Arbeit mit Klang-, Pulsations- und Rhythmusinstrumenten:

They change the state of consciousness of the patient and help to achieve a multimedial therapeutic flow which is particularly important for extremely disturbed patients, who can not be reached sufficiently by words only.

The immunogenic potential of renal cell carcinoma and the resistance of its metastases against chemotherapy, radiation and hormonal treatment have led to the development of a great number and variety of different strategies, summarized under the term immunotherapy.
Die Immunogenität des Nierenzellkarzinoms und die Resistenz seiner Metastasen gegen Chemo-, Strahlen- und Hormontherapien führten zur Etablierung einer Vielzahl von unterschiedlichen unter dem Begriff Immuntherapie zusammengefaßten Strategien.
[{"en": "immunogenic potential", "de": "Immunogenität"}, {"en": "renal cell carcinoma", "de": "Nierenzellkarzinoms"}, {"en": "resistance", "de": "Resistenz"}, {"en": "metastases", "de": "Metastasen"}, {"en": "chemotherapy", "de": "Chemo-"}, {"en": "radiation", "de": "Strahlen-"}, {"en": "hormonal treatment", "de": "Hormontherapien"}, {"en": "immunotherapy", "de": "Immuntherapie"}]

Objective remissions can be expected in about 20-40 % of patients.
Die erzielbaren Remissionsraten liegen in der Regel zwischen 20 und 40 %.
[{"en": "Objective remissions", "de": "erzielbaren Remissionsraten"}]
[{"en": "Objective remissions", "de": "erzielbaren Remissionsraten"}, {"en": "can be expected", "de": "liegen"}, {"en": "in about", "de": "zwischen"}, {"en": "20-40 %", "de": "20 und 40 %"},]

Another 30-40 % show stable disease for a limited time, only occasionally for longer.
Zusätzlich kommt es bei 30-40 % der Patienten zu einer zeitlich limitierten, in Einzelfällen auch Jahre andauernden Stabilisierung der Erkrankung.
[{"en": "stable disease", "de": "Stabilisierung der Erkrankung"}]

Most results are from uncontrolled phase II studies.
Überwiegend handelt es sich hierbei um Ergebnisse unkontrollierter Phase-II-Studien.
[{"en": "uncontrolled phase II studies", "de": "unkontrollierter Phase-II-Studien"}]

A cancer cure can usually not be expected, long-term remissions are rare (5 %), and high remission rates are only observed in studies with strong patient selection.
Heilungen sind in der Regel nicht zu erwarten, Langzeitremissionen sind selten (5 %) und hohe Remissionsraten können nur an selektionierten Patientenkollektiven erzielt werden.
[{"en": "cancer cure", "de": "Heilungen"}, {"en": "long-term remissions", "de": "Langzeitremissionen"}, {"en": "patient selection", "de": "selektionierten Patientenkollektiven"}]
[{"en": "A cancer cure", "de": "Heilungen"}, {"en": "usually", "de": "in der Regel"}, {"en": "not be expected", "de": "nicht zu erwarten"}, {"en": "long-term remissions", "de": "Langzeitremissionen"}, {"en": "are rare", "de": "sind selten"}, {"en": "high remission rates", "de": "hohe Remissionsraten"}, {"en": "only", "de": "nur"}, {"en": "observed", "de": "erzielt werden"}, {"en": "studies", "de": "Patientenkollektiven"}]

Some authors have reported a higher survival rate in patients treated with IL-2 or IFN.
Einige Autoren beschreiben einen Überlebensvorteil für immuntherapierte Patienten gegenüber Nicht- oder Chemotherapierten.
[{"en": "authors", "de": "Autoren"}, {"en": "higher survival rate", "de": "Überlebensvorteil"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}]

Survival of patients with objective remissions is significantly improved.
Gesichert ist ein Überlebensvorteil für Patienten mit objektiven Remissionen.

A standard therapy cannot be defined.
Eine Standardtherapie läßt sich derzeit nicht definieren.

Even presuming an increased survival rate, the toxicity, which can lead to a dramatic reduction in quality of life, and the high costs have to be considered carefully.
Auch unter der Annahme eines Überlebensvorteils, müssen der Verlust an Lebensqualität bedingt durch die Toxizität der gängigen Therapieprotokolle sowie deren hohe Kosten berücksichtigt werden.
[{"en": "increased survival rate", "de": "Überlebensvorteils"}, {"en": "toxicity", "de": "Toxizität"}, {"en": "reduction in quality of life", "de": "Verlust an Lebensqualität"}, {"en": "high costs", "de": "hohe Kosten"}]

We think that in view of the lack of therapeutic alternatives, the improving efficacy, the potential survival benefit, the reduction of toxicity and the perspectives, immunotherapy is essential in the treatment of metastatic renal cell carcinoma.
Aufgrund des Fehlens therapeutischer Alternativen, einer zu erwartenden Verbesserung der momentan erreichbaren Remissionsraten und des von einigen Autoren berichteten Überlebensvorteil für immuntherapierte Patienten [15, 16, 26, 30, 31], halten wir die Immuntherapie für einen essentiellen Bestandteil in der Therapie des metastasierten Nierenzellkarzinoms.
[{"en": "therapeutic alternatives", "de": "therapeutischer Alternativen"}, {"en": "efficacy", "de": "Remissionsraten"}, {"en": "survival benefit", "de": "Überlebensvorteil"}, {"en": "reduction of toxicity", "de": "Verbesserung"}, {"en": "immunotherapy", "de": "Immuntherapie"}, {"en": "treatment of metastatic renal cell carcinoma", "de": "Therapie des metastasierten Nierenzellkarzinoms"}]
[{"en": "We think", "de": "wir"}, {"en": "lack", "de": "Fehlens"}, {"en": "therapeutic alternatives", "de": "therapeutischer Alternativen"}, {"en": "improving efficacy", "de": "Verbesserung der momentan erreichbaren Remissionsraten"}, {"en": "potential survival benefit", "de": "Überlebensvorteil"}, {"en": "immunotherapy", "de": "Immuntherapie"}, {"en": "essential", "de": "essentiellen Bestandteil"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Therapie"}, {"en": "metastatic renal cell carcinoma", "de": "metastasierten Nierenzellkarzinoms"}]

Its use should be confined to clinical studies.
Die Anwendung sollte in der Regel im Rahmen klinischer Studien erfolgen.

[{"en": "use", "de": "Anwendung"}, {"en": "confined", "de": "im Rahmen"}, {"en": "clinical studies", "de": "klinischer Studien"}]

In 262 men (about half of them 44.4 +/- 0.9 and 63.0 +/- 0.9 years old, resp.) and 239 women (about half of them 44.4 +/- 0.9 and 62.8 +/- 0.8 years olf, resp.) the results of 12 clinical chemical analytes were used to calculate laboratory indices which were compared with the biological age in accordance with Ries.
Bei 501 Probanden beiderlei Geschlechts, und zwar 262 Männern (je etwa zur Hälfte 44,4 +/- 0,9 und 63,0 +/- 0,9 Jahre alt) und 239 Frauen (je zur Hälfte 44,4 +/- 0,9 und 62,8 +/- 0,8 Jahre alt), werden aus den Meßwerten von 12 klinisch-chemischen Parametern Laborindizes berechnet und auf Korrelationen mit dem biologischen Alter nach Ries überprüft.
[{"en": "clinical chemical analytes", "de": "klinisch-chemischen Parametern"}, {"en": "laboratory indices", "de": "Laborindizes"}, {"en": "biological age", "de": "biologischen Alter"}]
[{"en": "In", "de": "Bei"}, {"en": "men", "de": "Männern"}, {"en": "women", "de": "Frauen"}, {"en": "years old", "de": "Jahre alt"}, {"en": "results", "de": "Meßwerten"}, {"en": "clinical chemical analytes", "de": "klinisch-chemischen Parametern"}, {"en": "calculate", "de": "berechnet"}, {"en": "laboratory indices", "de": "Laborindizes"}, {"en": "compared", "de": "überprüft"}, {"en": "biological age", "de": "biologischen Alter"}]

The indices were calculated by using concentrations of alkaline phosphatase, iron, total protein, total cholesterol, glucose, uric acid, urea, HDL cholesterol, creatinine, LDL cholesterol, transferrin, and triglycerides.
In die Berechnung des Index werden alkalische Phosphatase, Eisen, Gesamteiweiß, Gesamtcholesterol, Glukose, Harnsäure, Harnstoff, HDL-Cholesterol, Kreatinin, LDL-Cholesterol, Transferrin und Triglyzeride einbezogen.
[{"en": "alkaline phosphatase", "de": "alkalische Phosphatase"}, {"en": "iron", "de": "Eisen"}, {"en": "total protein", "de": "Gesamteiweiß"}, {"en": "total cholesterol", "de": "Gesamtcholesterol"}, {"en": "glucose", "de": "Glukose"}, {"en": "uric acid", "de": "Harnsäure"}, {"en": "urea", "de": "Harnstoff"}, {"en": "HDL cholesterol", "de": "HDL-Cholesterol"}, {"en": "creatinine", "de": "Kreatinin"}, {"en": "LDL cholesterol", "de": "LDL-Cholesterol"}, {"en": "transferrin", "de": "Transferrin"}, {"en": "triglycerides", "de": "Triglyzeride"}]
[{"en": "indices", "de": "Index"}, {"en": "calculated", "de": "Berechnung"}, {"en": "using", "de": "einbezogen"}, {"en": "concentrations", "de": "In"}, {"en": "alkaline phosphatase", "de": "alkalische Phosphatase"}, {"en": "iron", "de": "Eisen"}, {"en": "total protein", "de": "Gesamteiweiß"}, {"en": "total cholesterol", "de": "Gesamtcholesterol"}, {"en": "glucose", "de": "Glukose"}, {"en": "uric acid", "de": "Harnsäure"}, {"en": "urea", "de": "Harnstoff"}, {"en": "HDL cholesterol", "de": "HDL-Cholesterol"}, {"en": "creatinine", "de": "Kreatinin"}, {"en": "LDL cholesterol", "de": "LDL-Cholesterol"}, {"en": "transferrin", "de": "Transferrin"}, {"en": "triglycerides", "de": "Triglyzeride"}]

Only in the younger group of women are the correlations between laboratory indices and biological age significant.
Signifikante Korrelationen zwischen den Laborindizes und dem biologischen Alter ergeben sich nur in der Gruppe der jüngeren Frauen.
[{"en": "younger group of women", "de": "Gruppe der jüngeren Frauen"}, {"en": "correlations", "de": "Korrelationen"}, {"en": "laboratory indices", "de": "Laborindizes"}, {"en": "biological age", "de": "biologischen Alter"}]
[{"en": "Only", "de": "nur"}, {"en": "younger group", "de": "Gruppe der jüngeren"}, {"en": "women", "de": "Frauen"}, {"en": "correlations", "de": "Korrelationen"}, {"en": "laboratory indices", "de": "Laborindizes"}, {"en": "biological age", "de": "biologischen Alter"}, {"en": "significant", "de": "Signifikante"}]

In the same group, several single parameters also significantly correlate with pre-aging.
In der gleichen Gruppe korrelieren auch mehrere Einzelparameter signifikant mit der Voralterung.
[{"en": "single parameters", "de": "Einzelparameter"}, {"en": "pre-aging", "de": "Voralterung"}]
[{"en": "In the same group", "de": "In der gleichen Gruppe"}, {"en": "several", "de": "mehrere"}, {"en": "single parameters", "de": "Einzelparameter"}, {"en": "significantly", "de": "signifikant"}, {"en": "correlate", "de": "korrelieren"}, {"en": "pre-aging", "de": "Voralterung"}]

We present a case of serous cystadenofibroma 2 cm in diameter in the epiploic appendix of the sigmoid as incidental finding in a 72-year-old patient who underwent hysterectomy and oophorectomy for endometrial carcinoma.

The arthroscopic procedure with single incision was supposed to increase stability and to improve proprioception by earlier rehabilitation.

The recommended kilovoltage and scan time for dental scanning was reduced step by step, rating the quality of the low-dose scans.

Measured absorbed radiation dose ranges from 0.30 mGy (thyroid) to 29 mGy (skin) at 187,5 mAs and 1.0 mm-slices (25 mm scanning distance for maxilla, 30 mm for mandible).

The role of enteroviral myocardial infection in the development of dilated cardiomyopathy could only be substantiated after the introduction of molecular biological techniques (polymerase chain reaction, in-situ hybridization) in virological diagnostics of dilated cardiomyopathy.
Die Bedeutung einer enteroviralen Infektion des Myokards bei dilatativer Kardiomyopathie konnte erst durch die Einführung molekularbiologischer Techniken (Polymerase-Kettenreaktion, In-situ-Hybridisierung) in die virologische Diagnostik objektiviert werden.
[{"en": "enteroviral myocardial infection", "de": "enteroviralen Infektion des Myokards"}, {"en": "development of dilated cardiomyopathy", "de": "dilatativer Kardiomyopathie"}, {"en": "molecular biological techniques", "de": "molekularbiologischer Techniken"}, {"en": "polymerase chain reaction", "de": "Polymerase-Kettenreaktion"}, {"en": "in-situ hybridization", "de": "In-situ-Hybridisierung"}, {"en": "virological diagnostics", "de": "virologische Diagnostik"}]

By using histological and especially immunohistological techniques for the detection of myocardial inflammation in patients with the tentative clinical diagnosis of dilated cardiomyopathy, a differentiation between inflammatory cardiomyopathy and idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy on the basis of the WHO classification 1995 (31) was made.
Die Einführung histologischer und vor allem immunhistologischer Techniken für den Nachweis entzündlicher Veränderungen im Myokard, bei Patienten mit der klinischen Verdachtsdiagnose dilatative Kardiomyopathie, ermöglicht eine Unterteilung in inflammatorische Kardiomyopathie und idiopathische dilatative Kardiomyopathie (kein Nachweis entzündlicher Veränderungen im Myokard) entsprechend der WHO-Klassifikation von 1995 (31).
[{"en": "histological", "de": "histologischer"}, {"en": "immunohistological techniques", "de": "immunhistologischer Techniken"}, {"en": "myocardial inflammation", "de": "entzündlicher Veränderungen im Myokard"}, {"en": "dilated cardiomyopathy", "de": "dilatative Kardiomyopathie"}, {"en": "inflammatory cardiomyopathy", "de": "inflammatorische Kardiomyopathie"}, {"en": "idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy", "de": "idiopathische dilatative Kardiomyopathie"}, {"en": "WHO classification 1995", "de": "WHO-Klassifikation von 1995"}]

Inflammatory cardiomyopathy is defined by myocarditis in association with cardiac dysfunction and is diagnosed by established histological and especially immunohistological techniques.
Die inflammatorische Kardiomyopathie ist definiert als eine myokardiale Dysfunktion in Kombination mit einer myokardialen Entzündungsreaktion, welche mit histologischen und vor allem immunhistologischen Techniken erfaßt werden kann.
[{"en": "Inflammatory cardiomyopathy", "de": "inflammatorische Kardiomyopathie"}, {"en": "myocarditis", "de": "myokardialen Entzündungsreaktion"}, {"en": "cardiac dysfunction", "de": "myokardiale Dysfunktion"}, {"en": "histological", "de": "histologischen"}, {"en": "immunohistological techniques", "de": "immunhistologischen Techniken"}]

The combination of histological, immunohistological, and molecularbiological techniques enabled a subgroup analysis of the incidence of enteroviral myocardial RNA in patients with inflammatory cardiomyopathy in comparison to patients with idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy.
Erst durch die Kombination von histologischen, immunhistologischen und molekularbiologischen Techniken gelang es, eine Subgruppenanalyse hinsichtlich der Häufigkeit des Nachweises enteroviraler RNA im Myokard von Patienten mit inflammatorischer Kardiomyopathie im Vergleich zu Patienten mit idiopathischer dilatativer Kardiomyopathie durchzuführen.

The treatment of malignant tumors consists in the optimal combination of the 4 modalities surgery, radiotherapy, chemotherapy, and immunotherapy.
Die Behandlung bösartiger Tumoren ruht auf den vier Säulen Chirurgie, Strahlentherapie, Chemotherapie und Immuntherapie.
[{"en": "treatment", "de": "Behandlung"}, {"en": "malignant tumors", "de": "bösartiger Tumoren"}, {"en": "surgery", "de": "Chirurgie"}, {"en": "radiotherapy", "de": "Strahlentherapie"}, {"en": "chemotherapy", "de": "Chemotherapie"}, {"en": "immunotherapy", "de": "Immuntherapie"}]

Three important malignant diseases will be examined as to the optimal application of systemic chemotherapy.

The term "Castleman's diseas" (angiofollicular lymph node hyperplasia) comprises a heterogeneous clinicopathologic entity among lymphoproliferative disorders.
Als Morbus Castleman (angiofollikuläre Lymphknotenhyperplasie) wird ein heterogenes, histologisch definiertes Krankheitsbild aus der Gruppe der lymphoproliferativen Krankheiten bezeichnet.
[{"en": "Castleman's diseas", "de": "Morbus Castleman"}, {"en": "angiofollicular lymph node hyperplasia", "de": "angiofollikuläre Lymphknotenhyperplasie"}, {"en": "lymphoproliferative disorders", "de": "lymphoproliferativen Krankheiten"}]
[{"en": "The term", "de": "Als"}, {"en": "Castleman's diseas", "de": "Morbus Castleman"}, {"en": "angiofollicular lymph node hyperplasia", "de": "angiofollikuläre Lymphknotenhyperplasie"}, {"en": "heterogeneous", "de": "heterogenes"}, {"en": "clinicopathologic", "de": "histologisch definiertes"}, {"en": "entity", "de": "Krankheitsbild"}, {"en": "lymphoproliferative disorders", "de": "lymphoproliferativen Krankheiten"}]

Paclitaxel, a potent anti-tumor agent, shifts the cytoskeleton equilibrium towards assembly of altered and extraordinarily stable microtubules.
Paclitaxel, eine sehr potente antiproliferative Substanz, fördert die Bildung ungewöhnlich stabiler und funktionsgestörter Mikrotubuli und verändert dadurch zelluläre Mechanismen, die letztlich zu verminderter Proliferation, Migration und Signaltransduktion führen.
[{"en": "Paclitaxel", "de": "Paclitaxel"}, {"en": "anti-tumor agent", "de": "antiproliferative Substanz"}, {"en": "cytoskeleton equilibrium", "de": "zelluläre Mechanismen"}, {"en": "assembly", "de": "Bildung"}, {"en": "microtubules", "de": "Mikrotubuli"}]
[{"en": "Paclitaxel", "de": "Paclitaxel"}, {"en": "anti-tumor agent", "de": "antiproliferative Substanz"}, {"en": "assembly", "de": "Bildung"}, {"en": "stable", "de": "stabiler"}, {"en": "microtubules", "de": "Mikrotubuli"}]

This makes paclitaxel a promising candidate for local drug delivery intended to address the proliferative and migratory processes involved in restenosis.
In dieser Arbeit werden die in-vitro und in-vivo Ergebnisse aus unseren Forschungsarbeiten zu Paclitaxel vorgestellt.
[{"en": "paclitaxel", "de": "Paclitaxel"}, {"en": "local drug delivery", "de": "in-vitro und in-vivo Ergebnisse"}, {"en": "proliferative and migratory processes", "de": "Forschungsarbeiten"}, {"en": "restenosis", "de": "Paclitaxel"}]
[{"en": "paclitaxel", "de": "Paclitaxel"}]

The comparison of an active, semi-active, and passive delivery system (porous balloon, microporous balloon, and double balloon) favored the double balloon for the following in vivo experiments.
Nach Vergleich von 3 verschiedenen Kathetersystemen (poröser Ballon, mikroporöser Ballon und Doppelballon) wurde der Doppelballon für die in-vivo Anwendung favorisiert.
[{"en": "porous balloon", "de": "poröser Ballon"}, {"en": "microporous balloon", "de": "mikroporöser Ballon"}, {"en": "double balloon", "de": "Doppelballon"}, {"en": "in vivo experiments", "de": "in-vivo Anwendung"}]
[{"en": "The comparison", "de": "Nach Vergleich"}, {"en": "active", "de": "poröser"}, {"en": "semi-active", "de": "mikroporöser"}, {"en": "passive", "de": "Doppelballon"}, {"en": "delivery system", "de": "Kathetersystemen"}, {"en": "porous balloon", "de": "poröser Ballon"}, {"en": "microporous balloon", "de": "mikroporöser Ballon"}, {"en": "double balloon", "de": "Doppelballon"}, {"en": "favored", "de": "favorisiert"}, {"en": "in vivo experiments", "de": "in-vivo Anwendung"}]

Tubulin staining and electron microscopy enabled visualization of paclitaxel-induced vessel wall alterations.
Anhand von Anfärbungen des Zytoskelettes sowie elektronenoptisch gelang der Nachweis der Paclitaxelwirkung in den glatten Muskelzellen der Gefäßwand.
[{"en": "Tubulin staining", "de": "Anfärbungen des Zytoskelettes"}, {"en": "electron microscopy", "de": "elektronenoptisch"}, {"en": "paclitaxel-induced vessel wall alterations", "de": "Paclitaxelwirkung in den glatten Muskelzellen der Gefäßwand"}]
[{"en": "Tubulin staining", "de": "Anfärbungen des Zytoskelettes"}, {"en": "electron microscopy", "de": "elektronenoptisch"}, {"en": "visualization", "de": "Nachweis"}, {"en": "paclitaxel-induced", "de": "Paclitaxelwirkung"}, {"en": "vessel wall alterations", "de": "glatten Muskelzellen der Gefäßwand"}]

In the rabbit model, locally delivered paclitaxel resulted in reduced neointima formation and enlargement in vessel size;
Im Kaninchen führte lokal appliziertes Paclitaxel zu einer signifikanten Hemmung der neointimalen Proliferation und Erweiterung des Gefäßdurchmessers im Vergleich zu ballondilatierten Kontrolltieren.
[{"en": "rabbit model", "de": "Kaninchen"}, {"en": "paclitaxel", "de": "Paclitaxel"}, {"en": "neointima formation", "de": "neointimalen Proliferation"}, {"en": "vessel size", "de": "Gefäßdurchmessers"}]
[{"en": "In the", "de": "Im"}, {"en": "rabbit model", "de": "Kaninchen"}, {"en": "locally delivered", "de": "lokal appliziertes"}, {"en": "paclitaxel", "de": "Paclitaxel"}, {"en": "reduced", "de": "Hemmung"}, {"en": "neointima formation", "de": "neointimalen Proliferation"}, {"en": "enlargement", "de": "Erweiterung"}, {"en": "vessel size", "de": "Gefäßdurchmessers"}]


In addition to deposition of debris between the plasma and basal membrane of the RPE, different types of early and late AMD-like drusen, choroidal neovascularization and pigment epithelial detachments are characterized by splitting of Bruch's membrane between the basement membrane of the RPE and the inner collagenous layer.
Neben einer altersabhängigen Einlagerung von Abfallprodukten zwischen der Zytoplamsa- und Basalmembran der RPE-Zellen ("basal laminar deposits") zeigt sich bei verschiedenen Manifestationsformen der frühen und späten AMD wie Drusen, chorioidale Neovaskularisationen und Pigmentepithelabhebungen eine Aufspaltung der Bruchschen Membran zwischen der Basalmembran der RPE-Zellen und der inneren Kollagenschicht.
[{"en": "deposition of debris", "de": "Einlagerung von Abfallprodukten"}, {"en": "plasma and basal membrane", "de": "Zytoplamsa- und Basalmembran"}, {"en": "RPE", "de": "RPE-Zellen"}, {"en": "early and late AMD-like drusen", "de": "frühen und späten AMD wie Drusen"}, {"en": "choroidal neovascularization", "de": "chorioidale Neovaskularisationen"}, {"en": "pigment epithelial detachments", "de": "Pigmentepithelabhebungen"}, {"en": "Bruch's membrane", "de": "Bruchschen Membran"}, {"en": "basement membrane", "de": "Basalmembran"}, {"en": "inner collagenous layer", "de": "inneren Kollagenschicht"}]
[{"en": "In addition to", "de": "Neben"}, {"en": "deposition", "de": "Einlagerung"}, {"en": "debris", "de": "Abfallprodukten"}, {"en": "plasma", "de": "Zytoplamsa"}, {"en": "basal membrane", "de": "Basalmembran"}, {"en": "different types", "de": "verschiedenen Manifestationsformen"}, {"en": "early and late", "de": "frühen und späten"}, {"en": "AMD-like drusen", "de": "Drusen"}, {"en": "choroidal neovascularization", "de": "chorioidale Neovaskularisationen"}, {"en": "pigment epithelial detachments", "de": "Pigmentepithelabhebungen"}, {"en": "splitting", "de": "Aufspaltung"}, {"en": "Bruch's membrane", "de": "Bruchschen Membran"}, {"en": "basement membrane", "de": "Basalmembran"}, {"en": "inner collagenous layer", "de": "inneren Kollagenschicht"}]

Because these layers are normally attached by adhesion molecules, the possible age-related regression of these adhesion molecules in this structure was examined.
Da die verschiedenen Membranen und Schichten durch Adhäsionsmoleküle verbunden sind, wurde untersucht, ob eine altersabhängige Regression des Adhäsionsapparates nachweisbar ist.
[{"en": "layers", "de": "Schichten"}, {"en": "adhesion molecules", "de": "Adhäsionsmoleküle"}, {"en": "age-related regression", "de": "altersabhängige Regression"}]
[{"en": "Because", "de": "Da"}, {"en": "layers", "de": "Schichten"}, {"en": "adhesion molecules", "de": "Adhäsionsmoleküle"}, {"en": "age-related", "de": "altersabhängige"}, {"en": "regression", "de": "Regression"}, {"en": "examined", "de": "untersucht"}]

Newly published investigations show that disturbed spinal growth leads to dysplasia of the vertebral arch and to spondylolysis.
Neuere Untersuchungen machen deutlich, daß die Wirbelbogendysplasie und die Spondylolyse als Folge eines gestörten Wirbelsäulenwachstums entstehen.
[{"en": "disturbed spinal growth", "de": "gestörten Wirbelsäulenwachstums"}, {"en": "dysplasia of the vertebral arch", "de": "Wirbelbogendysplasie"}, {"en": "spondylolysis", "de": "Spondylolyse"}]

To assess complaints and clinical findings of rheumatoid hand flexor tendon disease in relationship to the anatomical site and the type of lesion in order to improve the diagnosis and enable early operative treatment with preservation of hand function.
Die Symptomatik der rheumatischen Handflexorensehnenerkrankung in Abhängigkeit vom Läsionsort und von der Art der Sehenaffektion festzustellen, um durch eine verbesserte klinische Diagnostik eine frühzeitige operative Therapie mit Erhalt der Handfunktion zu ermöglichen.
[{"en": "complaints", "de": "Symptomatik"}, {"en": "clinical findings", "de": "klinische Diagnostik"}, {"en": "rheumatoid hand flexor tendon disease", "de": "rheumatischen Handflexorensehnenerkrankung"}, {"en": "anatomical site", "de": "Läsionsort"}, {"en": "type of lesion", "de": "Art der Sehenaffektion"}, {"en": "diagnosis", "de": "Diagnostik"}, {"en": "early operative treatment", "de": "frühzeitige operative Therapie"}, {"en": "preservation of hand function", "de": "Erhalt der Handfunktion"}]

Naturally occurring animal models are not available even for most common skin diseases.
Für die Mehrheit auch der häufigen Dermatosen fehlen geeignete, in der Natur vorkommende Tiermodelle.
[{"en": "animal models", "de": "Tiermodelle"}, {"en": "common skin diseases", "de": "häufigen Dermatosen"}]
[{"en": "Naturally occurring", "de": "in der Natur vorkommende"}, {"en": "animal models", "de": "Tiermodelle"}, {"en": "not available", "de": "fehlen"}, {"en": "most common", "de": "häufigen"}, {"en": "skin diseases", "de": "Dermatosen"}]

Transgenic technology developed during the 1980s is closing this gap.
Die in den 80er Jahren begründete transgene Technologie schließt diese Lücke.
[{"en": "Transgenic technology", "de": "transgene Technologie"}, {"en": "the 1980s", "de": "den 80er Jahren"}]
[{"en": "Transgenic technology", "de": "transgene Technologie"}, {"en": "developed", "de": "begründete"}, {"en": "during the 1980s", "de": "in den 80er Jahren"}, {"en": "is closing", "de": "schließt"}, {"en": "this gap", "de": "diese Lücke"}]

It was initially used as a tool by scientists in basic research, but during the last 5 years it has increasingly been applied by clinically oriented basic researchers in dermatology.
Sie war zunächst Instrument in der Hand reiner Grundlagenwissenschaftler, hat aber in den letzten fünf Jahren auch Einzug in die klinisch orientierte spezifisch dermatologische Grundlagenforschung gehalten.
[{"en": "tool", "de": "Instrument"}, {"en": "scientists", "de": "Grundlagenwissenschaftler"}, {"en": "basic research", "de": "Grundlagenforschung"}, {"en": "last 5 years", "de": "letzten fünf Jahren"}, {"en": "clinically oriented basic researchers", "de": "klinisch orientierte spezifisch dermatologische Grundlagenforschung"}, {"en": "dermatology", "de": "dermatologische"}]

This technique, has made it possible to imitate HIV-associated diseases and genodermatoses in the murine model and to elucidate their pathogenesis.
Mit ihr wurde es möglich, HIV-assoziierte Erkrankungen wie auch Genodermatosen am murinen Modell zu imitieren und Einblicke in deren Pathogenese zu gewinnen.
[{"en": "HIV-associated diseases", "de": "HIV-assoziierte Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "genodermatoses", "de": "Genodermatosen"}, {"en": "murine model", "de": "murinen Modell"}, {"en": "pathogenesis", "de": "Pathogenese"}]
[{"en": "This technique", "de": "Mit ihr"}, {"en": "made it possible", "de": "wurde es möglich"}, {"en": "to imitate", "de": "zu imitieren"}, {"en": "HIV-associated diseases", "de": "HIV-assoziierte Erkrankungen"}, {"en": "genodermatoses", "de": "Genodermatosen"}, {"en": "murine model", "de": "murinen Modell"}, {"en": "elucidate", "de": "Einblicke"}, {"en": "pathogenesis", "de": "Pathogenese"}]

Owing to specifically induced epidermally localized overexpression of growth factors and cytokines, the skin of transgenic mice exhibited similarities to those of the psoriatic epidermis.
Durch gezielte epidermal lokalisierte Überexpression von Wachstumsfaktoren und Zytokinen wies die Haut transgener Mäuse Ähnlichkeiten mit psoriatischer Epidermis auf.
[{"en": "epidermally localized overexpression", "de": "epidermal lokalisierte Überexpression"}, {"en": "growth factors", "de": "Wachstumsfaktoren"}, {"en": "cytokines", "de": "Zytokinen"}, {"en": "transgenic mice", "de": "transgener Mäuse"}, {"en": "psoriatic epidermis", "de": "psoriatischer Epidermis"}]

Such animals are also useful for studying wound healing.
Gleichzeitig können solcherart erzeugte Mäuse zu Untersuchungen des Wundheilungsprozesses herangezogen werden.

Furthermore, transgenic technology enables us to induce cutaneous tumors selectively.
Die transgene Technologie ermöglicht fernerhin die Induktion kutaner Tumoren.
[{"en": "transgenic technology", "de": "transgene Technologie"}, {"en": "cutaneous tumors", "de": "kutaner Tumoren"}]
[{"en": "Furthermore", "de": "fernerhin"}, {"en": "transgenic technology", "de": "transgene Technologie"}, {"en": "enables", "de": "ermöglicht"}, {"en": "us", "de": "die"}, {"en": "induce", "de": "Induktion"}, {"en": "cutaneous tumors", "de": "kutaner Tumoren"}]

The availability of animal models for human skin diseases is also of value in elucidating experimental therapeutic approaches, e.g. the somatic gene therapy.
Das Vorliegen von Tiermodellen humaner Dermatosen erlaubt darüber hinaus die gezielte Erforschung experimenteller Therapieformen, wie z.B. der somatischen Gentherapie.
[{"en": "animal models", "de": "Tiermodellen"}, {"en": "human skin diseases", "de": "humaner Dermatosen"}, {"en": "experimental therapeutic approaches", "de": "experimenteller Therapieformen"}, {"en": "somatic gene therapy", "de": "somatischen Gentherapie"}]

The indications for magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) on prosthetic heart valve recipients remain critical.
Die Indikationen zur Magnetresonanztomographie (MRT) bei Trägern künstlicher Herzklappen sind kritisch.
[{"en": "magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)", "de": "Magnetresonanztomographie (MRT)"}, {"en": "prosthetic heart valve recipients", "de": "Trägern künstlicher Herzklappen"}]
[{"en": "The indications", "de": "Die Indikationen"}, {"en": "magnetic resonance imaging", "de": "Magnetresonanztomographie"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "prosthetic heart valve", "de": "künstlicher Herzklappen"}, {"en": "recipients", "de": "Trägern"}, {"en": "remain critical", "de": "sind kritisch"}]

A generalized contraindication for MRI is doubtful.
Eine generelle Kontraindikation gegen die MRT ist zweifelhaft.
[{"en": "generalized contraindication", "de": "generelle Kontraindikation"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}]
[{"en": "A", "de": "Eine"}, {"en": "generalized", "de": "generelle"}, {"en": "contraindication", "de": "Kontraindikation"}, {"en": "for", "de": "gegen"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "is", "de": "ist"}, {"en": "doubtful", "de": "zweifelhaft"}]

Some diagnostic questions such as interests in pathologies of the posterior cranial fossa, spinal abscesses, and internal derangements for the knee, strongly recommend the advantages of MRI versus all other radiological diagnostic techniques.
Einige diagnostische Fragestellungen wie Prozesse in der hinteren Schädelgrube, Spinalabszesse und bei Beschwerden im Inneren des Knies lassen sich durch die MRT besser untersuchen als mit anderen radiologischen Verfahren.
[{"en": "diagnostic questions", "de": "diagnostische Fragestellungen"}, {"en": "pathologies of the posterior cranial fossa", "de": "Prozesse in der hinteren Schädelgrube"}, {"en": "spinal abscesses", "de": "Spinalabszesse"}, {"en": "internal derangements for the knee", "de": "Beschwerden im Inneren des Knies"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "radiological diagnostic techniques", "de": "radiologischen Verfahren"}]
[{"en": "Some", "de": "Einige"}, {"en": "diagnostic", "de": "diagnostische"}, {"en": "questions", "de": "Fragestellungen"}, {"en": "interests", "de": "Prozesse"}, {"en": "pathologies", "de": "Beschwerden"}, {"en": "posterior cranial fossa", "de": "hinteren Schädelgrube"}, {"en": "spinal abscesses", "de": "Spinalabszesse"}, {"en": "internal derangements", "de": "im Inneren"}, {"en": "knee", "de": "Knies"}, {"en": "advantages", "de": "besser"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "versus", "de": "als"}, {"en": "all other", "de": "anderen"}, {"en": "radiological diagnostic techniques", "de": "radiologischen Verfahren"}]

MRI can directly affect patients with prosthetic valves in three ways by:
Die MRT kann Träger künstlicher Herzklappen auf dreierlei Weise direkt beeinträchtigen:
[{"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Träger"}, {"en": "prosthetic valves", "de": "künstlicher Herzklappen"}]
[{"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "directly affect", "de": "direkt beeinträchtigen"}, {"en": "patients", "de": "Träger"}, {"en": "prosthetic valves", "de": "künstlicher Herzklappen"}, {"en": "three ways", "de": "dreierlei Weise"}]

1) movement or dislodgment of the prosthesis, 2) heating, and 3) arrhythmias induced by electric currents, and indirectly by distortion of the image and its subsequent misinterpretation.
1) Bewegung und Dislozierung der Klappenprothese, 2) Erwärmung und 3) Induktion von Arrhythmien durch elektrische Ströme, und indirekt durch eine Verzerrung des MRT-Bildes mit der Gefahr einer diagnostischen Fehlinterpretation.
[{"en": "movement", "de": "Bewegung"}, {"en": "dislodgment", "de": "Dislozierung"}, {"en": "prosthesis", "de": "Klappenprothese"}, {"en": "heating", "de": "Erwärmung"}, {"en": "arrhythmias", "de": "Arrhythmien"}, {"en": "electric currents", "de": "elektrische Ströme"}, {"en": "distortion", "de": "Verzerrung"}, {"en": "image", "de": "MRT-Bildes"}, {"en": "misinterpretation", "de": "diagnostischen Fehlinterpretation"}]
[{"en": "movement", "de": "Bewegung"}, {"en": "dislodgment", "de": "Dislozierung"}, {"en": "prosthesis", "de": "Klappenprothese"}, {"en": "heating", "de": "Erwärmung"}, {"en": "arrhythmias", "de": "Arrhythmien"}, {"en": "induced", "de": "Induktion"}, {"en": "electric currents", "de": "elektrische Ströme"}, {"en": "distortion", "de": "Verzerrung"}, {"en": "image", "de": "MRT-Bildes"}, {"en": "subsequent", "de": "diagnostischen"}, {"en": "misinterpretation", "de": "Fehlinterpretation"}]

Present literature that concerns the safety considerations of current values appears to be incomplete.
Die gegenwärtige Literatur über Sicherheitsaspekte der MRT bei Trägern künstlicher Herzklappen erscheint nicht ausreichend.
[{"en": "literature", "de": "Literatur"}, {"en": "safety considerations", "de": "Sicherheitsaspekte"}, {"en": "current values", "de": "MRT bei Trägern künstlicher Herzklappen"}]
[{"en": "Present", "de": "Die gegenwärtige"}, {"en": "literature", "de": "Literatur"}, {"en": "safety considerations", "de": "Sicherheitsaspekte"}, {"en": "current values", "de": "der MRT"}, {"en": "appears", "de": "erscheint"}, {"en": "to be incomplete", "de": "nicht ausreichend"}]

Therefore, a survey of twenty-five valve manufacturers with regard to compatibility, safety or contraindication for MRI on their respective prosthetic heart valves was performed in 1998.
Deshalb wurde 1998 eine Umfrage unter fünfundzwanzig Herstellern künstlicher Herzklappen durchgeführt bezüglich der Kompatibilität, Sicherheit, oder der Kontraindikation der MRT ihrer jeweiligen Klappenprothese.
[{"en": "survey", "de": "Umfrage"}, {"en": "valve manufacturers", "de": "Herstellern künstlicher Herzklappen"}, {"en": "compatibility", "de": "Kompatibilität"}, {"en": "safety", "de": "Sicherheit"}, {"en": "contraindication", "de": "Kontraindikation"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "prosthetic heart valves", "de": "Klappenprothese"}]
[{"en": "Therefore", "de": "Deshalb"}, {"en": "survey", "de": "Umfrage"}, {"en": "twenty-five", "de": "fünfundzwanzig"}, {"en": "valve manufacturers", "de": "Herstellern künstlicher Herzklappen"}, {"en": "compatibility", "de": "Kompatibilität"}, {"en": "safety", "de": "Sicherheit"}, {"en": "contraindication", "de": "Kontraindikation"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "prosthetic heart valves", "de": "Klappenprothese"}, {"en": "performed", "de": "durchgeführt"}, {"en": "1998", "de": "1998"}]

However, some gave their assurances based on inadequate data, or assigned all responsibility to the physician.
Einige Firmen stützten ihre Aussagen auf nicht einzusehende Untersuchungen, oder übertrugen die Verantwortung auf den Arzt, der die MRT durchführt.
[{"en": "assurances", "de": "Aussagen"}, {"en": "responsibility", "de": "Verantwortung"}, {"en": "physician", "de": "Arzt"}]
[{"en": "However", "de": "Einige"}, {"en": "some", "de": "Firmen"}, {"en": "assurances", "de": "Aussagen"}, {"en": "based on", "de": "stützten"}, {"en": "inadequate data", "de": "nicht einzusehende Untersuchungen"}, {"en": "assigned", "de": "übertrugen"}, {"en": "responsibility", "de": "Verantwortung"}, {"en": "physician", "de": "Arzt"}]

Two valve manufacturers warned against performing MRI on certain prostheses.
Zwei Klappenhersteller warnten explizit vor der MRT bei bestimmten Prothesentypen.
[{"en": "valve manufacturers", "de": "Klappenhersteller"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "prostheses", "de": "Prothesentypen"}]
[{"en": "Two", "de": "Zwei"}, {"en": "valve manufacturers", "de": "Klappenhersteller"}, {"en": "warned", "de": "warnten"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "certain", "de": "bestimmten"}, {"en": "prostheses", "de": "Prothesentypen"}]

Based on our 1998 questionnaire, the technical issues, the clinical circumstances, the prerequisites and criteria for and the definition of safety standards for MRI on prosthetic heart valve recipients are presented in this paper.
Aufbauend auf unsere Umfrage wird ein Überblick über die technischen Aspekte, die klinischen Umstände und die Voraussetzungen für MRT-Sicherheitsstandards bei Trägern künstlicher Herzklappen gegeben.
[{"en": "questionnaire", "de": "Umfrage"}, {"en": "technical issues", "de": "technischen Aspekte"}, {"en": "clinical circumstances", "de": "klinischen Umstände"}, {"en": "prerequisites", "de": "Voraussetzungen"}, {"en": "safety standards", "de": "MRT-Sicherheitsstandards"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "prosthetic heart valve recipients", "de": "Trägern künstlicher Herzklappen"}]
[{"en": "Based on", "de": "Aufbauend auf"}, {"en": "questionnaire", "de": "Umfrage"}, {"en": "technical", "de": "technischen"}, {"en": "clinical", "de": "klinischen"}, {"en": "prerequisites", "de": "Voraussetzungen"}, {"en": "safety standards", "de": "Sicherheitsstandards"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}, {"en": "prosthetic heart valve recipients", "de": "Trägern künstlicher Herzklappen"}]

Gas embolism with argon led to increased pulmonary artery pressure (P > 0.001) and induced a decrease in end tidal CO2 (P < 0.001) and reduced cardiac output (P < 0.001) with a consecutive decrease in mean arterial pressure (P < 0.05).
In einer experimentellen Studie wurde bei 10 Schweinen mit einem mittleren Körpergewicht von 18,9 (15-24) kg eine intravenöse CO2- oder Argon-Embolie mit 10, 20 und 30 ml Gas durchgeführt.
[{"en": "Gas embolism", "de": "intravenöse CO2- oder Argon-Embolie"}, {"en": "argon", "de": "Argon"}, {"en": "pulmonary artery pressure", "de": "mittleren Körpergewicht"}, {"en": "end tidal CO2", "de": "intravenöse CO2"}, {"en": "cardiac output", "de": "Gas"}, {"en": "mean arterial pressure", "de": "10, 20 und 30 ml Gas"}]
[{"en": "argon", "de": "Argon"}]

A third animal recovered after resuscitation with noradrenaline after a 30 ml argon bolus.
In der Argon-Gruppe (n = 5) starben zwei Tiere nach 20 bzw. 30 ml Bolusgabe.
[{"en": "animal", "de": "Tiere"}, {"en": "resuscitation", "de": "Argon-Gruppe"}, {"en": "noradrenaline", "de": "Bolusgabe"}, {"en": "argon bolus", "de": "20 bzw. 30 ml"}]
[{"en": "A third animal", "de": "zwei Tiere"}, {"en": "recovered", "de": "starben"}, {"en": "after", "de": "nach"}, {"en": "resuscitation", "de": "Bolusgabe"}, {"en": "noradrenaline", "de": "Argon-Gruppe"}, {"en": "30 ml", "de": "30 ml"}, {"en": "argon", "de": "Argon"}]

Animals in the CO2 group receiving 10, 20, or 30 ml bolus neither required resuscitation nor died.
Ein weiteres Tier konnte nach Gabe von 30 ml Bolus erfolgreich reanimiert werden.
[{"en": "Animals", "de": "Tier"}, {"en": "CO2 group", "de": "Gabe von 30 ml Bolus"}, {"en": "resuscitation", "de": "reanimiert"}]
[{"en": "Animals", "de": "Ein weiteres Tier"}, {"en": "30 ml bolus", "de": "30 ml Bolus"}]

Hemodynamic parameters were not affected by a 10 to 30 ml bolus of CO2 gas.
In der CO2-Gruppe (n = 5) starb weder eines der Tiere noch war eine Reanimation erforderlich.
[{"en": "Hemodynamic parameters", "de": "In der CO2-Gruppe"}, {"en": "10 to 30 ml bolus of CO2 gas", "de": "n = 5"}]
[{"en": "CO2", "de": "CO2"}]

Thus, gases with a low solubility in blood like argon should not be used during procedures with an increased risk of gas embolism.
Wenig lösliche Gase wie Argon sollten in Situationen mit erhöhtem Risiko einer Gasembolie nicht angewendet werden.
[{"en": "gases", "de": "Gase"}, {"en": "low solubility", "de": "Wenig lösliche"}, {"en": "argon", "de": "Argon"}, {"en": "increased risk", "de": "erhöhtem Risiko"}, {"en": "gas embolism", "de": "Gasembolie"}]

A series of 30 treatments resulted in complete disappearance of the lesions on the trunk and neck and significant improvement of those on the limbs.
Wir führten eine Balneophotochemotherapie mit 8-Methoxypsoralen-Ganzkörperbädern nach der Folienmethode durch, die nach 30 Behandlungen zu einer kompletten Rückbildung der Läsionen an Stamm und Hals und zu einer deutlichen Besserung des Hautbefundes an den Extremitäten führte.

No side-effects were observed.

[{"en": "side-effects", "de": "Nebenwirkungen"}]

Bath-PUVA therapy seems to have positive effects not only on epidermal, but also on dermal processes.

Cat scratch disease (CSD) is a rarely recognized infectious disease in Germany.
Bei der Katzenkratzkrankheit (KKK) handelt es sich um eine in Deutschland wenig bekannte Infektionskrankheit.

The typical clinical manifestations of CSD consist of skin changes at the inoculation site and a benign lymphadenopathy;
In der Mehrzahl der Fälle findet sich ein typisches Krankheitsbild mit Hautveränderungen im Bereich von Katzenbiß- oder Kratzwunden und einer benignen Lymphadenopathie.

other manifestations are rare.

We report the case of a 47 year old woman, who developed a reactive spondylarthropathy with synovitis of finger joints, polyarthralgias of large- and medium-sized joints, and inflammatory spinal pain after a cat bite.
Wir berichten über eine 47-jährige Patientin, die nach einem Katzenbiß eine reaktive Spondarthritis mit Synovialitiden der Fingergelenke, Polyarthralgien der mittleren und großen Gelenke und entzündliche Lumbalgien entwickelte.

The rheumatic manifestations resolved after 10 months by treatment with non-steroidal antirheumatic drugs.

In recent years, continuous optimization of therapy has decisively improved the prognosis of Hodgkin's disease.
Durch kontinuierliche Therapieoptimierung in den letzten Jahren hat sich die Prognose des Morbus Hodgkin entscheidend verbessert.
[{"en": "continuous optimization of therapy", "de": "kontinuierliche Therapieoptimierung"}, {"en": "prognosis", "de": "Prognose"}, {"en": "Hodgkin's disease", "de": "Morbus Hodgkin"}]

Due to the appearance of chronic fatigue symptoms, cardiopulmonary problems, hypothyreosis and damage to the gonadal system including azoospermia and ovarial insufficiency, the mostly young patients often suffer a persistent reduction in quality of life.
Durch oftmals lang anhaltende Fatigue-Symptomatik, kardiopulmonale Probleme, Schilddrüsenunterfunktion sowie Schäden am gonadalen System mit Azoospermie und Ovarialinsuffizienz sind die meist jungen Patienten nachhaltig in ihrer Lebensqualität beeinträchtigt.

In addition, the increased incidence of second malignancies following successful primary treatment presents a considerable problem.

According to the concept of attachment styles as distinct adaptive patterns of perceptions, thoughts, feelings, expectations and action tendencies in attachment-relevant situations (Bowlby 1975;
Ausgehend von Bindungsstilen als umschriebenen Mustern der Wahrnehmung, des Denkens, Fühlens, der Erwartungen und der Handlungsbereitschaften in bindungsrelevanten Situationen (Bowlby 1975;
[{"en": "attachment styles", "de": "Bindungsstilen"}, {"en": "adaptive patterns", "de": "umschriebenen Mustern"}, {"en": "perceptions", "de": "Wahrnehmung"}, {"en": "thoughts", "de": "Denkens"}, {"en": "feelings", "de": "Fühlens"}, {"en": "expectations", "de": "Erwartungen"}, {"en": "action tendencies", "de": "Handlungsbereitschaften"}, {"en": "attachment-relevant situations", "de": "bindungsrelevanten Situationen"}]
[{"en": "According", "de": "Ausgehend"}, {"en": "concept", "de": "Bindungsstilen"}, {"en": "attachment styles", "de": "umschriebenen Mustern"}, {"en": "distinct", "de": "Wahrnehmung"}, {"en": "adaptive patterns", "de": "des Denkens"}, {"en": "perceptions", "de": "Fühlens"}, {"en": "thoughts", "de": "Erwartungen"}, {"en": "feelings", "de": "Handlungsbereitschaften"}, {"en": "expectations", "de": "bindungsrelevanten"}, {"en": "action tendencies", "de": "Situationen"}, {"en": "attachment-relevant situations", "de": "Bowlby 1975"}]

Main 1990), we tried to portray these patterns in adequate operationalisations i.e. as distinguished configurations of personal characteristics.
Main 1990) war es Ziel, diese Muster im Sinne ihrer ursprünglichen Definition angemessen, d.h. als spezifische Merkmalskonfigurationen zu operationalisieren.
[{"en": "patterns", "de": "Muster"}, {"en": "adequate operationalisations", "de": "angemessen"}, {"en": "distinguished configurations", "de": "spezifische Merkmalskonfigurationen"}, {"en": "personal characteristics", "de": "Merkmalskonfigurationen"}]
[{"en": "tried", "de": "war es Ziel"}, {"en": "portray", "de": "operationalisieren"}, {"en": "patterns", "de": "Muster"}, {"en": "adequate", "de": "angemessen"}, {"en": "personal characteristics", "de": "spezifische Merkmalskonfigurationen"}]

Descriptions of each of the three attachment styles "secure", "avoidant" and "ambivalent" were translated into terms of self-descriptions given by clients imagining their future psychotherapeutic relationship.
Beschreibungen der drei Bindungsstile "sicher", "vermeidend" und "ambivalent" wurden übersetzt in Selbstbeschreibungen von Klienten zu Beginn einer therapeutischen Beziehung.
[{"en": "attachment styles", "de": "Bindungsstile"}, {"en": "secure", "de": "sicher"}, {"en": "avoidant", "de": "vermeidend"}, {"en": "ambivalent", "de": "ambivalent"}, {"en": "self-descriptions", "de": "Selbstbeschreibungen"}, {"en": "psychotherapeutic relationship", "de": "therapeutischen Beziehung"}]

Following the results of factor analysis three scales were constructed:
Anhand faktorenanalytischer Ergebnisse wurden drei Skalen gebildet:

[{"en": "Following", "de": "Anhand"}, {"en": "results", "de": "Ergebnisse"}, {"en": "factor analysis", "de": "faktorenanalytischer"}, {"en": "three", "de": "drei"}, {"en": "scales", "de": "Skalen"}, {"en": "constructed", "de": "gebildet"}]

N=374 inpatients (56,3% female, 43,7% male) at the beginning of psychotherapy completed the BFKE.
374 stationäre Patienten (56,3% weiblich, 43,7% männlich) füllten zu Beginn ihrer Psychotherapie den BFKE aus.
