PET is a new method in nuclear medicine which examines the metabolism and not the morphology.
Die Positronenemissionstomographie (PET) stellt ein neues bildgebendes Verfahren dar, mit der Stoffwechselvorgänge und nicht morphologische Veränderungen untersucht werden können.
[{"en": "PET", "de": "Positronenemissionstomographie"}, {"en": "nuclear medicine", "de": "bildgebendes Verfahren"}, {"en": "metabolism", "de": "Stoffwechselvorgänge"}, {"en": "morphology", "de": "morphologische Veränderungen"}]
[{"en": "PET", "de": "Positronenemissionstomographie (PET)"}, {"en": "new method", "de": "neues bildgebendes Verfahren"}, {"en": "nuclear medicine", "de": "Stoffwechselvorgänge"}, {"en": "metabolism", "de": "Stoffwechselvorgänge"}, {"en": "morphology", "de": "morphologische Veränderungen"}]

Tumors show a higher rate of glycolysis than benign tissue and hence can be detected by radioactive glucose.
Da Tumoren eine erhöhte Glykolyse aufweisen, können diese mittels radioaktiv markierter Glukose und PET nachgewiesen werden.
[{"en": "Tumors", "de": "Tumoren"}, {"en": "higher rate of glycolysis", "de": "erhöhte Glykolyse"}, {"en": "benign tissue", "de": "nachgewiesen"}, {"en": "radioactive glucose", "de": "radioaktiv markierter Glukose"}]
[{"en": "Tumors", "de": "Tumoren"}, {"en": "higher rate", "de": "erhöhte"}, {"en": "glycolysis", "de": "Glykolyse"}, {"en": "benign tissue", "de": "nachgewiesen"}, {"en": "can be detected", "de": "können"}, {"en": "radioactive glucose", "de": "radioaktiv markierter Glukose"}]

This method has proved good for various tumors.
Dieser Ansatz hat sich bereits bei unterschiedlichen Tumorentitäten bewährt.
[{"en": "method", "de": "Ansatz"}, {"en": "various tumors", "de": "unterschiedlichen Tumorentitäten"}]
[{"en": "This method", "de": "Dieser Ansatz"}, {"en": "has proved", "de": "hat sich"}, {"en": "good", "de": "bewährt"}, {"en": "various", "de": "unterschiedlichen"}, {"en": "tumors", "de": "Tumorentitäten"}]

In this study the lymph node staging of bladder cancer by PET was investigated.
In dieser Studie wurde die PET beim Lymphknotenstaging des Harnblasenkarzinoms untersucht.
[{"en": "lymph node staging", "de": "Lymphknotenstaging"}, {"en": "bladder cancer", "de": "Harnblasenkarzinoms"}, {"en": "PET", "de": "PET"}]
[{"en": "In this study", "de": "In dieser Studie"}, {"en": "lymph node staging", "de": "Lymphknotenstaging"}, {"en": "bladder cancer", "de": "Harnblasenkarzinoms"}, {"en": "by PET", "de": "die PET"}]

In 64 patients a PET of the pelvis after injection of fluorodeoxyglucose (FDG) was carried out preoperatively;
Bei 64 Patienten wurde präoperativ eine PET des Beckens nach i. v.-Injektion von Fluor-Deoxy-Glukose (FDG) durchgeführt, so daß der PET-Befund mit dem histologischen Befund des Operationspräparates nach klassischem operativen Lymphknotenstaging verglichen werden konnte.
[{"en": "64 patients", "de": "64 Patienten"}, {"en": "PET of the pelvis", "de": "PET des Beckens"}, {"en": "injection of fluorodeoxyglucose (FDG)", "de": "i. v.-Injektion von Fluor-Deoxy-Glukose (FDG)"}, {"en": "preoperatively", "de": "präoperativ"}]
[{"en": "In 64 patients", "de": "Bei 64 Patienten"}, {"en": "PET", "de": "PET"}, {"en": "pelvis", "de": "des Beckens"}, {"en": "after injection", "de": "nach i. v.-Injektion"}, {"en": "fluorodeoxyglucose (FDG)", "de": "Fluor-Deoxy-Glukose (FDG)"}, {"en": "carried out", "de": "durchgeführt"}, {"en": "preoperatively", "de": "präoperativ"}]

the PET-results were compared with the histology of the OR specimen after classical pelvic lymphadenectomy.
Beim Lymphknotenstaging wurden bei 14 Patienten positive Lymphknoten richtig erkannt;
[{"en": "PET-results", "de": "Lymphknotenstaging"}, {"en": "histology", "de": "positive Lymphknoten"}, {"en": "OR specimen", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "classical pelvic lymphadenectomy", "de": "richtig erkannt"}]
[{"en": "the", "de": "Beim"}, {"en": "results", "de": "Lymphknotenstaging"}, {"en": "compared", "de": "richtig erkannt"}, {"en": "with", "de": "bei"}, {"en": "histology", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "specimen", "de": "Lymphknoten"}, {"en": "pelvic lymphadenectomy", "de": "positive"}]

In 37 patients the PET-result was true-negative and in 6 patients false-positive resulting in a sensitivity of 67 %, a specificity of 86 % and an accuracy of 80 %.
Aus diesen Daten errechnet sich eine Sensitivität von 67 %, eine Spezifität von 86 % und eine Treffsicherheit von 80 %.
[{"en": "sensitivity", "de": "Sensitivität"}, {"en": "specificity", "de": "Spezifität"}, {"en": "accuracy", "de": "Treffsicherheit"}]
[{"en": "sensitivity", "de": "Sensitivität"}, {"en": "67 %", "de": "67 %"}, {"en": "specificity", "de": "Spezifität"}, {"en": "86 %", "de": "86 %"}, {"en": "accuracy", "de": "Treffsicherheit"}, {"en": "80 %", "de": "80 %"}]

Therefore, our PET results are encouraging and seem to be better than those obtained by classical staging procedures such as CT or MRI.
Somit sind die PET-Ergebnisse ermutigend und scheinen besser zu sein als die klassischen Stagingverfahren, wie CT und MRT.
[{"en": "PET results", "de": "PET-Ergebnisse"}, {"en": "classical staging procedures", "de": "klassischen Stagingverfahren"}, {"en": "CT", "de": "CT"}, {"en": "MRI", "de": "MRT"}]

Twenty-one of these patients were found to have an antibody deficiency.

In a prospective study from 1993 to 1998, 83 patients with histologically confirmed primary squamous epithelial carcinomas of the oral cavity, the oropharynx and the lip underwent panendoscopy staging to check whether early diagnosis of simultaneous, additional carcinomas of the upper aerodigestive tract is possible with this method.
In einer prospektiven Studie wurden von 1993-1998 83 Patienten mit histologisch gesicherten primären Plattenepithelkarzinomen der Mundhöhle, des Oropharynx und der Lippe im Rahmen des Stagings panendoskopiert, um zu prüfen, ob mit dieser Methode eine Frühdiagnostik simultaner Zweitkarzinome des oberen Aerodigestivtrakts möglich ist.

[{"en": "Precancerous conditions", "de": "Präkanzerosen"}, {"en": "panendoscopy", "de": "Panendoskopie"}]
[{"en": "Precancerous conditions", "de": "Präkanzerosen"}, {"en": "diagnosed", "de": "diagnostiziert werden"}, {"en": "by means of", "de": "mit Hilfe der"}, {"en": "panendoscopy", "de": "Panendoskopie"}]

This study and two retrospective studies from 1988 to 1994 from the Clinic of Oromaxillofacial Surgery and from the Regensburg Tumor Center (1993 to 1997) confirm the high proportion of additional carcinomas in a primary cancer in the "head and neck region."
Diese Studie und 2 retrospektive Studien (1988-1994) aus der Klinik und Poliklinik für Mund-, Kiefer-, Gesichtschirurgie sowie dem Tumorzentrum Regensburg (1993-1997) bestätigen den hohen Anteil von Zweitkarzinomen bei einem Primarius im "Kopf-Hals-Bereich".
[{"en": "study", "de": "Studie"}, {"en": "retrospective studies", "de": "retrospektive Studien"}, {"en": "Clinic of Oromaxillofacial Surgery", "de": "Klinik und Poliklinik für Mund-, Kiefer-, Gesichtschirurgie"}, {"en": "Regensburg Tumor Center", "de": "Tumorzentrum Regensburg"}, {"en": "head and neck region", "de": "Kopf-Hals-Bereich"}]
[{"en": "This study", "de": "Diese Studie"}, {"en": "two retrospective studies", "de": "2 retrospektive Studien"}, {"en": "from 1988 to 1994", "de": "1988-1994"}, {"en": "Clinic of Oromaxillofacial Surgery", "de": "Klinik und Poliklinik für Mund-, Kiefer-, Gesichtschirurgie"}, {"en": "Regensburg Tumor Center", "de": "Tumorzentrum Regensburg"}, {"en": "1993 to 1997", "de": "1993-1997"}, {"en": "confirm", "de": "bestätigen"}, {"en": "high proportion", "de": "hohen Anteil"}, {"en": "additional carcinomas", "de": "Zweitkarzinomen"}, {"en": "primary cancer", "de": "Primarius"}, {"en": "head and neck region", "de": "Kopf-Hals-Bereich"}]

Expierience so far and the uncomplicated course indicate that this investigation does not entail any additional risk for the patient, which is why panendoscopy can be recommended without reservations for staging in tumors in the head and neck region.
Aufgrund der bislang guten Erfahrungen und des komplikationslosen Verlaufs, entsteht offensichtlich durch diese Untersuchung auch keine zusätzliche Gefährdung der Patienten, weshalb die Panendoskopie ohne Einschränkung für das Staging bei Tumoren im Kopf-Hals-Bereich empfohlen werden kann.
[{"en": "investigation", "de": "Untersuchung"}, {"en": "additional risk", "de": "zusätzliche Gefährdung"}, {"en": "patient", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "panendoscopy", "de": "Panendoskopie"}, {"en": "staging", "de": "Staging"}, {"en": "tumors", "de": "Tumoren"}, {"en": "head and neck region", "de": "Kopf-Hals-Bereich"}]
[{"en": "Expierience so far", "de": "bislang guten Erfahrungen"}, {"en": "uncomplicated course", "de": "komplikationslosen Verlaufs"}, {"en": "investigation", "de": "Untersuchung"}, {"en": "additional risk", "de": "zusätzliche Gefährdung"}, {"en": "patient", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "panendoscopy", "de": "Panendoskopie"}, {"en": "recommended", "de": "empfohlen"}, {"en": "tumors", "de": "Tumoren"}, {"en": "head and neck region", "de": "Kopf-Hals-Bereich"}]

Huntington's disease (HD) may cause considerable diagnostic problems because of the highly variable clinical features, especially at the beginning of the illness.
Die Diagnose einer Chorea Huntington kann aufgrund der hohen Variabilität des klinischen Bildes besonders zu Beginn der Erkrankung erhebliche Probleme bereiten.
[{"en": "Huntington's disease", "de": "Chorea Huntington"}, {"en": "diagnostic", "de": "Diagnose"}, {"en": "clinical features", "de": "klinischen Bildes"}, {"en": "beginning of the illness", "de": "Beginn der Erkrankung"}]
[{"en": "Huntington's disease", "de": "Chorea Huntington"}, {"en": "may cause", "de": "kann"}, {"en": "diagnostic problems", "de": "Diagnose"}, {"en": "highly variable", "de": "hohen Variabilität"}, {"en": "clinical features", "de": "klinischen Bildes"}, {"en": "especially", "de": "besonders"}, {"en": "beginning", "de": "Beginn"}, {"en": "illness", "de": "Erkrankung"}]

We report the case of a 21-year-old woman with definite HD whose main symptoms were psychopathological changes that were misinterpreted as schizophrenia for 7 years.
Wir stellen eine 21jährige Patientin mit einer gesicherten Chorea Huntington vor, bei der über 7 Jahre die psychopathologischen Veränderungen die Hauptsymptomatik bildeten und als Schizophrenie fehldiagnostiziert wurden.
[{"en": "case", "de": "Patientin"}, {"en": "21-year-old woman", "de": "21jährige"}, {"en": "HD", "de": "Chorea Huntington"}, {"en": "psychopathological changes", "de": "psychopathologischen Veränderungen"}, {"en": "schizophrenia", "de": "Schizophrenie"}]
[{"en": "We report", "de": "Wir stellen"}, {"en": "the case", "de": "Patientin"}, {"en": "21-year-old", "de": "21jährige"}, {"en": "woman", "de": "Patientin"}, {"en": "definite", "de": "gesicherten"}, {"en": "HD", "de": "Chorea Huntington"}, {"en": "main symptoms", "de": "Hauptsymptomatik"}, {"en": "psychopathological changes", "de": "psychopathologischen Veränderungen"}, {"en": "misinterpreted", "de": "fehldiagnostiziert"}, {"en": "schizophrenia", "de": "Schizophrenie"}, {"en": "7 years", "de": "über 7 Jahre"}]

One reason for this misdiagnosis was the unusual, very early onset and the remarkable earlier age of onset of HD compared with that of other affected relatives.
Außergewöhnlich und somit für die Fehldiagnose maßgeblich verantwortlich waren der sehr frühe Beginn der Erkrankung und die im Vergleich zu anderen erkrankten Familienmitgliedern deutliche Vorverlegung des Krankheitsbeginns.
[{"en": "misdiagnosis", "de": "Fehldiagnose"}, {"en": "unusual, very early onset", "de": "sehr frühe Beginn der Erkrankung"}, {"en": "remarkable earlier age of onset", "de": "deutliche Vorverlegung des Krankheitsbeginns"}, {"en": "HD", "de": "Erkrankung"}, {"en": "other affected relatives", "de": "anderen erkrankten Familienmitgliedern"}]
[{"en": "One reason", "de": "Außergewöhnlich"}, {"en": "misdiagnosis", "de": "Fehldiagnose"}, {"en": "unusual", "de": "sehr frühe"}, {"en": "very early onset", "de": "Beginn der Erkrankung"}, {"en": "remarkable", "de": "deutliche"}, {"en": "earlier age of onset", "de": "Vorverlegung des Krankheitsbeginns"}, {"en": "HD", "de": "Erkrankung"}, {"en": "other affected relatives", "de": "anderen erkrankten Familienmitgliedern"}]

The phenomenon of earlier onset within one affected family is well documented in the literature in cases with the paternally transmitted mutated gene.
Das Phänomen der Vorverlegung des Krankheitsbeginns ist jedoch für den Fall der Übertragung des mutierten Gens vom Vater in der Literatur gut dokumentiert.
[{"en": "phenomenon", "de": "Phänomen"}, {"en": "earlier onset", "de": "Vorverlegung des Krankheitsbeginns"}, {"en": "affected family", "de": "Übertragung"}, {"en": "paternally transmitted mutated gene", "de": "mutierten Gens vom Vater"}]
[{"en": "The phenomenon", "de": "Das Phänomen"}, {"en": "earlier onset", "de": "Vorverlegung des Krankheitsbeginns"}, {"en": "within one affected family", "de": "für den Fall der Übertragung"}, {"en": "well documented", "de": "gut dokumentiert"}, {"en": "in the literature", "de": "in der Literatur"}, {"en": "cases", "de": "Fall"}, {"en": "paternally transmitted", "de": "vom Vater"}, {"en": "mutated gene", "de": "mutierten Gens"}]

Diagnostic landmarks were consideration of the initially mild disturbances of movement and the once again repeated detailed examination of the family history.
Differentialdiagnostisch wegweisend waren die Beachtung der zunächst dezenten Auffälligkeiten des Bewegungsmusters der Patientin und die daraufhin nochmals detaillierte Erhebung der Familienanamnese.
[{"en": "Diagnostic landmarks", "de": "Differentialdiagnostisch wegweisend"}, {"en": "disturbances of movement", "de": "Auffälligkeiten des Bewegungsmusters"}, {"en": "family history", "de": "Familienanamnese"}]
[{"en": "Diagnostic", "de": "Differentialdiagnostisch"}, {"en": "landmarks", "de": "wegweisend"}, {"en": "consideration", "de": "Beachtung"}, {"en": "initially", "de": "zunächst"}, {"en": "mild", "de": "dezenten"}, {"en": "disturbances", "de": "Auffälligkeiten"}, {"en": "movement", "de": "Bewegungsmusters"}, {"en": "once again", "de": "nochmals"}, {"en": "detailed", "de": "detaillierte"}, {"en": "examination", "de": "Erhebung"}, {"en": "family history", "de": "Familienanamnese"}]

Dermatological rehabilitation treatment can take different forms:
Eine dermatologische stationäre Rehabilitation kann mit unterschiedlichem Schwerpunkt erfolgen:
[{"en": "Dermatological rehabilitation treatment", "de": "dermatologische stationäre Rehabilitation"}]
[{"en": "Dermatological", "de": "dermatologische"}, {"en": "rehabilitation", "de": "Rehabilitation"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "stationäre"}, {"en": "different", "de": "unterschiedlichem"}, {"en": "forms", "de": "Schwerpunkt"}]

climato-therapy, baths, phototherapy and psychosomatic treatments.
als Klimatherapie, als (Balneo-)Phototherapie oder in einem psychosomtischen Rahmen.
[{"en": "climato-therapy", "de": "Klimatherapie"}, {"en": "baths", "de": "Balneo"}, {"en": "phototherapy", "de": "Phototherapie"}, {"en": "psychosomatic treatments", "de": "psychosomtischen Rahmen"}]
[{"en": "climato-therapy", "de": "Klimatherapie"}, {"en": "baths", "de": "Balneo"}, {"en": "phototherapy", "de": "Phototherapie"}, {"en": "psychosomatic treatments", "de": "psychosomtischen Rahmen"}]

Accordingly, a psychosomatic approach to dermatological illness is indicated mainly when a psychological disorder and a dermatological disease coincide.
Dies gilt für das gleichzeitige Vorliegen einer dermatologischen Erkrankung und einer psychischen Störung.
[{"en": "dermatological illness", "de": "dermatologischen Erkrankung"}, {"en": "psychological disorder", "de": "psychischen Störung"}]
[{"en": "Accordingly", "de": "Dies gilt"}, {"en": "dermatological illness", "de": "dermatologischen Erkrankung"}, {"en": "indicated", "de": "für"}, {"en": "psychological disorder", "de": "psychischen Störung"}, {"en": "dermatological disease", "de": "dermatologischen Erkrankung"}, {"en": "coincide", "de": "gleichzeitig"}]

In addtion, dermatoses with psychological triggers or overlays, and also depression, pre-existing emotional disorders and special motivation for psychotherapy should be considered for psychosomatic treatment.
Des weiteren ist eine derartige Therapie indiziert bei Dermatosen psychischer Genese oder mit psychischer Beteiligung, wenn Depressivität, funktionelle Beschwerden, vorausgegangene emotionale Belastung oder Psychotherapiemotivation vorliegen.
[{"en": "dermatoses", "de": "Dermatosen"}, {"en": "psychological triggers", "de": "psychischer Genese"}, {"en": "overlays", "de": "psychischer Beteiligung"}, {"en": "depression", "de": "Depressivität"}, {"en": "pre-existing emotional disorders", "de": "vorausgegangene emotionale Belastung"}, {"en": "special motivation for psychotherapy", "de": "Psychotherapiemotivation"}, {"en": "psychosomatic treatment", "de": "Therapie"}]
[{"en": "dermatoses", "de": "Dermatosen"}, {"en": "psychological", "de": "psychischer"}, {"en": "triggers", "de": "Genese"}, {"en": "overlays", "de": "Beteiligung"}, {"en": "depression", "de": "Depressivität"}, {"en": "pre-existing", "de": "vorausgegangene"}, {"en": "emotional disorders", "de": "emotionale Belastung"}, {"en": "special motivation", "de": "Psychotherapiemotivation"}, {"en": "psychotherapy", "de": "Psychotherapie"}, {"en": "psychosomatic treatment", "de": "Therapie"}]

Finally, patients who are having trouble accepting or confronting malignant skin tumours may also benefit.
Bei Problemen in der Krankheitsverarbeitung sollten auch andere Dermatosen, nicht zuletzt bösartige Neubildungen der Haut, eine Indikation für eine stationäre psychosomatische Behandlung sein.
[{"en": "patients", "de": "Problemen"}, {"en": "malignant skin tumours", "de": "bösartige Neubildungen der Haut"}, {"en": "benefit", "de": "Indikation für eine stationäre psychosomatische Behandlung"}]

The present paper is concerned with the importance of braces and orthotic devices for the treatment of functional deficits of the lateral ankle ligaments.
Im folgenden soll dargestellt werden, welchen Stellenwert orthopädische Hilfsmittel wie Bandagen und Orthesen bei Funktionsstörungen im Bereich des lateralen Bandapparats des Sprunggelenks haben.
[{"en": "braces", "de": "Bandagen"}, {"en": "orthotic devices", "de": "Orthesen"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Stellenwert"}, {"en": "functional deficits", "de": "Funktionsstörungen"}, {"en": "lateral ankle ligaments", "de": "lateralen Bandapparats des Sprunggelenks"}]
[{"en": "The present paper", "de": "Im folgenden"}, {"en": "importance", "de": "Stellenwert"}, {"en": "braces", "de": "Bandagen"}, {"en": "orthotic devices", "de": "Orthesen"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Hilfsmittel"}, {"en": "functional deficits", "de": "Funktionsstörungen"}, {"en": "lateral ankle ligaments", "de": "lateralen Bandapparats des Sprunggelenks"}]

Finally, the effects of these orthopaedic devices with respect to joint stabilisation, injury prevention, and the influence on proprioception and sports performance are discussed based on research reports.
Anschließend werden die in der Literatur beschriebenen Wirkungsmechanismen der Orthesen in bezug auf eine Gelenkstabilisierung, Verletzungsprävention und Beeinflussung der sportlichen Leistung sowie der propriozeptiven Fähigkeiten erläutert.
[{"en": "orthopaedic devices", "de": "Orthesen"}, {"en": "joint stabilisation", "de": "Gelenkstabilisierung"}, {"en": "injury prevention", "de": "Verletzungsprävention"}, {"en": "proprioception", "de": "propriozeptiven Fähigkeiten"}, {"en": "sports performance", "de": "sportlichen Leistung"}]

The present study deals with long-term dimensional changes in cemented Müller-type total hip endoprostheses.
Die vorliegende Arbeit beschäftigt sich mit Langzeitveränderungen an zementierten Polyethylenpfannen vom Müller-Typ.
[{"en": "long-term dimensional changes", "de": "Langzeitveränderungen"}, {"en": "cemented Müller-type total hip endoprostheses", "de": "zementierten Polyethylenpfannen vom Müller-Typ"}]
[{"en": "The present study", "de": "Die vorliegende Arbeit"}, {"en": "deals with", "de": "beschäftigt sich mit"}, {"en": "long-term", "de": "Langzeit"}, {"en": "cemented", "de": "zementierten"}, {"en": "total hip endoprostheses", "de": "Polyethylenpfannen vom Müller-Typ"}]

Creep and wear contribute to different extents to the dimensional changes in polyethylene.
Kaltfluß und Abrieb führen in unterschiedlichem Ausmaß zu Formveränderungen am Polyethylen.
[{"en": "Creep", "de": "Kaltfluß"}, {"en": "wear", "de": "Abrieb"}, {"en": "dimensional changes", "de": "Formveränderungen"}, {"en": "polyethylene", "de": "Polyethylen"}]
[{"en": "Creep", "de": "Kaltfluß"}, {"en": "wear", "de": "Abrieb"}, {"en": "contribute", "de": "führen"}, {"en": "different extents", "de": "unterschiedlichem Ausmaß"}, {"en": "dimensional changes", "de": "Formveränderungen"}, {"en": "polyethylene", "de": "Polyethylen"}]

The total amount of polyethylene wear is represented by the displacement of the femoral head into the socket.
Die Menge des Abriebs wird erfaßbar durch die Verschiebung des Hüftkopfes in der Pfanne.
[{"en": "total amount", "de": "Menge"}, {"en": "polyethylene wear", "de": "Abriebs"}, {"en": "displacement", "de": "Verschiebung"}, {"en": "femoral head", "de": "Hüftkopfes"}, {"en": "socket", "de": "Pfanne"}]
[{"en": "The total amount", "de": "Die Menge"}, {"en": "polyethylene wear", "de": "des Abriebs"}, {"en": "is represented by", "de": "wird erfaßbar durch"}, {"en": "the displacement", "de": "die Verschiebung"}, {"en": "femoral head", "de": "Hüftkopfes"}, {"en": "socket", "de": "Pfanne"}]

Within the first postoperative years, the head shifts up to a relatively high rate of about 0.5 mm per year.
Innerhalb der ersten Jahre postoperativ kommt es zu einer relativ hohen jährlichen Kopfverschiebung um 0,5 mm.
[{"en": "postoperative", "de": "postoperativ"}, {"en": "head shifts", "de": "Kopfverschiebung"}, {"en": "0.5 mm per year", "de": "0,5 mm"}]
[{"en": "Within", "de": "Innerhalb"}, {"en": "the first", "de": "der ersten"}, {"en": "postoperative years", "de": "Jahre postoperativ"}, {"en": "the head", "de": "Kopfverschiebung"}, {"en": "shifts", "de": "kommt es zu"}, {"en": "relatively high rate", "de": "relativ hohen"}, {"en": "about", "de": "um"}, {"en": "0.5 mm per year", "de": "0,5 mm"}]

This rate diminishes after 5 years to an average of about 0.1 mm (ceramics) and 0.2 mm (metal) per year.
Sie pendelt sich nach etwa 5 Jahren auf Werte um 0,1 mm (Keramikkopf) und 0,2 mm (Metallkopf) ein.
[{"en": "rate", "de": "Werte"}, {"en": "average", "de": "pendelt sich"}, {"en": "ceramics", "de": "Keramikkopf"}, {"en": "metal", "de": "Metallkopf"}, {"en": "0.1 mm", "de": "0,1 mm"}, {"en": "0.2 mm", "de": "0,2 mm"}]
[{"en": "This rate", "de": "Sie"}, {"en": "diminishes", "de": "pendelt sich"}, {"en": "after 5 years", "de": "nach etwa 5 Jahren"}, {"en": "average", "de": "Werte"}, {"en": "about", "de": "um"}, {"en": "0.1 mm", "de": "0,1 mm"}, {"en": "ceramics", "de": "Keramikkopf"}, {"en": "0.2 mm", "de": "0,2 mm"}, {"en": "metal", "de": "Metallkopf"}, {"en": "per year", "de": "ein"}]

Values exceeding 0.2 mm per year for the shift of the femoral head are considered to be unfavourable with regard to a probable loosening of the prosthesis.
Werte für die Kopfverschiebung, die 0,2 mm pro Jahr übersteigen, werden als ungünstig angesehen im Hinblick auf eine Prothesenlockerung.
[{"en": "Values", "de": "Werte"}, {"en": "shift of the femoral head", "de": "Kopfverschiebung"}, {"en": "prosthesis", "de": "Prothesenlockerung"}]
[{"en": "Values", "de": "Werte"}, {"en": "exceeding", "de": "übersteigen"}, {"en": "0.2 mm per year", "de": "0,2 mm pro Jahr"}, {"en": "shift of the femoral head", "de": "Kopfverschiebung"}, {"en": "considered", "de": "angesehen"}, {"en": "unfavourable", "de": "ungünstig"}, {"en": "probable loosening", "de": "Prothesenlockerung"}, {"en": "prosthesis", "de": "Prothese"}]

In this study we determined the orientation of the centre of the prosthetic head in relation to the wire marker of the polyethylene cup, comprising in all 369 total hip prostheses.
In dieser Studie wurde bei insgesamt 369 Hüftprothesen das Zentrum des Hüftkopfes in Relation zum Markierungsdraht der Pfanne bestimmt und die Kopfverschiebung berechnet.
[{"en": "study", "de": "Studie"}, {"en": "orientation", "de": "Zentrum"}, {"en": "centre of the prosthetic head", "de": "Hüftkopfes"}, {"en": "wire marker", "de": "Markierungsdraht"}, {"en": "polyethylene cup", "de": "Pfanne"}, {"en": "total hip prostheses", "de": "Hüftprothesen"}]
[{"en": "In this study", "de": "In dieser Studie"}, {"en": "the orientation", "de": "das Zentrum"}, {"en": "the centre", "de": "des Hüftkopfes"}, {"en": "prosthetic head", "de": "Hüftkopfes"}, {"en": "relation", "de": "Relation"}, {"en": "wire marker", "de": "Markierungsdraht"}, {"en": "polyethylene cup", "de": "Pfanne"}, {"en": "total hip prostheses", "de": "Hüftprothesen"}]

After an average of 77 months, 96 % of the prostheses with ceramic heads (n = 109) had a wear rate of less than 0.2 mm per year.
Nach einer durchschnittlichen Laufzeit von 77 Monaten hatten 96 % der Keramikköpfe (n = 109) eine Abriebrate von weniger als 0,2 mm pro Jahr.
[{"en": "prostheses", "de": "Keramikköpfe"}, {"en": "ceramic heads", "de": "Keramikköpfe"}, {"en": "wear rate", "de": "Abriebrate"}]
[{"en": "After", "de": "Nach"}, {"en": "average", "de": "durchschnittlichen"}, {"en": "77 months", "de": "77 Monaten"}, {"en": "96 %", "de": "96 %"}, {"en": "prostheses", "de": "Keramikköpfe"}, {"en": "ceramic heads", "de": "Keramikköpfe"}, {"en": "wear rate", "de": "Abriebrate"}, {"en": "less than", "de": "weniger als"}, {"en": "0.2 mm per year", "de": "0,2 mm pro Jahr"}]

Using metal heads (Protasul-2 and Protasul-10) this rate could only be measured in 71 % (n = 109) of the prostheses (61.5 months).
Bei den verwendeten Metallköpfen (Protasul-2 und Protasul-10) wurde dieser Wert nur in 71 % (n = 260) erreicht (Laufzeit 61,5 Monate).
[{"en": "metal heads", "de": "Metallköpfen"}, {"en": "Protasul-2", "de": "Protasul-2"}, {"en": "Protasul-10", "de": "Protasul-10"}, {"en": "prostheses", "de": "Laufzeit"}]
[{"en": "Using", "de": "Bei"}, {"en": "metal heads", "de": "Metallköpfen"}, {"en": "this rate", "de": "dieser Wert"}, {"en": "71 %", "de": "71 %"}, {"en": "prostheses", "de": "erreicht"}, {"en": "61.5 months", "de": "61,5 Monate"}]

The combination ceramics-polyethylene produces half of the total amount of wear produced by metal-polyethylene.
Die Gleitpaarung Polyethylen - Keramik reduziert den Abrieb um die Hälfte im Vergleich zur Paarung Polyethylen - Metall.
[{"en": "combination ceramics-polyethylene", "de": "Gleitpaarung Polyethylen - Keramik"}, {"en": "total amount of wear", "de": "Abrieb"}, {"en": "metal-polyethylene", "de": "Paarung Polyethylen - Metall"}]
[{"en": "combination", "de": "Gleitpaarung"}, {"en": "ceramics", "de": "Keramik"}, {"en": "polyethylene", "de": "Polyethylen"}, {"en": "half", "de": "Hälfte"}, {"en": "total amount", "de": "Abrieb"}, {"en": "wear", "de": "Abrieb"}, {"en": "metal", "de": "Metall"}]

Younger patients should preferably be treated with a ceramic ballhead.
Bei jüngeren Patienten ist die Verwendung eines Keramikkopfes zu bevorzugen.
[{"en": "Younger patients", "de": "jüngeren Patienten"}, {"en": "ceramic ballhead", "de": "Keramikkopf"}]
[{"en": "Younger patients", "de": "jüngeren Patienten"}, {"en": "ceramic ballhead", "de": "Keramikkopfes"}]

If patients who need electroconvulsive therapy are unable to consent, it is necessary to gain the guardian's permission to carry out the treatment.
Besteht bei einwilligungsunfähigen Patienten die Indikation zur Durchführung einer Elektrokrampftherapie (EKT), ist die Genehmigung des Betreuers zur Durchführung der Heilbehandlung erforderlich.
[{"en": "electroconvulsive therapy", "de": "Elektrokrampftherapie (EKT)"}, {"en": "consent", "de": "einwilligungsunfähigen"}, {"en": "guardian's permission", "de": "Genehmigung des Betreuers"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Heilbehandlung"}]
[{"en": "patients", "de": "Patienten"}, {"en": "need", "de": "Indikation"}, {"en": "electroconvulsive therapy", "de": "Elektrokrampftherapie"}, {"en": "unable to consent", "de": "einwilligungsunfähigen"}, {"en": "necessary", "de": "erforderlich"}, {"en": "gain", "de": "Genehmigung"}, {"en": "guardian's permission", "de": "des Betreuers"}, {"en": "carry out", "de": "Durchführung"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Heilbehandlung"}]

The high court of Hamburg (Landgericht Hamburg) decided that legal permission is necessary as a result of the risk of persisting retrograde amnesia and the ensuing danger of permanent damage to the patient's health.
Das Landgericht Hamburg war unter Verweis auf das Risiko persistierender retrograder Amnesien von der begründeten Gefahr eines länger dauernden gesundheitlichen Schadens ausgegangen und hatte die Genehmigungspflicht bejaht.
[{"en": "high court of Hamburg", "de": "Landgericht Hamburg"}, {"en": "legal permission", "de": "Genehmigungspflicht"}, {"en": "persisting retrograde amnesia", "de": "persistierender retrograder Amnesien"}, {"en": "permanent damage to the patient's health", "de": "länger dauernden gesundheitlichen Schadens"}]

This paper points out however, that electroconvulsive therapy, even considering the contraindications, is a safe and effective treatment for depression and schizophrenic psychoses.
Die Elektrokrampftherapie ist jedoch unter Beachtung der Kontraindikationen eine sichere und effektive Therapiemaßnahme zur Behandlung von Depressionen und schizophrenen Psychosen.
[{"en": "electroconvulsive therapy", "de": "Elektrokrampftherapie"}, {"en": "contraindications", "de": "Kontraindikationen"}, {"en": "depression", "de": "Depressionen"}, {"en": "schizophrenic psychoses", "de": "schizophrenen Psychosen"}]
[{"en": "This paper points out", "de": "Die Elektrokrampftherapie ist jedoch"}, {"en": "electroconvulsive therapy", "de": "Elektrokrampftherapie"}, {"en": "contraindications", "de": "Kontraindikationen"}, {"en": "safe", "de": "sichere"}, {"en": "effective", "de": "effektive"}, {"en": "treatment", "de": "Therapiemaßnahme"}, {"en": "depression", "de": "Depressionen"}, {"en": "schizophrenic psychoses", "de": "schizophrenen Psychosen"}]

Application of unilateral short-pulse stimulation reduces the frequency and intensity of cognitive side effects.
Die Anwendung der unilateralen Kurzpulsstimulation reduziert die Häufigkeit und Ausprägung der kognitiven Nebenwirkungen.
[{"en": "unilateral short-pulse stimulation", "de": "unilateralen Kurzpulsstimulation"}, {"en": "cognitive side effects", "de": "kognitiven Nebenwirkungen"}]

In particular, retrograde amnesia is very rare with regard to frequency and intensity and is negligible when compared with the dangers of the illness itself.
Insbesondere retrograde Amnesien treten nur sehr selten und in einer Ausprägung auf, die angesichts der Gefährdungen durch die Grunderkrankung zu vernachlässigen ist.
[{"en": "retrograde amnesia", "de": "retrograde Amnesien"}, {"en": "frequency", "de": "sehr selten"}, {"en": "intensity", "de": "Ausprägung"}, {"en": "dangers", "de": "Gefährdungen"}, {"en": "illness", "de": "Grunderkrankung"}]

There- fore, it is not necessary to apply for approval from the Guardianship Court.
Eine vormundschaftsgerichtliche Genehmigungspflicht im Rahmen des Betreuungsgesetzes ist nach Meinung der Autoren zu verneinen.

Malignant hyperthermia (MH) is an autosomal dominantly inherited disorder, triggered in susceptible individuals by inhalation anesthetics and depolarizing muscle relaxants such as succinylcholine.
Die Maligne Hyperthermie (MH) wird bei genetisch prädisponierten Individuen und autosomal-dominantem Erbgang u.a. durch volatile Anästhetika und Succinylcholin ausgelöst.
[{"en": "Malignant hyperthermia", "de": "Maligne Hyperthermie"}, {"en": "autosomal dominantly inherited disorder", "de": "autosomal-dominantem Erbgang"}, {"en": "inhalation anesthetics", "de": "volatile Anästhetika"}, {"en": "depolarizing muscle relaxants", "de": "Succinylcholin"}]
[{"en": "Malignant hyperthermia", "de": "Maligne Hyperthermie"}, {"en": "autosomal dominantly inherited disorder", "de": "autosomal-dominantem Erbgang"}, {"en": "susceptible individuals", "de": "genetisch prädisponierten Individuen"}, {"en": "inhalation anesthetics", "de": "volatile Anästhetika"}, {"en": "depolarizing muscle relaxants", "de": "Succinylcholin"}]

Because of its high sensitivity (97-99%) and specificity (93,6%) as well as the genetic heterogeneity of MH disorder, the in vitro contracture test (IVCT) following the European-MH-Group is considered to be the "Gold Standard" for phenotypical determination of predisposed patients.
Der In-vitro-Kontrakturtest (IVKT) nach dem Protokoll der Europäischen-MH-Gruppe stellt aufgrund seiner hohen Sensitivität (97-99%) und Spezifität (93,6%) sowie der genetischen Variabilität der Erkrankung den "Goldstandard" der phänotypischen Diagnostik zur MH-Veranlagung dar.
[{"en": "high sensitivity", "de": "hohen Sensitivität"}, {"en": "specificity", "de": "Spezifität"}, {"en": "genetic heterogeneity", "de": "genetischen Variabilität"}, {"en": "in vitro contracture test", "de": "In-vitro-Kontrakturtest"}, {"en": "IVCT", "de": "IVKT"}, {"en": "European-MH-Group", "de": "Europäischen-MH-Gruppe"}, {"en": "Gold Standard", "de": "Goldstandard"}, {"en": "phenotypical determination", "de": "phänotypischen Diagnostik"}]
[{"en": "Because of", "de": "aufgrund"}, {"en": "high sensitivity", "de": "hohen Sensitivität"}, {"en": "specificity", "de": "Spezifität"}, {"en": "genetic heterogeneity", "de": "genetischen Variabilität"}, {"en": "in vitro contracture test", "de": "In-vitro-Kontrakturtest"}, {"en": "IVCT", "de": "IVKT"}, {"en": "European-MH-Group", "de": "Europäischen-MH-Gruppe"}, {"en": "Gold Standard", "de": "Goldstandard"}, {"en": "phenotypical determination", "de": "phänotypischen Diagnostik"}]

On the other hand mutations in the skeletal muscle ryanodine receptor gene (RYR1) are tightly linked with MH susceptibility.
Andererseits besteht eine hohe Kopplung zwischen Mutationen am Ryanodinrezeptor-Gen (RYR1) und der MH-Disposition.
[{"en": "mutations", "de": "Mutationen"}, {"en": "skeletal muscle ryanodine receptor gene", "de": "Ryanodinrezeptor-Gen"}, {"en": "RYR1", "de": "RYR1"}, {"en": "MH susceptibility", "de": "MH-Disposition"}]
[{"en": "On the other hand", "de": "Andererseits"}, {"en": "mutations", "de": "Mutationen"}, {"en": "skeletal muscle", "de": "Ryanodinrezeptor-Gen"}, {"en": "ryanodine receptor gene", "de": "RYR1"}, {"en": "RYR1", "de": "RYR1"}, {"en": "tightly linked", "de": "hohe Kopplung"}, {"en": "MH susceptibility", "de": "MH-Disposition"}]

After detecting a C1840T-mutation (Arg614Cys) in the RYR1 gene in one individual of a large MH family, we searched for this mutation in the remaining family members and determined the concordance with IVCT.
Nachdem die C1840T-Mutation (Arg614Cys) am RYR1-Gen bei einem Individuum einer Großfamilie nachgewiesen werden konnte, war das Vorhandensein dieser Mutation in den übrigen Familienmitgliedern und die Übereinstimmung mit dem IVKT von Interesse.
[{"en": "C1840T-mutation (Arg614Cys)", "de": "C1840T-Mutation (Arg614Cys)"}, {"en": "RYR1 gene", "de": "RYR1-Gen"}, {"en": "MH family", "de": "Großfamilie"}, {"en": "IVCT", "de": "IVKT"}]
[{"en": "After", "de": "Nachdem"}, {"en": "detecting", "de": "nachgewiesen werden konnte"}, {"en": "mutation", "de": "Mutation"}, {"en": "RYR1 gene", "de": "RYR1-Gen"}, {"en": "one individual", "de": "einem Individuum"}, {"en": "large MH family", "de": "Großfamilie"}, {"en": "searched", "de": "Vorhandensein"}, {"en": "remaining family members", "de": "übrigen Familienmitgliedern"}, {"en": "concordance", "de": "Übereinstimmung"}, {"en": "IVCT", "de": "IVKT"}]

The sonographic diagnosis of malignant lymphoma in childhood is described.
Die Ultraschalldiagnostik maligner Lymphome im Kindesalter wird beschrieben.

initial enlargement of the lymph nodes and organs involved and disturbance of normal echo texture by mainly hypoechoic lesions can be found.

Response to therapy correlates with normalization of size and echo texture and recovery from tumor-related complications.
Ein Therapieerfolg ist im Ultraschall an der Normalisierung der Lymphknoten- und Organgröße, der Rückkehr der normalen Organechogenität und der Rückbildung tumor- bzw. entzündungsbedingter Komplikationen erkennbar.

Differential diagnosis with ultrasound is based on the topographic distribution and echo pattern of infiltration and, with certain restrictions, on the echogenicity of lesions and perfusion feasible with Doppler sonography.
Differentialdiagnostische Hinweise ergeben sich aus dem topographischen Verteilungsmuster und dem sonographischen Erscheinungsbild der Läsionen, sowie unter gewissem Vorbehalt anhand der Echogenität und der dopplersonographisch analysierbaren Durchblutungsverhätnisse.
[{"en": "Differential diagnosis", "de": "Differentialdiagnostische Hinweise"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographischen"}, {"en": "topographic distribution", "de": "topographischen Verteilungsmuster"}, {"en": "echo pattern", "de": "Erscheinungsbild"}, {"en": "infiltration", "de": "Läsionen"}, {"en": "echogenicity", "de": "Echogenität"}, {"en": "lesions", "de": "Läsionen"}, {"en": "perfusion", "de": "Durchblutungsverhätnisse"}, {"en": "Doppler sonography", "de": "dopplersonographisch"}]
[{"en": "Differential diagnosis", "de": "Differentialdiagnostische Hinweise"}, {"en": "ultrasound", "de": "sonographischen"}, {"en": "topographic distribution", "de": "topographischen Verteilungsmuster"}, {"en": "echo pattern", "de": "Erscheinungsbild"}, {"en": "infiltration", "de": "Läsionen"}, {"en": "echogenicity", "de": "Echogenität"}, {"en": "lesions", "de": "Läsionen"}, {"en": "perfusion", "de": "Durchblutungsverhätnisse"}, {"en": "Doppler sonography", "de": "dopplersonographisch"}]

In 1970 Ralph W. Grover described a clinicopathologic entity characterized by pruritic keratotic papules and papulovesicles predominantly on the trunk, disappearing spontaneously after a few weeks or months and demonstrating the histological features of epidermal acantholysis.
Bei der 1970 von Grover erstmals beschriebenen transitorischen akantholytischen Dermatose finden sich klinisch meist juckende, ödematöse oder hyperkeratotische Papeln oder Papulovesikel vorwiegend am Rumpf, die nach Wochen bis Monaten spontan abheilen.

[{"en": "1970", "de": "1970"}, {"en": "Ralph W.
